pāśupata ādi smṛtīnām śiva ādi pratyakṣa mūla tvena śruti mūla tva abhāvāt
tat idam āha pratyakṣatas dṛṣṭvā iti
nanu tarhi smṛtīnām ukta rītyā sāvakāśa tvāt niravakāśa śruti virodhena aprāmāṇyam astu
mā evam
vaiparītyāt
smṛtayaḥ hi vispaṣṭa vādinyaḥ na vivakṣita arthāt pracyāvanam arhanti
śrutayaḥ tu asphuṭa spaṣṭa
vikṣipta vādinyaḥ vyavasthita alaukika śābda lakṣaṇa viṣayāḥ aśakya adhyayana ananta aparipūrṇa vākya rūpāḥ na artha viśeṣa niṣṭhāḥ lakṣyante
atas eva bhavatām mīmāṃsā āyāsaḥ
etat api uktam prakarṣeṇa uktam iti
vispaṣṭam uktam iti arthaḥ
pipīlikā lipi nibhā iti ca
asphuṭa ispaṣṭa iti arthaḥ
kiñca śrutayaḥ tāvat avispaṣṭa arthāḥ
praṇetṛ vyākhyāna sampradāya vikalāḥ na svatantrāḥ kam api artham pratipādayitum īśate

original: kintu sahajasiddhena yogardhilabdhena vā pratyakṣeṇāśeṣārthadarśināmāptānāṃ vacanamanusṛtya netavyāḥ /
analyzed: kintu sahaja siddhena yoga ṛdhi labdhena vā pratyakṣeṇa aśeṣa artha darśinām āptānām vacanam anusṛtya netavyāḥ
yathā uktam
itihāsa purāṇābhyām vedam samupabṛṃhayet iti
itihāsa purāṇa grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam
tathā ca katham pāśupata ādi smṛti ukta artha nivāraṇāya samarthāḥ syuḥ

original: tadidamuktaṃ pipīlikālipinibhā saṃvādena vinā kamapyarthaṃ pratipādayitumasamarthā śrutiryadvacanasaṃvādāpekṣiṇī tairevāptaiḥ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭvā  #
analyzed: tat idam uktam pipīlikā lipi nibhā saṃvādena vinā kam api artham pratipādayitum asamarthā śrutiḥ yat vacana saṃvāda apekṣiṇī taiḥ eva āptaiḥ pratyakṣataḥ dṛṣṭvā
proktam artham katham vārayet
svatantra svātantrya
daśāyām a pratipādaka tvāt
pāratantrye tu virodha abhāvāt eva
kintu tad anusāreṇa eva netavyā iti
bhavet etat yadi pāśupata ādi smṛti praṇetṝṇām āpta tvam syāt

original: tadeva kuta ityata āha- sarvagā hīti //
analyzed: tat eva kutas iti atas āha sarva gā hi iti
sarvam gacchanti avagacchanti iti sarvagāḥ
āpta tva upalakṣaṇam etat
te rudra ādayaḥ
hi iti tatra pramāṇa prasiddhim dyotayati
athavā sarvajña tvam eva atra pramāṇa prasiddhayā sādhyate
tatas eva anyasya siddheḥ
tathā hi
hari hara hiraṇyagarbhāḥ tāvat sarvajña tayā śruti itihāsa purāṇeṣu prasiddhāḥ
tatra hareḥ eva avatārāḥ buddha ṛṣabha kapilāḥ saugata ādi smṛti praṇetāraḥ

original: tathāca teṣāṃ mohābhāvena rāgadveṣayorapyabhāvāt vipralipsā ca nivartate /
analyzed: tathā ca teṣām moha abhāvena rāga dveṣayoḥ api abhāvāt vipralipsā ca nivartate
kiñca jñāna icchā prayatna sthāna karaṇa pāṭavāni tāvat upadeśa mātreṇa teṣām niścīyante
kiñca jñāna icchā prayatna sthāna karaṇa pāṭavāni tāvat upadeśa mātreṇa teṣām niścīyante
jñānam tu yathārtham ayathārtham vā syāt

original: icchāpi pratipipādayiṣā vā vipralipsā veti sandeho 'vaśiṣyate /
analyzed: icchā api pratipipādayiṣā vā vipralipsā vā iti sandehaḥ

original: tatrābhyāsadaśāpanno 'yamartho 'syeti sāmānyato niścaye bhavatyeva tasya jñānasya
analyzed: tatra abhyāsa daśā āpannaḥ sāmānyatas niścaye bhavati eva tasya jñānasya
yathārtha tva niścayaḥ yathā abhyāsa daśā āpannam idam araṇyam amīṣām mleñchānām atas smin ete
mārga abhijñāḥ iti pānthānām eva niścayaḥ

original: vipralipsā ca hetudarśanena vyāptā hetau sati syāt /
analyzed: vipralipsā ca hetu darśanena vyāptā hetau sati syāt
sa ca dvi rūpaḥ
sva upakāraḥ para apakāraḥ vā

original: na tāvatpāntheṣu vimārgeṇa pratiṣṭhamāneṣu mleñchānāṃ kaścitsvopakāraḥ /
analyzed: na tāvat pāntheṣu vimārgeṇa pratiṣṭhamāneṣu mleñchānām kaścid sva upakāraḥ
svasya gṛhīta tvāt
śarīrasya ca karaṇīya antara bhāvāt
bhāve vā parityāga ayogāt
na api dvitīyaḥ
na hi an unmattāḥ anapakāriṇam apakurvate
na api para apakāra mātram puruṣa arthaḥ
tathā sati sarvaḥ sarvam apakuryāt iti
evam vipralipsā api nivāryate

original: anabhyāsadaśāpanne tu viṣaye pramāṇāntarasaṃvādātpravṛttisāmarthyādvā mohavipralipsayornivṛttirityato mleñchā apyāptā bhavanti /
analyzed: anabhyāsa daśā āpanne tu viṣaye pramāṇa antara saṃvādāt pravṛtti sāmarthyāt vā moha vipralipsayoḥ nivṛttiḥ iti atas mleñchāḥ api āptāḥ bhavanti
kim uta mahā anubhāvāḥ rudra ādayaḥ iti
evam pūrvapakṣa sūtra abhiprāyam abhidhāya siddhānta sūtra tātparyam āha iti ced iti
iti ced yadi aśeṣa jñāḥ rudra ādyāḥ hari pūrvakāḥ
kim na aśeṣa vidaḥ
tat na iti śeṣaḥ
kutas
niścite hi pāśupata ādi smṛti prāmāṇye tad viruddham viṣṇoḥ sarva jagat kāraṇatva ādikam asat syāt
na ca evam
sat pratipakṣa tvāt
āstām tāvacchatiḥ
pañcarātra ādi smṛtayaḥ hi viṣṇoḥ eva sakala jagat kāraṇatva ādikam abhidadhānāḥ dṛśyante

original: nanu viruddhayoḥ pramāṇayoḥ sāmye sati satpratipakṣatā syāt /
analyzed: nanu viruddhayoḥ pramāṇayoḥ sāmye sati sat pratipakṣa tā syāt
na ca evam prakṛte
pāśupata ādi smṛtīnām āpta praṇīta tvāt vispaṣṭa vādi tvena niravakāśa tvāt ca
pañcarātra ādi smṛtīnām tad abhāvāt iti atas āha yadi iti
aśeṣa jñāḥ aśeṣa vidaḥ iti āpta tva upalakṣaṇam
hari pūrvakāḥ hari manu prabhṛtayaḥ pañcarātra ādīnām api tat upeyam
na ca viśeṣa hetuḥ asti iti bhāvaḥ
upalakṣaṇam ca etat
vispaṣṭa vādi tvena nirarāna
vakāśa tvam ca draṣṭavyam
kim atas yadi evam iti atas āha mānam iti

original: ... mānaṃ hy ubhayatra samaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,1.6cd //
analyzed: mānam hi ubhayatra samam bhavet
hi śabdaḥ hetau

original: yasmādevaṃ tasmādubhayatra pūrvapakṣasiddhāntayormānaṃ smṛtidvayaṃ samaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: yasmāt evam tasmāt ubhayatra pūrvapakṣa siddhāntayoḥ mānam smṛti dvayam samam bhavet

original: tathā ca pāśupatādismṛtīnāṃ satpratipakṣatvaṃ sthitamiti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca pāśupata ādi smṛtīnām sat pratipakṣa tvam sthitam iti śeṣaḥ

original: nanu ye viruddhe pramāṇe na tayoḥ sāmyam /
analyzed: nanu ye viruddhe pramāṇe na tayoḥ sāmyam
śukti rajata jñānayoḥ tad abhāva darśanāt
ye ca same na tayoḥ virodhaḥ
paṭa śuklaḥ dīrghaḥ ca iti atra tad abhāvāt
tat katham pāśupata ādi smṛteḥ sat pratipakṣa tva sambhavaḥ
sambhave pi jitam pareṇa
siddhānta nirṇayasya ayogāt iti atas āha mānam iti

original: ubhayatra dvayossmaraṇayormadhye yatsamaṃ saha mayā mūlapramāṇena vartate,
analyzed: ubhayatra dvayoḥ smaraṇayoḥ madhye yat samam saha mayā mūlapramāṇena vartate
tat eva mānam anyat apramāṇam
etat uktam bhavati
viśeṣa anirdhāraṇāyām eva sat pratipakṣa tvam
vastutas tu sa mūlam mānam anyat amānam iti
nanu samūla tvena prāmāṇya avadhāraṇe prāmāṇyasya paratas tva āpattiḥ
mā evam
paraspara virodhena aprāmāṇya śaṅkā prāptau samūla tvena tad apanayanāt

original: tathobhayatra smaraṇe yatpañcarātrādismaraṇaṃ samaṃ samūlapramāṇaṃ saṃvādipamāṇāntaropetaṃ ca,
analyzed: tathā ubhayatra smaraṇe yat pañcarātra ādi smaraṇam samam sa mūla pramāṇam saṃvādi pamāṇa antara upetam ca
tat eva mānam bhavet na tu pāśupata ādikam
mūla ādi abhāvāt
atas na ukta doṣaḥ iti yojyam
vakṣyete hi śruti mūla tva tad saṃvādi tve ca pañcarātra ādīnām
nanu katham pāśupata ādi smṛtīnām nirmūla tvāt

original: yāvatā paśupatiprabhṛtīnāmāptistatra mūlamuditetyata āha- na ceti //
analyzed: yāvatā paśupati prabhṛtīnām āptiḥ tatra mūlam uditā iti atas āha na ca iti
na ca āpti niścayaḥ tatra śakyate vyabhicārataḥ
tatra śiva ādiṣu niścaya upāya abhāvāt iti śeṣaḥ
nanu uktam atra sarva gāḥ hi te iti
mā evam
nityam vṛddhi kṣaya upetam
ityādinā paramapuruṣāt itareṣām sārvajñya abhāvasya ukta tvāt
śruti ādīnām ca upacarita tvāt
nanu asti tāvat viṣṇoḥ anupacarita sārvajñyam
śiva ādīnām api upāya upeya viṣayam
kim gaṅgā vālukā kīṭa saṅkhaya a parijñānena
satyam
na tāvat tattva jñānam eva āptiḥ
vipralambhake tivyāptiḥ iti āha vyabhicarataḥ iti

original: athocyeta sarvajñānāṃ mohābhāvāttanmūlayo rāgadveṣayorabhāve vipralipsāpi nivartata ityāptiniścaya iti /
analyzed: atha ucyeta sarvajñānām moha abhāvāt tad mūlayoḥ rāga dveṣayoḥ abhāve vipralipsā api nivartate iti āpti niścayaḥ iti

original: kiṃ tatra sarve 'pi tīrthakarā āptā ityaṅgīkṛtyaivamanumīyate /
analyzed: kim tatra sarve tīrthakarāḥ āptāḥ iti aṅgīkṛtya evam anumīyate
uta sva sva abhimatam ekam eva
ādyam dūṣayati vyabhicārataḥ iti
pañcarātra ādi smṛti praṇetari nārāyaṇe asya aṅgīkārasya bhagna tvāt iti arthaḥ
a bhaṅge vā siddham
naḥ samīhitam
yat vā vyabhicāraḥ nyonya virodhaḥ
nahi paraspara viruddha vādinaḥ sarve pi āptāḥ iti aṅgīkartum ucitam
vastu vikalpa prasaṅgāt
dvitīyam parācaṣṭe vyabhicārataḥ iti
yasya tīrthakarasya āpta tvam na aṅgīkriyate
tatra eva sārvajñyasya vyabhicārāt iti arthaḥ

original: naca tatra sāvarjñyaṃ nāṅgīkriyata iti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca tatra sāvarjñyam na aṅgīkriyate iti yuktam
samāna nyāya tvāt
atha hetum viśiṃṣyāt tadā sandigdha asiddhayā ādikam
yat api uktam jñāna icchā prayatna sthāna karaṇa pāṭavāni tāvat upadeśa mātreṇa niścīyante iti
tat na
apaṭu karaṇānām api upadeśa darśanena vyabhicārāt iti āha vyabhicarataḥ iti
upadeśa viśeṣaṇe ca uktaḥ doṣaḥ
niścīyatām jñānam
tasya yāthārthyam tu kutas

original: abhyāsadaśāpanno 'yam artho 'syeti sāmānyaniścaye sati tatsiddhiriti netyāha- vyabhicārata iti //
analyzed: abhyāsa daśā āpannaḥ yam sāmānya niścaye sati tad siddhiḥ iti na iti āha vyabhicārataḥ iti
vyabhicāraḥ viprakarṣaḥ teṣām eva sannidhānam durlabham asmat ādīnām
dūre tadīya abhyāsa avadhāraṇam iti bhāvaḥ
vineya vacana paramparayā tad avadhāraṇam iti ced na
tīrthakara antare vyabhicārāt iti āha vyabhicārataḥ iti

original: tāsu tāsu smṛtiṣvabhiniviṣyāḥ sarve 'pi hi taṃ tamācāryaṃ tatra tatrārthe 'bhyāsavantamevācakṣate /
analyzed: tāsu tāsu smṛtiṣu abhiniviṣyāḥ sarve hi tam tam ācāryam tatra tatra arthe bhyāsavantam eva ācakṣate
na ca tadīyam jñānam yathārtham eva aṅgīkartum śakyam
tvad siddhānta virodhi tvāt
anyathā tvadīya siddhāntasya avāstava tva āpātāt iti āha vyabhicārataḥ iti
vyabhicāraḥ virodhaḥ
icchā api vipralipsā kutas nā iti vācyam
sva upakāra para apakāra rūpa hetu darśana abhāvāt iti ced tat kim smṛti praṇetāraḥ sarve na vipralambhakāḥ
addhā iti ced

original: asya niyamasya buddhādiṣu bhagnatvādityāha- vyabhicarata iti //
analyzed: asya niyamasya buddha ādiṣu bhagna tvāt iti āha vyabhicarataḥ iti
niyame ca sva vyāghātaḥ
yasya kasya api vipralambhaka tve
hetu darśana abhāvasya tatra eva vyabhicāraḥ

original: nahi tattatpuruṣaviśeṣānusaṃhitāste te prayojanaviśeṣāḥ piśitanayanairasmadādibhiravadhārayituṃ śakyanta ityāśayenāha- vyabhicārata iti //
analyzed: nahi tad tad puruṣa viśeṣa anusaṃhitāḥ te te prayojana viśeṣāḥ piśita nayanaiḥ asmat ādibhiḥ avadhārayitum śakyante iti āśayena āha vyabhicārataḥ iti
kena api pramāṇena hetu upalambha abhāvaḥ vipralambha hetuḥ iti ced na
sandigdha tvāt
prayojana abhāvaḥ vipralambha hetuḥ
prayojana abhāvaḥ ca para vañcanasya a puruṣa artha tvāt a tad sādhana tvāt ca niścīyate iti ced na
sampratipanna vipralambhakeṣu vyabhicārāt iti āha vyabhicārataḥ iti
a puruṣa artham api puruṣa artha tayā vibhramya vañcayati asau iti ced
kim tāvatā
prakṛtaḥ tu viveki tayā nā evam iti ced na
tīrthakara antare a vidyamānasya vivekasya asmin avadhāraṇa anupapatteḥ

original: atha viśvahitopadeśārthaṃ pravṛttyā vipralambhābhāvo 'numīyata iti cenna /
analyzed: atha viśva hita upadeśa artham pravṛttyā vipralambha abhāvaḥ numīyate iti ced na
buddha ādiṣu tad sāmyena vyabhicārāt iti āha vyabhicārataḥ iti
atha te na tathā
kintu ayogya jana vyāmohana artham iti ced
na tathā iti kutas niścitam
niścaya upāyasya itaratra api tulya tvāt
yat api uktam pramāṇa antara saṃvādāt moha vipralipsayoḥ nivṛttiḥ iti tat asat
pramāṇa antaram hi na tāvat pratyakṣam
atīndriya tvāt vipratipanna arthasya
anumānam ced vayabhicāraḥ buddha ādiṣu
ābhāsam eva tat madīyam tu anumānam evā iti ced na
yatas nivārayiṣyāmaḥ tava vacana

original: camatkāraṃ mā tvariṣṭhā ityāśayenāha- vyabhicārata iti //
analyzed: camatkāram mā tu ariṣṭhāḥ iti āśayena āha vyabhicārataḥ iti

original: athāgamaḥ sa kiṃ vedādiruta tadviruddhaṃ smṛtyantaramathavā svayūthyaracitaṃ granthāntaram /
analyzed: atha āgamaḥ sa kim veda ādiḥ uta tad viruddham smṛti antaram athavā sva yūthya racitam grantha antaram
na prathama dvitīyau
virodhi tvena saṃvāda asambhavāt iti āha vyabhicārataḥ iti
na api tṛtīyaḥ
buddha ādi praṇīta smṛtīnām api sva yūthya puruṣa antara vacana saṃvādi tvena vyabhicārāt iti āha vyabhicārataḥ iti
te sandigdha āpta bhāvāḥ iti ced na
prakṛteṣu api tad niścaya upāya abhāvāt
yat ca uktam pravṛtti sāmarthyāt vayā moha vipralipsayoḥ nirāsaḥ iti
tat ayuktam
pravṛtti sāmarthyam hi tatas ṛtham avabuddhaya pravṛttasya phala upalambhaḥ
na ca vipratipanna smṛti phalam svarga apavarga lakṣaṇam pratyakṣeṇa īkṣyate
indriyāṇām tādṛś ārtha aviṣaya tvāt iti āha vyabhicārataḥ iti
ābhimukhyena cāraḥ bhicāraḥ tad abhāvaḥ vyabhicāraḥ
na api anumānena
smṛti tva ādeḥ vyabhicāri tvāt
anyasya ca abhāvāt iti āha vyabhicārataḥ iti
atha āgamena
saḥ pi na tāvat sampratipannaḥ sti
na ca vipratipannena

original: tasya bauddhādiviṣaye 'pi vidyamānatvena vyabhicārādityāha- vyabhicārata iti // *5,53*
analyzed: tasya bauddha ādi viṣaye vidyamāna tvena vyabhicārāt iti āha vyabhicārataḥ iti
syāt etat
dvividhā khalu śiva ādi praṇītā smṛtiḥ
ekā tāvat adṛṣṭam phalam uddiśya pravṛttā
parā tu sampad ādikam dṛṣṭam
tatra dṛṣṭa arthāyāḥ pravṛtti sāmarthyam pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyate
tatas tad praṇetuḥ āpta tvam iti
tat na
tathā api vipratipanna smṛteḥ āpti mūla tve pramāṇa abhāvāt
tatas eva asyāḥ api tad siddhiḥ iti ced na
vyabhicārāt

original: na hyekatrāptena sarvatrāpi tathā bhāvyamiti niyamo 'sti /
analyzed: na hi ekatra āptena sarvatra api tathā bhāvyam iti niyamaḥ sti
tathā ca sati sarvāsām api smṛtīnām āpti mūla tā āpātāt
tatra api dṛṣṭa arthānām pravṛtti sāmarthya upalambhāt iti āha vyabhicārataḥ iti
aṅgīkṛtya ca idam uditam
dṛṣṭa arthānām api tāsām bahulam
vyabhicāraḥ dṛśyate
tathā ca katham tad dṛṣṭāntena itarāsām āpti mūla tā anumānam iti āha vyabhicārataḥ iti

original: kiñca phalavyabhicāratastadaṃśasyānāptimūlatvasthitau paśupatipraṇītatvādestatra vyabhicārataḥ kathamanumānaṃ syādityāha- vyabhicārata iti
analyzed: kiñca phala vyabhicārataḥ tad aṃśasya anāpti mūla tva sthitau paśupati praṇīta tva ādeḥ tatra vyabhicārataḥ katham anumānam syāt iti āha vyabhicārataḥ iti
tat evam pāśupata ādi smṛtīnām āpti mūla tva aniścayena nirmūlānām pañcarātra ādi smṛti virodhena aprāmāṇyam eva yuktam
tat anena etareṣām ca anupalabdheḥ
etena yogaḥ pratyuktaḥ
iti sūtra dvayam vyākhyātam bhavati
yat ca itareṣām mahat ahaṅkāra ādi tattvānām anupalabdheḥ ca sāṅkhaya smṛteḥ aprāmāṇyam iti vyākhyānam
tad pratyakṣa anupalabdheḥ vedānteṣu api vyabhicārataḥ sarvathā anupalabdheḥ asiddheḥ ukta tvāt ayuktam iti
nanu pañcarātra ādi smṛtayaḥ pi phalam vyabhicaranti
kvacid tad ukta anuṣṭhāne dṛṣṭa phala anupalambhāt
atas tāsām aprāmāṇyāt na tad virodhena pāśupata ādi smṛtīnām aprāmāṇyam
anyathā phala vyabhicārasya anaikāntika tvam iti atas āha na ca iti

original: nacāsyā vyabhicāre 'pi hīyate mānatā kvacit // MAnuv_2,1.7cd //
analyzed: na ca asyāḥ vyabhicāre hīyate māna tā kvacid
asyāḥ pañcarātra ādi smṛteḥ kvacid vayabhicāre pi iti sambandhaḥ
kutas na hīyate iti ced
kim adṛṣṭa arthāyāḥ prāmāṇya abhāvaḥ abhidhīyate
uta dṛṣṭa arthāyāḥ eva
na ādyaḥ

original: yataḥ phalavyabhicāre hetau kvacid dṛṣṭārthāyāṃ vartamāne asyā adṛṣṭārthāyāṃ phalavyabhicāre,
analyzed: yatas phala vyabhicāre hetau kvacid dṛṣṭa arthāyām vartamāne asyāḥ adṛṣṭa arthāyām phala vyabhicāre

original: tata evāprāmāṇye satyapyasyā adṛṣṭārthāyāstāvavanmānatā na hīyate /
analyzed: tatas eva aprāmāṇye sati api asyāḥ adṛṣṭārthāyāḥ tāva vat māna tā na hīyate
kāraṇa abhāvāt
tad virodhāt eva ca pāśupata ādīnām aprāmāṇyam uktam
dṛṣṭārthāyāḥ aprāmāṇya vacanam tu prakṛta anupayuktam iti abhisandhiḥ

original: atha dṛṣṭārthāyāḥ phalavyabhicāreṇāprāmāṇye sati tata evādṛṣṭārthā apyapramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti cenna /
analyzed: atha dṛṣṭārthāyāḥ phala vyabhicāreṇa aprāmāṇye sati tatas eva adṛṣṭa arthā api apramāṇam bhaviṣyati iti ced na

original: tata iti kiṃ tena hetunota tena dṛṣṭāntena /
analyzed: tatas iti kim tena hetunā uta tena dṛṣṭāntena
na ādyaḥ
kvacid vayabhicāreṇa
prāmāṇye pi asyāḥ māna tā hīyate iti na yuktam
vyāpti abhāvāt
na dvitīyaḥ
kvacid vayabhicāre prāmāṇye api
asyāḥ māna tā hīyate iti etat na yuktam
hetu abhāvāt
nārāyaṇa vākya tva ādeḥ vyabhicārāt
mā hi bhūt sakalam api nārāyaṇa vākyam apramāṇam

original: dṛṣṭārthāyāṃ phalavyabhicāre aprāmāṇye ca satyasyā api mānatā śaṅkāspadatvena hīyata iti ca na vācyam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭārthāyām phala vyabhicāre aprāmāṇye ca satyasyāḥ api māna tā śaṅkā āspada tvena hīyate iti ca na vācyam
atra hetum āha nirdoṣa iti
nirdoṣa vākya mūla tvāt na ca tad yukti mūla tā

original: nirdoṣavākyaṃ vedaḥ tadyuktiḥ samarthapravṛttijanakatvaṃ prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇasya yata iti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: nirdoṣa vākyam vedaḥ tad yuktiḥ samartha pravṛtti janaka tvam prāmāṇya avadhāraṇasya yatas iti śeṣaḥ
ayam abhisandhiḥ
kim idam dṛṣṭārthāyāḥ pañcarātra ādi smṛteḥ phala vyabhicāreṇa aprāmāṇya anumānam

original: tata evetarasyā apyaprāmāṇyaśaṅkanaṃ ca svātantryeṇa kriyate kiṃvā pratibandīgrahaṇam /
analyzed: tatas eva itarasyāḥ api aprāmāṇya śaṅkanam ca svātantryeṇa kriyate kiṃvā pratibandī grahaṇam
ādyam tu uttara adhikaraṇe nirākariṣyāmaḥ
na dvitīyaḥ
pratibandī grahaṇam hi prameya sādhye bhavati
na ca evam prakṛte

original: pareṇa khalu phalasaṃvādādinā pāśupatādismṛterāptimūlatvaprāmāṇyayoranumitayorasmābhistannyāyena phalavisaṃvādaṃ pradarśya doṣo 'bhihitaḥ /
analyzed: pareṇa khalu phala saṃvāda ādinā pāśupata ādi smṛteḥ āpti mūla tva prāmāṇyayoḥ anumitayoḥ asmābhiḥ tad nyāyena phala visaṃvādam pradarśya doṣaḥ bhihitaḥ
yadi nāma pañcarātra ādi smṛti prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam phala saṃvāda yuktyā āśāsyeta
syāt idam tadā pratibandī grahaṇam
na ca asmābhiḥ pañcarātra ādi prāmāṇya avadhāraṇasya tad yukti mūla tā upeyate

original: na caivaṃ tatprāmāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ nirmūlaṃ syāditi vācyam /
analyzed: na ca evam tad prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam nirmūlam syāt iti vācyam
bodhaka tvena svatas siddha tvāt
aprāmāṇya śaṅkā nivṛttiḥ kutas iti ced āpti mūla tvena iti uktam
tad avadhāraṇam nirmūlam iti ced na
śruti saṃvāda nibandhana tvāt iti

original: nanu śrutereva vaktṛguṇahīnāyā na prāmāṇyamityato nirdoṣavākyetyuktam /
analyzed: nanu śruteḥ eva vaktṛ guṇa hīnāyāḥ na prāmāṇyam iti atas nirdoṣa vākyā iti uktam

original: bodhakatvenaiva hi prāmāṇyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ tacca vākyatvācchaterubhayasammatam /
analyzed: bodhaka tvena eva hi prāmāṇyam vyavasthāpitam tat ca vākya tvāt śateḥ ubhaya sammatam
doṣaḥ tu tad apavādakaḥ

original: na cāpauruṣeye sa sambhavatīti niṣkampameva śrutiprāmāṇyamiti vakṣyāma ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: na ca apauruṣeye sa sambhavati iti niṣkampam eva śruti prāmāṇyam iti vakṣyāmaḥ iti arthaḥ
asyām daśāyām śruti virodhena api pāśupata ādi smṛtīnām aprāmāṇyam śakya sādhanam
yat api uktam itihāsa purāṇābhyām vedam samupabṛṃhayet

original: iti tattathā kintvaviruddhānāmevopāyatvaṃ na tu viruddhānām /
analyzed: iti tat tathā kintu aviruddhānām eva upāya tvam na tu viruddhānām
na ca evam itaretara āśraya tvam
śruti artha niścayasya smṛti saṃvāda eka nibandhana tva abhāvāt iti

original: nanu ca pañcarātrādismṛtīnāṃ prāmāṇyamaṅgīkurvāṇaiḥ sarvathā pravṛttisāmarthyamaṅgīkaraṇīyam /
analyzed: nanu ca pañcarātra ādi smṛtīnām prāmāṇyam aṅgīkurvāṇaiḥ sarvathā pravṛtti sāmarthyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam
vyabhicārasya ca kartṛ karaṇa ādi vaiguṇya nibandhana tvam abhyupeyam

original: anyathā phalavyabhicāri ca pramāṇaṃ ceti vyāghātāpātāt /
analyzed: anyathā phala vyabhicāri ca pramāṇam ca iti vyāghāta āpātāt
tathā ca phala saṃvādena api prāmāṇya ādi sādhanam suśakam evā iti kim ucyate

original: naca tadyuktimūlateti suhṛdbhāvena pṛcchantaṃ pratyāha- vedoktasyeti //
analyzed: na ca tad yukti mūla tā iti suhṛd bhāvena pṛcchantam pratyāha veda uktasya iti
veda uktasya adhikārasya durnirūpa tvataḥ sadā

original: niyamo vyabhicāro vā naiva jñātuṃ hi śakyate // MAnuv_2,1.8 //
analyzed: niyamaḥ vyabhicāraḥ vā nā eva jñātum hi śakyate

original: vaidikagranthopadiṣyānuṣṭhāne vedoktā niṣekādisaṃskārā evādhikāratāmāpadyanta iti vedoktasyetyuktam /
analyzed: vaidika grantha upadiṣya anuṣṭhāne veda uktāḥ niṣeka ādi saṃskārāḥ eva adhikāra tām āpadyante iti veda uktasya iti uktam
yat vā veda śabdena pañcarātra ādayaḥ pi gṛhyante
adhikārasya iti upalakṣaṇam
sādhana anuṣṭhānasya iti api draṣṭavyam
durnirūpa tvam asmat ādi apratyakṣa tvam

original: sadeti svabhāvata eva na tu deśādivyavadhānenetyarthaḥ /

niyamaḥ vyabhicāraḥ vā phalasya iti śeṣaḥ
hi śabdaḥ yasmāt iti arthe
tasmāt phala saṃvādena prāmāṇya ādi na anumīyate iti śeṣaḥ
etat uktam bhavati
pramitam khalu liṅgam anumiteḥ karaṇam
na sattā mātreṇa
atiprasaṅgāt
atra ca evam prayoktavyam
pañcarātra ādikam pramāṇam
samartha pravṛtti janaka tvāt sampratipanna vat iti
tasya ca ayam arthaḥ
etad vihita sādhana anuṣṭhānavadbhiḥ tad phalasya niyamena prāpteḥ iti
na ca etat liṅgam śakya avadhāraṇam
vyabhicārasya bahulam upalambhena niyamasya pratyetum aśakya tvāt
tad avadhāraṇe ca kākatālīya tāyāḥ śaṅkanāt
tatra etāvat vaktavyam
kāryam kāraṇa sāmagrī sampādyam na tu tad eka deśena
tathātve ti prasakteḥ

original: prakṛte cobhayakulaśuddhivaidikaniṣekādisaṃskārādyadhikārapūrvakaṃ viśuddhābhisandhyādimatā samyaganuṣṭhita karma asati pratibandhake,

sati ca īśvara icchā ādau hi sahakāriṇi

original: tathā ca yatra phalaṃ nopalabdhaṃ tatrādhikārādivaiguṇyamitaratra tu tatsādguṇyamityato niyamaniścaya iti /

para gatayoḥ adhikāra ādi bhāva abhāvayoḥ asmat ādibhiḥ avagantum aśakya tvāt

original: tathācāsya phalaniyama eva vyabhicārastu vaiguṇyanimitta iti vāstu /

original: kvacitphalopalambhastu kākatālīyo 'nyanimitta eveti vā bhavatviti sandeho na nivartate /

original: vedasaṃvādena tu prāmāṇye 'vadhārite śakyate phalavyabhicārasyānyā gatiḥ kalpayitum /

original: yathā ca pañcarātrādiprāmāṇyamabhilaṣatā phalavyabhicārasyādhikārādivaikalyanibandhanatā kalpyā tathāhamapi pāśupatādismṛtiṣu kalpayiṣyāmīti,

original: nanu kathamanyāgameṣvadhikāraḥ sādhanaṃ ca sulabhamuktamityato leśena daśaryati- anyāgameṣviti //

analyzed: nanu yathā adhikāra sādhanayoḥ saulabhyam uktam evam tad daurlabhyam api tatra eva uktam iti ced tarhi na kevalam phala saṃvādena pāśupata ādīnām aprāmāṇyam

original: kvacitsaṃvādastu kākatālīyo vā guḍajihvikānimitto vā bhaviṣyati /

original: // oṃ na vilakṣaṇatvādasya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt oṃ //

putra kāmeṣyayā ādi anuṣṭhāne pi kadācid putra janma ādi anupalabdheḥ

eka deśe ca aprāmāṇye tad nyāyena eka deśa antarasya api aprāmāṇya anumānam sulabham eva

vipralambhaka vākya vat
api ca āpta apraṇīta vākya tvāt unmatta vākya vat aprāmāṇyam vedasya anumeyam

original: yāsāṃ smṛtīnāṃ sarvathā pramāṇavirodho nāsti tāsāmeva pakṣīkaraṇānna kaściddoṣa ityāśayaḥ /

original: vedamūlatvena tu prāmāṇye siddhe na ko 'pi doṣa iti / *5,107*

na ca evam śāstra sāṅkaryam āśaṅkanīyam
viṣaya prayojana bhedāt

original: yadi ca śāstrāntarasādhyo 'pyartho bhavadīyaśāstrasya viṣayaḥ tarhi vyākaraṇādisādhyamanyadapi kasmānnocyata iti cenna /
analyzed: yadi ca śāstra antara sādhyaḥ api arthaḥ bhavadīya śāstrasya viṣayaḥ tarhi vyākaraṇa ādi sādhyam anyat api kasmāt nā ucyate iti ced na

original: sandigdhatādisadbhāve 'pi yadavacanaṃ taduktadiśā śiṣyaireva śakyajñānatvāditi yatkiñcidetat /

original: tenāpi hi smṛtirūpaḥ paratra pūrvadṛṣṭāvabhāso 'dhyāsa ityādīni lakṣaṇāni svaśāstre nibaddhāni /

original: tatraite doṣāstāni lakṣaṇāni kiṃ samāskandantyuta neti vaktavyam /

original: kiñcaivaṃ vadatā prāgbrahmasākṣātkārādbādhyamavyāvahārikaṃ brahmasākṣātkārabādhyaṃ vyāvahārikamiti matamapi parityaktaṃ syāt /

nahi ayam brahma sākṣātkāraḥ na api bādhaḥ

original: kiñcaivamasmadīyamapi lakṣaṇaṃ kuto na vyavahāraṃ nirvahet /

original: tadeva mānatvaṃ mānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ mālakṣaṇamiti yāvat yadyapi sāsnādimāngauritivadyathārthaṃ pramāṇamityukte 'pi bhavatyeva lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvapratītiḥ

original: tataśca pṛthaṅnirūpyamapi syāttanmā śaṅkīti yāthārthyameva mānatvaṃ na tu sāsnādimattvādgotvamiva tato 'tiriktamityuktam / *5,174*

original: atha manyeta svata eva vijñānānāṃ prāmāṇyagrahaḥ bādhena kvacidapodyate /

na ca brahma jñānasya bādhaḥ sambhavati
yathāśakti parīkṣāyām api tad adarśanāt
nirmūla śaṅkāyāḥ ca anudayāt
niravadhikasya nissākṣikasya bādhasya adarśanāt

tathā sati jñānavat śabdasya api kevala tva āpatteḥ
iti āśaṅkām sa upapattikam pariharati jñāna arthaḥ iti

original: jñānārthe jñeyatā mukhyā śabdārthe tadanantaram // MAnuv_2,1.22ab //

original: yasmājjñānārthe jñānaviṣaye jñeyatā mukhyā śabdārthe śabdaviṣaye tadanantaraṃ jñeyatāmukhyeti yāvat /

śabde tu amukhyam
tathāca na tasya kevala tva āpattiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: jñānārtheṣvaryatā mukhyeti prakṛtatvādvaktavye 'ryatāpi gatikarmasu vidyata iti gatāvativyāptistadavasthetyāśaṅkānirāsāya jñeyatetyaryatāvyākhyānaṃ  #

idam uktam bhavati

original: jñāna eva mukhyaṃ yāthārthyaṃ karaṇeṣvapi nirdhāraṇāyāṃ śabde mukhyam /

tat ete parama mukhya mukhye ekīkṛtya tat mukhyam jñāna śabdayoḥ iti uktam iti
yat vā tat mukhyam jñāna śabdayoḥ iti atra eva ayam arthaḥ vyākhyātavyaḥ
tathā hi
tat yāthārthye jñāne mukhyam karaṇeṣu tu amukhyam

original: karaṇeṣvapi kimekaprakāramanekaprakāraṃ veti jijñāsāyāṃ śabde mukhyaṃ pratyakṣānumānayoramukhyamityuktam /
analyzed: karaṇeṣu api kim eka prakāram aneka prakāram vā iti jijñāsāyām śabde mukhyam pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ amukhyam iti uktam
atra ca śabda śabdane vedam eva adhikurute bhagavān muniḥ
tad mukhya tā kathanasya eva mīmāṃsā upayogi tvāt
anyathā vyarthāyāḥ jijñāsāyāḥ tad parihārasya ca asaṅgati prasaṅgāt
yadi api jñāna śabda

original: śabdau dvandvanirdiṣyau tathāpi karaṇeṣvamukhyamityata āha- jñānārtha iti //
analyzed: śabdau dvandva nirdiṣyau tathā api karaṇeṣu amukhyam iti atas āha jñāna arthaḥ iti
śabdaḥ iti upalakṣaṇam
pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ api iti draṣṭavyam
vyākhyānam tu pūrvavat
śabdasya sva śabdena upādānam tu
pūrvatra jñāna sama kakṣa tayā pratītim vārayitum iti
jñāne mukhyam yāthārthyam karaṇeṣu amukhyam

tatra jñāna karaṇayoḥ yāthārthyasya mukhya tva amukhya tva upapādanāya tad viṣayayoḥ jñeya tāyāyām
mukhya amukhya tve hetutayā ukte
tad upapādana artham āha yathārtha iti
yathārtha jñāna janakāḥ yathārthāḥ yuktayaḥ smṛtāḥ
sa upaskarāṇi vākyāni bhavanti
tena jñānam sākṣāt yathārtham ityādau paṭhitavyam

original: jñānameva hi viṣayasya jñeyasya jñeyatāyāṃ sākṣādupādhirbhavati /
analyzed: jñānam eva hi viṣayasya jñeyasya jñeya tāyām sākṣāt upādhiḥ bhavati

atas tad viṣayasya eva
jñeya tvam mukhyam iti jñānasya eva mukhyatas yāthārthyam

original: yuktyādikaraṇāni tu viṣayasya jñeyatāyāmupādhibhūtaṃ jñānaṃ janayantīti tadviṣayasya jñeyatvamamukhyam /
analyzed: yukti ādi karaṇāni tu viṣayasya jñeya tāyām upādhi bhūtam jñānam janayanti iti tad viṣayasya jñeya tvam amukhyam

atra yathārtha jñāna janakāḥ yathārthāḥ
iti uktiḥ tu parama sādhyam api sūcayitum
yukteḥ amukhya tāyām ādi tvena grahaṇam triṣu api apakarṣa sūcana artham
āgama yuktyoḥ utkarṣa apakarṣau tatra tatra samarthitau iti na iha uktam

original: kimato yadyevaṃ jñānasya yāthārthyaṃ mukhyaṃ pratyakṣādikaraṇānāṃ cāmukhyamityata āha- anupramāṇamiti //

original: athavākṣayuktavacāṃsīti dvandvanirdiṣyānāmapi buddhayā vivekena pratyekamanupramāṇamiti sambandhaḥ /

na tṛtīyaḥ
ādye pi āpatteḥ
na caturthaḥ
tṛṇa ādi darśane
heya daśa rne ca prasaṅgāt
nanu ca karaṇa viśeṣaḥ pramāṇam
kāraṇam ca sādhakatamam
na ca sādhya siddhau tad jātīyasya api sādhakatama tvam asti
chinne paraśoḥ iva iti ced
mā evam
nahi karaṇasya sādhakatama tvam sādhakatama antara apekṣayā
kintu pradhāna kriyā kāraka antara apekṣayā

original: anyathā yatra karaṇānāṃ samuccayastatra parasparāpekṣayānatiśayitatvādakaraṇatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: anyathā yatra karaṇānām samuccayaḥ tatra paraspara apekṣayā anatiśayita tvāt akaraṇa tvam syāt
chinne kuṭhārasya akaraṇa tvam tu phala anudayāt
na ca prakṛte tathā asti iti uktam iti
nanu anapekṣa tvam prāmāṇyasya vyāpakam
anyonya nirapekṣāḥ tu
dhārāvāhikāḥ buddhayaḥ
atas prāmāṇyam aśnuvate
na ca evam smṛti ādi iti apramāṇam eva iti ced na
asyāḥ api vyāpteḥ aprāmāṇika tvāt iti āha na iti
paricchedaḥ napekṣam jñānam
kiñca anapekṣa tvam sarvathā ced anitya pramāṇeṣu na asti
utpattau eva anumiti ādikam liṅga ādi apekṣam na artha paricchedaḥ iti ced na
jñāna vyatiriktasya artha paricchedasya eva abhāvāt
smṛti ādau api evam eva suvaca tvāt ca
samāna viṣayaka
jñāna anapekṣa tvam ced dharmiṇam ādāya anumiti ādau api tad abhāvaḥ
prakārataḥ pi smṛti ādau asti iti asiddhiḥ iti
ananubhava tvāt smṛtiḥ apramāṇam
anubhava tad sādhanayoḥ eva prāmāṇyāt iti etat api asat
pūrvavat vayāpteḥ asiddheḥ iti āha na iti
paricchedaḥ nubhavaḥ

original: evaṃ pramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇamabhidhāya tadviśeṣān lilakṣayiṣurādau pratyakṣasyoddiṣṭatvāttallakṣaṇamāha- nirdoṣeti //
analyzed: evam pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇam abhidhāya tad viśeṣān lilakṣayiṣuḥ ādau pratyakṣasya uddiṣṭa tvāt tad lakṣaṇam āha nirdoṣa iti

original: nirdoṣākṣodbhavaṃ hy atra pratyakṣamiti gīyate // MAnuv_2,1.27cd //
analyzed: nirdoṣa akṣa udbhavam hi atra pratyakṣam iti gīyate
atra pramāṇeṣu
loka vedayoḥ iti vā
nanu katham idam vijñāyate
kim nirdoṣaiḥ akṣaiḥ udbhavaḥ yasya iti
kiṃvā nirdoṣam ca tat akṣa udbhavam ca iti
na ādyaḥ
avyāpteḥ ativyāpteḥ ca
tathā hi
īśvara ādi pratyakṣam na akṣa udbhavam nitya tvāt
akṣa kāryam kriyā ādikam api pratyakṣam syāt
na dvitīyaḥ
dvayoḥ api viśeṣaṇa tvena samāsa anupapatteḥ
ukta avyāpti anistārāt ca iti
ucyate
astu tāvat ādyaḥ

original: ajñānaviparītajñānahetubhiḥ kācakāmalādidoṣai rahitāni yānyakṣāṇīndriyāṇi tairudbhavo yasyeti /
analyzed: ajñāna viparīta jñāna hetubhiḥ kāca kāmalā ādi doṣaiḥ rahitāni yāni akṣāṇi indriyāṇi taiḥ udbhavaḥ yasya iti
na ca avyāptiḥ
udbhava śabdasya utpatti abhivyakti anyatara athar tvāt
yathā uktam sarvam akṣa ātmakam matam iti
na api ativyāptiḥ
jñānasya prakaraṇa prāpta tvāt
tathā api akṣa liṅgake numāne tivyāptiḥ iti ced na
tasya akṣa jñāna udbhava tvena akṣa mātra udbhava tva abhāvāt
nirdoṣa akṣa udbhavam api artha doṣāt ayathārtham utpadyate jñānam
yathā uktam
atidūrāt atisāmīpyāt indriya doṣāt manaḥ nava sthānāt
saukṣmya ādi avadhānāt abhibhavāt samāna abhighātāt ca iti
tathā api nirdoṣa artha sannikṛṣṭa iti viśeṣaṇāt adoṣaḥ
atra jñāna grahaṇam sukha ādi vyāvṛtti artham iti kecid
tat asat
viṣaya sākṣātkārasya eva sukha ādi hetu tvāt
indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ tu
tad artham abhyarthyate

original: nanvevaṃ sati sarvārthasākṣātkāravataḥ parameśvarasya sukhādyutpādaprasaṅga iti cet /
analyzed: nanu evam sati sarva artha sākṣātkāravataḥ parameśvarasya sukha ādi utpāda prasaṅgaḥ iti ced
līlā vigraha grahaṇe tasya indriya artha sannikarṣavataḥ kutas na tad prasaṅgaḥ
atha na tāvanmātram sukha ādi kāraṇam
kinnāma dharma ādikam api
atas tad abhāvān na tasya sukha ādi utpādaḥ iti ced
tulyam
atas eva na yogiṣu api prasaṅgaḥ
tathā ca āhuḥ

original: “dehe śītoṣṇādisambandhāddhi śītoṣyādyanubhava ātmanaḥ tataśca sukhaduḥkhe'; iti /
analyzed: dehe śīta uṣṇa ādi sambandhāt hi śīta uṣi ādi anubhavaḥ ātmanaḥ tatas ca sukha duḥkhe iti
atra deha śabdena tad āśritāni indriyāṇi upalakṣyante
tat ayam lakṣaṇā tharḥ
nirdoṣa artha sannikṛṣṭa nirdoṣa indriya udbhavam jñānam pratyakṣam iti
yat vā nirdoṣa artha indriya sannikarṣa jam jñānam pratyakṣam iti eva arthaḥ
janya pratyakṣa viṣayam eva vā ta
etat vayākhyātam nam
iti na ukta doṣaḥ
anugata lakṣaṇa siddhaya rtham tu dvitīyam pakṣam parigṛhṇīmaḥ
nirdoṣam yathārtham akṣa udbhavam iti
akṣa udbhava śabdena ca
sākṣātkāraḥ lakṣyate iti na kaścid doṣaḥ

original: sākṣātkāratvaṃ ca jñānagata eva viśeṣo na karaṇopādhikaḥ /
analyzed: sākṣātkāra tvam ca jñāna gataḥ eva viśeṣaḥ na karaṇa upādhikaḥ
tat anena kevalam pratyakṣam lakṣitam
atra eva yatas tat iti pada dvaya adhyāhāreṇa yathārtha aparokṣa jñāna sādhanam iti anupramāṇa pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam api vyākhyeyam

original: tacca vivakṣābhedena nirdoṣārthendriyasannikarṣo vā nirdoṣārthasannikṛṣṭamaduṣyamindriyaṃ veti /
analyzed: tat ca vivakṣā bhedena nirdoṣa artha indriya sannikarṣaḥ vā nirdoṣa artha sannikṛṣṭam aduṣyam indriyam vā iti
nanu aduṣyam indriyam tvakṣam
iti vacanāt akṣa śabdaḥ eva aduṣyatām ācaṣṭe
tat kimartham nirdoṣā iti akṣa viśeṣaṇam
mā evam
indriyam tu akṣam tat ca aduṣyam iha vivakṣitam iti tad vayakhyānāt

original: nanvetallakṣaṇaṃ pratigatamakṣaṃ pratyakṣamityevaṃ śabdanirvacanādeva pratīyamānaṃ lakṣyātpratyakṣānna bhidyate /
analyzed: nanu etat lakṣaṇam pratigatam akṣam pratyakṣam iti evam śabda nirvacanāt eva pratīyamānam lakṣyāt pratyakṣāt na bhidyate
na ca ekasya eva lakṣya lakṣaṇa bhāvaḥ sambhavati

original: atra pratyakṣapadavācyatāyāḥ sādhyatvena vivakṣitatvādityāśayenoktam- iti gīyata iti //
analyzed: atra pratyakṣa pada vācya tāyāḥ sādhya tvena vivakṣita tvāt iti āśayena uktam iti gīyate iti
nanu nirdoṣa tā indriyāṇām kutas vagantavyā
jñāna yāthārthyāt iti ced
tat api kim karaṇa gatayā
nirdoṣa tayā jñātavyam
kiṃvā viruddha pramāṇa abhāvāt
na ādyaḥ
paraspara āśraya tā āpatteḥ
na dvitīyaḥ
a sañjāta virodhi vibhrame pi āpatteḥ
mā evam
jñāna yāthārthyasya sākṣi siddha tva aṅgīkārāt
parīkṣā apekṣāyām tu prabala virodhadhā
bhāvaḥ sācivyam ācarati

original: yathoktam“balavatpramāṇataścaiva jñeyā doṣā na cānyathā'; iti /
analyzed: yathā uktam balavat pramāṇataḥ ca eva jñeyāḥ doṣāḥ na ca anyathā iti
asañjāta virodhī tu vibhramaḥ evā iti kutas
deśa kāla puruṣa antara sambandhi viparīta pramā vaśāt iti ced
katham tarhi asañjāta virodhi tvam
evam tarhi sarvathā viparīta pramā bhāvaḥ ṅgīkṛtaḥ syāt
addhā
saḥ u pi taiḥ taiḥ parīkṣā viśeṣaiḥ niścīyate
nirmūlam tu na śaṅkayate
anyathā sarvatra anāśvāsena abhimatam api na siddhayet iti
nanu indriya artha sannikarṣasya pratyakṣa tve gagana nayana sannikarṣāt api jñānam utpadyatām
mā evam
artha śabdena tad tad indriya grahaṇa yogyasya eva vivakṣita tvāt
gagana ādau ca tad yogyatā bhāvasya kārya abhāvāt eva siddheḥ
etena cakṣuḥ ādinā gandha ādi grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ api apāstaḥ
atha matam
yadi āśritā yogyatā
kim antargaḍunā sannikarṣeṇa
tad tad indriya viṣayaḥ tena tena indriyeṇa gṛhyate
katham anyathā kāca abhra paṭala ādi antarita upalabdhiḥ syāt
sa antara grahaṇam ca prāpti pakṣe na sambhavati
prāpyakāriṣu tavak ādiṣu tad abhāvāt

original: kiñca nayanaṃ cetprāpyakāri tadā svasaṃyuktamātraṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
analyzed: kiñca nayanam ced prāpya kāri tadā sva saṃyukta mātram gṛhṇīyāt
kuṭhāra ādiṣu tathā darśanāt
pṛthutaram ca gṛhṇāti
diś viśeṣa sandehaḥ ca eva sati na syāt
prāptyā tad niścaya prāpteḥ
sannikṛṣṭa viprakṛṣṭayoḥ śākhā candramasoḥ yugapad grahaṇāt ca
nahi prāpyakāriṇī evam bhavitum arhati
api ca cakṣuḥ a prāpya artha prakāśakam ati āsanna a prakāśaka tvāt

original: vyatirekeṇa śrotrādivat cakṣurgatvā nārthena sambadhyate indriyatvāt sparśanādivat /
analyzed: vyatirekeṇa śrotra ādi vat cakṣuḥ gatvā na arthena sambadhyate indriya tvāt sparśana ādi vat
na ca arthasya āgamanam pratyakṣa virodhāt
tathā ca a prāpya prakāśaka tva siddhiḥ iti
atra ucyate

original: viṣayakaraṇayoryogyatāmātramupādāya sannikarṣāpākaraṇaṃ kiṃ sarvatrota nayana eveti vaktavyam /
analyzed: viṣaya karaṇayoḥ yogyatā mātram upādāya sannikarṣa apākaraṇam kim sarvatra uta nayane eva iti vaktavyam
na prathamaḥ
aprāptaiḥ eva kuṭhāra ādibhiḥ kāṣṭha ādau chid ādi udaya prasaṅgāt
ghrāṇa rasana sparśanaiḥ aprāptaiḥ eva gandha ādi avabodha udaya āpatteḥ ca
tathā ca yogyatā vat anvaya vyatireka siddhā prāptiḥ api kriyā utpāda upayoginī
na dvitīyaḥ
viśeṣa kāraṇa abhāvāt
yogyatāyāḥ prāpteḥ ca anupalambhāt iti ced na cakṣuṣaḥ pi karaṇa tva indriya tvābhyām prāpti upalambhāt

original: nanvatra kiṃ golakaṃ pakṣīkriyate uta tadatiriktaṃ cakṣuḥ /
analyzed: nanu atra kim golakam pakṣīkriyate uta tad atiriktam cakṣuḥ
ādye pramāṇa bādhaḥ
dvitīye tu āśraya asiddhiḥ iti ced na
tava api golaka pakṣīkāre siddha sādhanam
anyatra āśraya asiddhiḥ iti vaktum śakya tvāt

original: atha viśeṣaṃ vihāya rūpadarśanānumitaṃ karaṇamātraṃ pakṣīkriyata iti brūṣe /
analyzed: atha viśeṣam vihāya rūpa darśana anumitam karaṇa mātram pakṣīkriyate iti brūṣe
samam mama api
atas eva golaka atiriktam api tat setsyati
sannikarṣaḥ ca pratyāsatti mātram vivakṣitam
na saṃyoga ādiḥ iti na śabda ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ

original: kā ceyaṃ yogyatā yanmātrādasannikṛṣṭamapi cakṣuḥ prakāśayet /
analyzed: kā ca iyam yogyatā yad mātrāt asat nikṛṣṭam api cakṣuḥ prakāśayet
yadi rūpa viśeṣa ādi rūpā tadā atīta anāgatayoḥ api tad bhāvāt cākṣuṣa tā āpattiḥ
sannikarṣa artham khalu vartamāna tā abhyarthanam

original: sannikarṣasyānyathāsiddhau pratyabhijñāyāṃ tattāṃśasya cakṣuṣāvabhāsanāt sa cedanapekṣitaḥ,
analyzed: sannikarṣasya anyathā asiddhau pratyabhijñāyām tatta aṃśasya cakṣuṣā avabhāsanāt sa ced anapekṣitaḥ
kim tadā vatarmāna tayā
atha vartamāna tā api rūpa di vat yogya tā antargatā
tadā pratyabhijñā na
kuḍya ādi vyavahita pratīti prasaṅgaḥ ca

original: prāptipratibandhakaṃ hi kuḍyādivyavadhānamiti prāptyarthaṃ tadabhāvo 'nveṣaṇīyaḥ syāt /
analyzed: prāpti pratibandhakam hi kuḍya ādi vyavadhānam iti prāpti artham tad abhāvaḥ nveṣaṇīyaḥ syāt

original: sā yadi neṣyate tadā kuḍyādikaṃ kasyāpakuryāt /
analyzed: sā yadi na iṣyate tadā kuḍya ādikam kasya apakuryāt
āvaraṇa abhāvaḥ pi yogyatā iti ced na
kuḍya ḍyā apara bhāga avasthitena api agrahaṇa prasaṅgāt
atha nayana viṣayayoḥ madhye
dravya abhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti ced
sphaṭika ādi antarita anupalabdhri prasaṅgāt
asvaccha dravya abhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti ced
tathā api avyavahita dūra darśana āpattiḥ eva

original: atha kṣaṇabhaṅgapariṇāmāvāśritya tathābhūtasyotpādānutpādau eva yogyatāyogyate manyase,
analyzed: atha kṣaṇa bhaṅga pariṇāmau āśritya tathābhūtasya utpāda anutpādau eva yogyatā ayogyate manyase
tadā saḥ ṛthaḥ kadācid sarvaiḥ upalabhyeta kadācid na kena api
draṣṭṛ nibandhanaḥ pi tad bhedaḥ sti iti ced na
pramita sannikarṣa parityāgena apramita aneka kalpanasya anucita tvāt
kiñca asannikṛṣṭa pratītau ca āsanna sannikṛṣṭa viprakṛṣṭayoḥ vaiśadya avaiśadye na syātām

original: asmākaṃ tu nayanaraśmayaḥ samyagāsannena sannikṛṣṭante viprakṛṣṭena tvasamyak pradīparaśmaya iveti yukte pratītervaiśadyāvaiśadye /
analyzed: asmākam tu nayana raśmayaḥ samyak āsannena sannikṛṣṭante viprakṛṣṭena tu asamyak pradīpa raśmayaḥ iva iti yukte pratīteḥ vaiśadya avaiśadye

original: kācādyantaritopalabdhyā kimaprāpyaprakāśakatvaṃ kalpayāmaḥ kiṃvā kācādīnāṃ praptipratibandhakatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: kāca ādi antarita upalabdhyā kim aprāpya prakāśaka tvam kalpayāmaḥ kiṃvā kāca ādīnām prapti pratibandhaka tva abhāvāt
ādyaḥ pramāṇa viruddhaḥ neka atiprasaṅga parāhataḥ iti dvitīyaḥ eva āśrayaṇīyaḥ
tathātve kāca ādeḥ vyūha antara tā āpatti tteḥ iti ced
na jala anala vyatibhede pi ghaṭa ādeḥ tad abhāvāt
tatra api sūkṣmatara tad abhyupagame sā astu
sa antara grahaṇam api asannikṛṣṭasya grahaṇam ced asiddham
sāntare iti grahaṇam ced pradīpe na aikāntikam

original: yathā khalu dīpo raśmibhirarthasannikṛṣṭo 'pi svarūpāpekṣayā sāntara iti pratīyate tathā cakṣurapyadhiṣṭhānāpekṣayeti kimanupapannam /
analyzed: yathā khalu dīpaḥ raśmibhiḥ artha sannikṛṣṭaḥ sva rūpa apekṣayā sāntaraḥ iti pratīyate tathā cakṣuḥ api adhiṣṭhāna apekṣayā iti kim anupapannam
pṛthutara grahaṇam api nayana raśmīnām unmattaka kusuma vat pṛthu agra tayā upapatsyate
aprāptau tu alpasya api grahaṇam na syāt
prāptau diś viśeṣa sandehaḥ na syāt iti ced na
aprāptau sarvatra kalpayiṣyati
yugapad grahaṇa abhimānaḥ tu tejasaḥ śīghra gāmi tā nibandhanaḥ bhramaḥ eva
prāpteḥ pramāṇa siddha tvāt
aparaḥ āha
nayana raśmayaḥ śākhā candra saṃyuktaiḥ saura raśmibhiḥ ekībhūtāḥ yugapad śākhā candramasau grāhayanti iti
tat asat
sarva artha grahaṇa prasaṅgāt
adṛṣṭāt tad vayavasthā iti ced
na bāhya sādhana sākalye dṛṣṭa vaikalyena kārya anudayasya kvāpi adarśanāt
adṛṣṭa vaikalye hi bāhya sāmagrī vikalā syāt
anyathā sa manaska indriya sannikṛṣṭaḥ sphīta āloka madhyam adhyāsīnaḥ pi ghaṭaḥ kadācid nā upalabhyeta
a prāpya artha prakāśakam iti ca aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā
ati āsanna aprakāśaka tvam prāpya prakāśakeṣu ghrāṇa ādiṣu api vidyate
svagata gandha ādeḥ agrahaṇāt
parasya eva ati āsanna kāca ādya grahaṇam ayuktam
yogya tāyāḥ anapāyāt

original: gatvā nārthena sannikṛṣṭata ityatra kiṃ gatipratiṣedhaḥ sādhyaḥ,
analyzed: gatvā na arthena sannikṛṣṭataḥ iti atra kim gati pratiṣedhaḥ sādhyaḥ
kiṃvā
uta ubhaya pratiṣedhaḥ
na ādyaḥ
kāla atīta tvāt anaikāntyāt ca
na dvitīyaḥ
anaikāntika tvāt eva
atas eva na tṛtīyaḥ pi
viśiṣṭa niṣedhaḥ yam iti ced na
viśeṣaṇa abhāvena vā ityādi vikalpa dūṣaṇa anistārāt

original: sannikarṣārthaṃ gatimanna bhavatīti sādhyamiti cenna sparśanādāvanaikāntyāt /
analyzed: sannikarṣa artham gatimat na bhavati iti sādhyam iti ced na sparśana ādau anaikāntyāt
śīla jala sannikarṣa artham tvac indriya gataye hi śarīra parispandaḥ bhavati
atha ayam abhiprāyaḥ dhiṣṭhānāt bahis na gacchati iti
tadā indriya tve samāne pi ghrāṇa ādīnām ataijasānām anevambhāvaḥ
cakṣuṣaḥ tu taijase
sasya ittham bhūta tvā
tā iti aṅgīkāre bādhaka abhāvāt aprayojaka tvam
cākṣuṣa raśmīnām upalabdhi prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na
atīndriya tva upapatteḥ

original: mahattejojātīyamaindriyakamupalabdhamiti cet cākṣuṣamapyupalabdhamiti vāristhaṃ tathā syāt /
analyzed: mahat tejaḥ jātīyam aindriyakam upalabdham iti ced cākṣuṣam api upalabdham iti vāri stham tathā syāt
adṛṣṭa vaśāt anudbhūta rūpam tat iti ced
idam api anudbhūta rūpa sparśam kutas na kalpyate

original: yadi ca nayanaṃ nirgatyārthaṃ gṛhīyāttadā unmīlyanimīlane 'pi arthapratipattiḥ syāt /

original: vākṣamadhiṣṭhānātiriktaṃ syādadhiṣṭhānopaghātacikitse vyarthe syātāmiti tu pradīpena samānayogakṣemam /

api ca
chāyāyām upaviṣyasya api ātapa ālokane

original: tapāvalokanena nayanasyāśiśiratvamātapopaviṣyasyāpi śiśiradravyāvalokanena śiśiratvaṃ caitamevārthaṃ gamayataḥ /

iti pratyakṣa sāmānya lakṣaṇa nirūpaṇam

original: yadakṣaviśeṣaṇaṃ nirdoṣatvamuktaṃ tadvayavacchedyaṃ darśayitumakṣabhedaṃ tāvadāha- prākṛmiti //

original: prākṛtaṃ śuddhacaitanyamakṣaṃ tu dvividhaṃ matam // MAnuv_2,1.28ab //
analyzed: prākṛtam śuddha caitanyam akṣam tu dvividham matam
prakṛti śabdena ahaṅkāraḥ pañcabhūtāni ca ucyante
sūkṣma rūpeṇa nityam api ahaṅkāra bhūta aṃśaiḥ upacita tvāt prākṛtam

ca iti śabdau adhyāhāryau

dravya indriya bhāvye

original: vendriyabhedāddvividhamiti jalpatāṃ jainānāṃ ca mataṃ vyavacchinatti /

matam iti sva ukta arthasya pramita tvam āha

original: jaḍasya ca nityāhaṅkārikabhautikatvam“sūkṣmendriyāṇi santyeva syuḥ sthūlānyapyahaṅkṛteḥ /

original: ghrāṇaṃ pārthivaṃ rasāvyañjakatve sati gandhavyañjakatvāt kuṅkumagandhābhivyañjakaghṛtavat /

original: sparśanaṃ vāyavīyaṃ śabdāvyañjakatve sati spaśarvyañjakatvāt vyajanavātavaditi / *5,335*

atra pārthiva ādi tva
vatu ādi mātra sādhane siddha sādhana tvam

indriya tva avacchedena asiddheḥ

indriya tvena hetu viśeṣaṇe dṛṣṭāntānām sādhana vaikalyam

api ca
rasa vyañjaka tvam lavaṇa ādeḥ

indriya dvaividhyasya pramita tvam uktam
tat katham iti atas āha śuddham iti
śuddham īśa ramā mukteṣu anyatra prākṛtaiḥ yutam

anyatra saṃsāriṣu
prākṛtaiḥ akṣaiḥ yutam śuddham asti iti arthaḥ
ayam abhisandhiḥ

saṃsāriṣu ca akṣavat tā su prasiddhā

saṃsāre pi samyak jñāna niyama ādi āpatteḥ

original: atastatra prākṛtaṃ śuddhaṃ ceti dvividhamapyastīti svīkāryam /

paraiḥ īśa lakṣmyoḥ līlā vigraha grahaṇaṇā
m aṅgīkāribhiḥ tat akṣasya prākṛta tvam aṅgīkriyate

kim anyadā api indriya upapādana āyāsena iti īśaram eti

anyatra api nirdoṣa tā sadbhāvāt eva iti uktam

original: sarvatra prākṛte cākṣe nirdoṣatvaṃ sadoṣatvaṃ cobhayaṃ kālādibhedeneṣyate /

iṣyate prāmāṇikaiḥ iti

ukta anupapatteḥ

original: nanvevamapi dhūmenāgnijñānaṃ sarveṣāṃ syādityata uktaṃ smṛteti /

pramita tvasya upalakṣaṇam etat

tā smṛta vyāpteḥ tad avasthaḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti atas uktam smṛta iti

original: sya yo dhūmavānasāvagnimāniti vyāptismaraṇasyānantaramayaṃ cāgnivyāptadhūmavāniti pratisandhānātmakaṃ yaddhūmajñānaṃ tattṛtīyamanumānamiti

tat etat anyaḥ na manyate

original: tato vyāptismṛtau satyāṃ kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthaṃ tṛtīyaṃ jñānameṣyavyamiti /

sa sthūla dṛśvā iti ādyaḥ
na khalu sahakāri tā anupapatteḥ
kintu saṅkalite

original: naca tatsaṅkalitatvaṃ vinā tṛtīyajñānāditi kathaṃ tannaiṣyavyam /

original: yadā tu gṛhītavyāptervināpi liṅgadarśanādvacanādinaiva vyāptismṛtirāvirasti yadā dvitīyameva liṅgadarśanaṃ pratisandhānātmakamudeṣyatīti nāvaśyambhāvinīyaṃ  #

original: yathā khalu saṃskārasāhitye satīndriyasannikarṣādeva so 'yamiti pratyabhijñā jāyate tathe(thātrāpī)
analyzed: yathā khalu saṃskāra sāhitye sati indriya sannikarṣāt eva saḥ yam iti pratyabhijñā jāyate tathā itha atrāpī
ti aṅgīkāre na kaścid virodhaḥ iti
nanu vyāptiḥ eva kena pramāṇena grāhyā
yathāyatham pratyakṣa anumāna āgamaiḥ iti uktam
yathā ca etat tathā vakṣyāmaḥ
dvividham anumānam sva artham para artham ca iti
tatra yat para upadeśān upekṣya
vyāpti smṛtimat vayāpya darśanam tat svārtham
para upadeśa apekṣam tu para artham
sa sāmarthya liṅga pratīti janakam vākyam para upadeśaḥ
tat ca pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamanaiḥ pañcabhiḥ avayavaiḥ upetam iti eke
tam imam niyamam arocayamānaḥ āha uktā iti
uktā vyāptiḥ eva sā anumā
vyāpti uktiḥ eva para upadeśaḥ iti yāvat
eva śabdaḥ niyama nirākaraṇa paraḥ na punar pakṣa antara nivṛtti arthaḥ
pakṣa antarasya svayam eva vakṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: nanu yo dhūmavānso 'gnimāniti vyāptyuktiḥ kathaṃ pratyāyanāṅgam /

vādi prativādinoḥ anyonyasmin anāśvāsāt iti atas uktam smṛtā iti
tuśabdaḥ caśabda arthaḥ jijñāsitā iti samuccinoti
gṛhīta vyāpteḥ tad uktiḥ smaraṇa hetuḥ agṛhīta vyāpteḥ tu jijñāsā janikā iti ucyate
na tu āgama tayā upayujyate iti āśayaḥ
nanu ca vyāpti uktiḥ eva para upadeśaḥ iti ayuktam

original: prathamata eva vyāptyukterasaṅgatatvādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharan“uktā vyāptireva sā';

original: vyadhikaraṇo 'pi hi kṛttikāgata evodayo rohiṇyudayāsattiṃ gamayati /
analyzed: vyadhikaraṇaḥ pi hi kṛttikā gataḥ eva udayaḥ rohiṇī udaya āsattim gamayati

original: tatastāvadanena vaktavyaṃ yāvatā vyāptivivakṣitasthaladharmatopetatayā liṅgasyānusandhānaṃ syāt tadapyākāṅkṣākrameṇābhidhātavyamiti sthite,
analyzed: tatas tāvat anena vaktavyam yāvatā vyāpti vivakṣita sthala dharma tā upeta tayā liṅgasya anusandhānam syāt tat api ākāṅkṣā krameṇa abhidhātavyam iti sthite

original: nirāśrayasya pramāṇasyābhidhātumaśakyatvāt pramāṇajijñāsotthāpanāya viṣayopakṣeparūpaṃ parvato 'gnimāniti pratijñāvākyaṃ vaktavyam /
analyzed: nirāśrayasya pramāṇasya abhidhātum aśakya tvāt pramāṇa jijñāsā utthāpanāya viṣaya upakṣepa rūpam parvataḥ gnimān iti pratijñā vākyam vaktavyam
tatas kasmāt idam pramāṇāt pratipattavyam iti ākāṅkṣāyām para aṅga tā āpanna liṅga svarūpa mātra pratipādakam dhūmavat tvāt iti hetu vacanam
sāmarthya jijñāsāyām vyāpti pratipādanāyāḥ yaḥ dhūmavān asau agnimān iti udāharaṇa vākyam
pakṣa ādi vivakṣita sthala dharmatā pratipādana artham dhūmavān ca ayam iti upanayaḥ
tatas sarvasya buddhayā ārohāya ekavākya tām āpādayitum tasmāt agnimān eva iti nigamanam
atas eva pratijñā hetubhyām upanaya nigamanayoḥ gatārtha tām manyamānāḥ nirastāḥ bhavanti

original: petasya liṅgasya smaraṇānusandhānajijñāsājanakaṃ syāditi yadyucyate tanna /
analyzed: syāt iti yadi ucyate tat na

original: yato vyāptivacanenaiva tatsmaraṇādimatastasya hetvādinā prayojanaṃ nāstīti yojanā /
analyzed: yatas vyāpti vacanena eva tad smaraṇa ādimataḥ tasya hetu ādinā prayojanam nā asti iti yojanā
etat uktam bhavati

original: yadi hi hetvādikaṃ vākyatayā pratyāyakaṃ syāttadā samārthyacintopayujyate /
analyzed: yadi hi hetu ādikam vākya tayā pratyāyakam syāt tadā samārthya cintā upayujyate

original: yadā tu tatsmārakatvādinaivopayuktaṃ tadā saṃskārodbodhopayuktaṃ sādṛśyasambandhādikaṃ kimapyanve(pye)ṣyavyam /
analyzed: yadā tu tad smāraka tva ādinā evā upayuktam tadā saṃskāra udbodha upayuktam sādṛśya sambandha ādikam kim api anvepya iṣyavyam
tad vayāpti vacane pi samānam

original: yo dhūmavānasāvagnimānityabhihite khalvanumānamudrāvit atra dhūmavattvaṃ vyāpyamityavabudhyata eva /
analyzed: yaḥ dhūmavān asau agnimān iti abhihite khalu anumāna mudrā vid atra dhūmavat tvam vyāpyam iti avabudhyate eva
tatas tadīya pakṣa dharmatā ādi smṛti ādimān api katham na bhavet iti
yat vā para upadeśasya pañca avayava tā niyatim vadan praṣṭavyaḥ
kim etat pañca avayavam vākyam āgama tayā vyāpti pakṣa dharma toḥ mo
petasya liṅgasya pratyāyakam
uta smāraka ādi mātram
ādye tu syāt eva idam
vākyam pramāṇam kathañcid
na ca asau yujyate
vādi prata vādinoḥ itaretarasmin anāśvāsāt
āśvāse vā pratijñā mātreṇa artha siddhau hetu ādi abhidhāna vaiyarthyāt
dvitīye tu āha yadi iti

original: parepadeśaṃ vākyaṃ yadi smaraṇādimātrakāraṇamaṅgīkriyate tadātra vyāptivacane satyeva smarturvyāptivacanādeva smaraṇādyutpatteriti yāvat /
analyzed: vākyam yadi smaraṇa ādi mātra kāraṇam aṅgīkriyate tadā atra vyāpti vacane sati eva smartuḥ vyāpti vacanāt eva smaraṇa ādi utpatteḥ iti yāvat

original: atra vyāptivacanātirikte śabde prayojanaṃ nāstīti nāsāvavaśyaṃ vaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: atra vyāpti vacana atirikte śabde prayojanam na asti iti na asau avaśyam vaktavyaḥ
dṛśyate khalu loke pada eka deśāt itas pi padārtha smaraṇa ādikam
śāstre pi ca vākya eka deśa prayogaḥ

original: tatra vakturāptatvāvadhāraṇādanusaraṇaṃ prativādini tu tannāstīti cenmā bhūt /
analyzed: tatra vaktuḥ āpta tva avadhāraṇāt anusaraṇam prativādini tu tat na asti iti ced mā bhūt
na hi etat āgama tayā pratyāyakam iti aktam
anyathā sāṃvyāvahārikaḥ kevala vyatireki prayogaḥ na anusaraṇīyaḥ
vāstava prayoga parimāṇa anyathātvasya upapādita tvāt
prativādini api anusaraṇe nigrahasthāna udbhāvanam na syāt iti ced
laukika śāstrīya saṃvyavahāra atikrame tad avakāśāt
anyathā prakaraṇa ādi āpannasya a saṅkīrtanam api nigraha hetuḥ syāt

original: kiṃ prakaraṇādyāpannatayāyaṃ na vadatyutāpratipannatvādineti sandehasya prakṛte 'pi tulyatvāditi / *5,402*
analyzed: kim prakaraṇa ādi āpanna tayā ayam na vadati uta apratipanna tva ādinā iti sandehasya prakṛte pi tulya tvāt iti
aparaḥ āha
prameya avadhāraṇa artham hi pramāṇa upanyāsaḥ
na ca sā pramāṇa svarūpa mātra upadarśanena bhavati
kinnāma tad ābhāsa uddhāreṇa api
anyathā tad prāmāṇyasya eva anavasthānāt

original: tathāca pratijñāvākyena viṣayamupakṣipya tatra hetunā pramāṇasvarūpamupadarśya tasyodāharaṇavākyena viruddhānadhyavasitānaikāntikatvanirāsaḥ  #
analyzed: tathā ca pratijñā vākyena viṣayam upakṣipya tatra hetunā pramāṇa svarūpam upadarśya tasya udāharaṇa vākyena viruddha anadhyavasita anaikāntika tva nirāsaḥ
kriyate
upanayena asiddhiḥ apāsyate
nigamanena api hetu anuvādena tasmāt eva na anyasmāt iti siddhasādhana tā apakṣipyate
sādhya anuvādena tu

original: agnimāneva na tu niragnika iti bādhapratipakṣapratikṣepaḥ kriyate /
analyzed: agnimān eva na tu niragnikaḥ iti bādha pratipakṣa pratikṣepaḥ kriyate
tat evam vidhūta vivāda sādhya pratipattaye pañcāvayava vākyam āvaśyakam iti
tat ayuktam
evam vadatā hi
yāvatā vivāda avasānam tāvān para upadeśaḥ iti uktam syāt
tathā ca pañca avayavam vākyam para upadeśaḥ iti ayuktam
pañca avayava uktau api vivāda avasiteḥ abhāvāt
kintu ākathā parisamāpteḥ para upadeśaḥ iti vaktavyam iti āśayavān āha na iti
na pañca avayoktau ca vivāda avasitiḥ bhavet
nanu etat ayuktam
udāharaṇa ādi avayava trayeṇa ābhāsa uddhārasya kṛta tvāt
nirasta samasta ābhāsa pramāṇa upanyāse vivāda anavasāne sarvadā
thā api tad prasaṅgāt iti atas āha dṛṣṭānta iti

original: dṛṣṭāntādiṣu caivaṃ syāt sādhanaṃ punareva hi // MAnuv_2,1.34ab //
analyzed: dṛṣṭānta ādiṣu ca evam syāt sādhanam punar eva hi
dṛṣṭānta padena udāharaṇa artham upalakṣayati
ādi padena upanaya nigamana artha grahaṇam
viṣaya saptamīyam
evam yathā pratijñā atīta arthe
sādhanam vaktavyam iti śeṣaḥ
syāt eva iti sambandhaḥ
tuśabdaḥ yasmāt iti arthe
ayam arthaḥ
satyam uddhṛta ābhāsāt pramāṇāt prameya avadhāraṇam bhavati iti
kintu pañcabhiḥ api avayavaiḥ tādṛśa pramāṇa pratītiḥ eva na bhavati iti brūmaḥ
ābhāsa uddhāra para udāharaṇa ādi artha vipratipattau tad sādhanasya api vaktavya tvāt
na ca tatra vipratipattiḥ na kartavyā
nā api vāc mātreṇa tad nivṛttiḥ
pratijñā artha samāna yogakṣema tvāt
na ca udāharaṇa ādiṣu eva sarva śaṅkā uddhāra kāraṇam asti
anupalambhāt
pañca avayava prayogaḥ eva kathā pudraṇa āpātāt
atas prameya niṇarya avadhi tve numāna prayogasya na pañca avayava tva niyamaḥ yujyate
api tu katha parisamāpti avadhika tvam eva aṅgīkāryam iti
satyam niḥśeṣataḥ vivāda nivṛttiḥ na pañca avayava prayoge bhavati iti

original: tathāpyavāntarākāṅkṣānivartakatvena pañcāvayavamevāvāntaravākyaṃ parisamāpyata ityata āha- liṅgeti //
analyzed: tathā api avāntara ākāṅkṣā nivartaka tvena pañca avayavam eva avāntara vākyam parisamāpyate iti atas āha liṅga iti
liṅga uktau api ca evam syāt anumā avasitiḥ dhruvā
caḥ hetu arthe
anumā iti tad sambandhi vākyam upalakṣyate

original: evaṃ sati kimatra pramāṇamityavāntarākāṅkṣānivṛttihetau dhūmatvamiti liṅgoktau kṛtāyāmapi avāntaravākyaparyavasānamavaśyaṃ bhavatīti tanmātrameva  #
analyzed: evam sati kim atra pramāṇam iti avāntara ākāṅkṣā nivṛtti hetau dhūma tvam iti liṅga uktau kṛtāyām api avāntara vākya paryavasānam avaśyam bhavati iti tad mātram eva
vākyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam
na tu pañca avayava tva niyatiḥ iti

original: yaduktaṃ smaraṇādimātrahetutvena vākyasyopayogastacca vyāptivacanamātreṇa bhavatīti vyāptireva vaktavyeti tadayuktam /
analyzed: yat uktam smaraṇa ādi mātra hetu tvena vākyasya upayogaḥ tat ca vyāpti vacana mātreṇa bhavati iti vyāptiḥ eva vaktavyā iti tat ayuktam
tathā sati liṅga mātra vacanasya api prayoktavya tva āpātāt
sambhavati hi tasya api vyāpti pakṣa dharma tā smaraṇa ādi hetu tvam ite
ti ukta abhiprāyam a jānānasya codyam vā pariharati liṅga iti
yathā vyāpti uktau evam liṅga uktau api anumā avasitiḥ dhruvā syāt
iṣyā āpādanam etat iti arthaḥ
na ca evam sati vyāptiḥ eva iti avadhāraṇa anupapattiḥ
yena yena prakāreṇa vyāpti ādi smaraṇa ādikam bhavati
yaḥ ca sāṃvyāvahārikaḥ tam tam upādāya niyama nirākaraṇasya tatra iṣṭa tvāt iti abhisandhiḥ
etena pratijñā hetubhyām upanaya nigamanayoḥ gatārtha tā api samarthitā veditavyā iti
iti anumāna lakṣaṇa nirūpaṇam
nirdoṣa tām antarbhāvya yuktiḥ anumā iti aktam

original: doṣaparijñāna eva tadviyuktā yuktiḥ sujñānetyato yuktidoṣo nirūpaṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: doṣa parijñāne eva tad viyuktā yuktiḥ su jñānā iti atas yukti doṣaḥ nirūpaṇīyaḥ
dhūma ādeḥ agni ādi pramiti janaka tve pi

ti iti prādhānyāt prathamam tad uddeśaḥ

sākṣāt iti

ukta yukteḥ sāmarthyam
dūṣaṇam tu iti tuśabda sambandhaḥ
sākṣātu iti vā
yukteḥ yukti tva abhimatasya arthasya
sādhana abhimatasya arthasya sādhya abhimatena arthena sambhāvita pratītikasya api sādhya sādhana bhāvasya

original: bādhalakṣaṇamayogyatvaṃ virodha iti śiṣyairevohyatāmityāśayavānasaṅgatiṃ nirūpayati- pratijñāyāmiti //
analyzed: bādha lakṣaṇam ayogya tvam virodhaḥ iti śiṣyaiḥ eva uhyatām iti āśayavān asaṅgatim nirūpayati pratijñāyām iti
pratijñāyām asambandhaḥ yukteḥ uktā hi asaṅgatiḥ
pratijñā padena tad arthaḥ lakṣyate
viṣaya saptamīyam
asambandhaḥ tra ākāṅkṣā lakṣaṇa sambandha virahaḥ
atra api yukteḥ iti gauṇaḥ nirdeśaḥ
asambandhaḥ saṅgatiḥ iti paryāyau iti atas vyavahāra sādhya tā sūcanāya uktā iti uktam
virodha asaṅgati svarūpasya sphuṭa tvāt anyaiḥ upadarśita tvāt ca kim atra udāharaṇa upadarśanena iti hi śabdena āha

original: nanu kathaṃ dve evānumānadūṣaṇe paraparigaṇitānāmasiddhatvādīnāṃ bahūnāṃ sattvādityatasteṣāmatrāntarbhāvaṃ vibhāvayitu virodhavibhāgamāha-  #
analyzed: nanu katham dve eva anumāna dūṣaṇe para parigaṇitānām asiddha tva ādīnām bahūnām sattvāt iti atas teṣām atra antarbhāvam vibhāvayitu virodha vibhāgam āha
virodhaḥ pi iti
virodhaḥ pi tridhā eva syāt
sāmānya vibhāgena saha viśeṣa vibhāgasya samuccaye api śabdaḥ

original: asaṅgatirapyanekavidheti vā tridhaiva na tvekavidhaiva yenāsiddhayādīnāmantarbhāvo durghaṭaḥ syāt /
analyzed: asaṅgatiḥ api anekavidhā iti vā tridhā eva na tu ekavidhā eva yena asiddhayā ādīnām antarbhāvaḥ durghaṭaḥ syāt
yat vā yāvantaḥ numāna ābhāsāḥ para parigaṇitāḥ tāvat bheda tām nirākartu
vataryitum eva śabdaḥ
sarveṣām atra eva antarbhāvāt
traividhyam darśayati pratijñā artha iti

sādhya dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī pratijñā arthaḥ
tasya prati spardhi sadbhāvaḥ viruddha tā

original: yatrārthe liṅgapramitiḥ sādhyasiddhayupayoginī tatra tadabhāvo liṅgarāhityam /
analyzed: yatra arthe liṅga pramitiḥ sādhya siddhayupayoginī tatra tad abhāvaḥ liṅga rāhityam
vyāpteḥ abhāvaḥ vyāptiḥ
iti śabdaḥ dhyāhāryaḥ
sādhya sādhana bhāva sambandha yogyatā virahaḥ hi sādhya sādhana abhimatayoḥ tad bhāva asambhave bhavati

original: naca sādhanasya tadbhāve 'pi viruddhasya sādhyatā sambhavati /
analyzed: na ca sādhanasya tad bhāve viruddhasya sādhya tā sambhavati
niśita tve pi paraśoḥ ākāśasya chedya tā bhāvāt
nā api sādhyasya tathātva sambhave pi asamarthasya
sādhana tā upapadyate
chedya tve pi kāṣṭhasya kuṇṭha kuṭhārasya chedanaka tva abhāvāt
atas pratijñā artha viruddha tā ādīnām yuktam virodhi tvam
astu liṅga rāhitya avyāptyoḥ yukti doṣa tvam
pratijñā artha viruddha tā tu katham tad doṣaḥ
sādhya sambandhi tvāt iti ced na
sādhya abhimatasya tad bhāva asambhave sādhana abhimatasya aviṣaya vṛtti tvāt

original: nanvevaṃ sati siddhasādhanatāpi virodha eva syāt /

nahi siddhasya sādhya tā sambhavati
na ca astu iti vācyam
ukta prakāra traya anantarbhāvāt
siddha sādhakaḥ saṅgataḥ iti sva vacana virodhāt ca iti
mā evam
sati sākāṅkṣa tve nvaya ayogya tvam virodhaḥ

original: naca siddhasādhanasya sākāṅkṣatā astīti nāsau virodhe 'ntarbhavati /
analyzed: na ca siddha sādhanasya sākāṅkṣa tā asti iti na asau virodhe ntarbhavati

original: nanu cānyatra trividho virodha ityādinā liṅgarāhityāvyāptyorekatāmupādāya sādhyasya sādhanasya vānugamo dṛṣṭāntavirodhastṛtīyatayā parigṛhītaḥ
analyzed: nanu ca anyatra trividhaḥ virodhaḥ ityādinā liṅga rāhitya avyāptyoḥ ekatām upādāya sādhyasya sādhanasya vā anugamaḥ dṛṣṭānta virodhaḥ tṛtīya tayā parigṛhītaḥ
atra api sādhya sādhana vaikalyam dṛṣṭāntasya iti vakṣyati
tat katham etat
na ca atra api tad adhyāhāreṇa tathā eva vyākhyānam yuktam
dṛṣṭānta doṣasya anumāna doṣa tā anupapatteḥ
nahi dṛṣṭāntaḥ numānam
tathā api anumāna aṅga vyāpti dūṣaka tayā anumāna doṣa tvam astu
dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vaikalye sādhanasya sādhya parityāgāt
sādhana vaikalye tu vyāpteḥ anupadarśanāt iti ced na
tathā satya vyāptyā eva saṅgṛhīta tvena tṛtīya tva anupapatteḥ iti
ucyate

original: svārthānumāne hi dṛṣṭavyāptikasya liṅgasya vivakṣitasthale siddhimātreṇa sādhyapramitirutpadyata
analyzed: svārtha anumāne hi dṛṣṭa vyāptikasya liṅgasya vivakṣita sthale siddhi mātreṇa sādhya pramitiḥ utpadyata
iti tad paripanthinām doṣa tvam abhipretya pratijñā artha viruddha tā liṅga rāhitya avyāptīnām atra grahaṇam
para artha anumāne ipya

original: tvavyāptyaupayikasyāpi dṛṣṭāntadoṣasya tadāśrayatayā pratītatvena tathaivodbhavanīyatājñāpanāya tena saha trividhatvamanyatroktamiti na virodhaḥ
analyzed: tu avyāpti aupayikasya api dṛṣṭānta doṣasya tad āśraya tayā pratīta tvena tathā evā udbhavanīya tā jñāpanāya tena saha trividha tvam anyatra uktam iti na virodhaḥ
yat vā sādhya sādhana ubhaya āśraya hīna sādhya sādhana ubhaya vyāvṛtta āśraya hīnān aṣṭau dṛṣṭānta doṣān eke bhāṣante
tad nirāsāya dṛṣṭānta doṣasya pṛthak upādānam
tathā hi ubhaya vikalaḥ tāvat na parisaṅkhayeyaḥ
anyatara vaikalyena eva dṛṣṭānta
duṣyatā siddhau ādhikya prasaṅgāt
anyathā ekaika vikala parisaṅkhaya anā anupapatteḥ
katham tarhi anvaya vyatireki iti ced
na kathañcid iti uktam eva

original: sādhyādyavyāptistu dṛṣṭāntasya guṇa eva na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: sādhya ādi avyāptiḥ tu dṛṣṭāntasya guṇaḥ eva na doṣaḥ

original: sato hi satā vyāptiṃ pradarśayituṃ dṛṣṭānto 'nveṣyavyaḥ /
analyzed: sataḥ hi satā vyāptim pradarśayitum dṛṣṭāntaḥ nveṣyavyaḥ

original: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasyāyaṃ doṣa iti cetsa eva kimarthaḥ /
analyzed: vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntasya ayam doṣaḥ iti ced saḥ eva kimarthaḥ
vyatireka vyāpti bodhayā iti ced na
tasyāḥ sākṣāt anupayogāt

original: pāramparyeṇopayogo tu sādharmyadṛṣṭānta evāsāviti kiṃ pṛthagupādānena /
analyzed: tu sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva asau iti kim pṛthak upādānena
ubhaya avyāvṛttaḥ ca ādhikyāt nikya nirastaḥ
āśraya hīnaḥ tu āśraya asiddhi samāna yogakṣemaḥ iti dvau eva dṛṣṭānta doṣau
asārvatrikaḥ ca dṛṣṭānta doṣaḥ

original: nahi sarvatra dṛṣṭānta eva vyāptirupadarśanīyetyasti niyamaḥ /
analyzed: nahi sarvatra dṛṣṭānte eva vyāptiḥ upadarśanīyā iti asti niyamaḥ
ānumānika āgamika vyāpteḥ tad anapekṣaṇāt
syāt etat
pratijñā artha viruddha tayā hi kāla atīta prakaraṇasamau saṅgṛhītau
liṅga rāhityam iti asiddhiḥ
avyāptiḥ ca trividhā bhavati
sādhanasya sādhyena sambandha abhāvaḥ
sati api sambandhe tad abhāvena api sambandhaḥ
sādhya abhāva vyāpta pya tā ca iti
tat etat trayam krameṇa anadhyavasitā na aikāntika viruddha saṃjñām labhate
tathā ca para nirūpita prastārasya samasanam eva anena kṛtam syāt
na ca anena kim api prayojanam
anyathā puruṣa mati vaiśvarūpyeṇa prakriyā antarasya api sāvakāśa tvāt
na ca brahmatarka ādi tarka śāstram anusṛtya ittham vyutpādanam iti vācyam
prayojana abhāve ndha paramparā patteḥ iti
ucyate
asti prakriyā antara karaṇasya prayojanam
tathā hi
pratijñā artha viruddha tayā hi sva vākya virodhasya api saṅgraham vakṣyati
na ca kāla atīta tva ādinā sa labhyate
api ca vyavahāraḥ pi pratijñā artha viruddha tayā upapadyate
na kāla atīta tva ādinā
vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt
asādhakam idam kāla atīta tvāt
sat pratipakṣa tvāt iti asya prabala sama bala pramāṇa viruddha tvāt iti arthaḥ
na ca atra viśeṣaṇasya kim api prayojanam asti
hīna balasya pramāṇa padena eva nirasta tvāt

original: pramāṇatadābhāsāviveka eva hi pramāṇaśabdaprayogo na tvaprāmāṇyaniścaye /
analyzed: pramāṇa tad ābhāsa aviveke eva hi pramāṇa śabda prayogaḥ na tu aprāmāṇya niścaye

original: ahīnabalatayā vā viśeṣaṇe sambhavati tadavāntarabhedopādānaṃ niratharkameva /
analyzed: ahīna bala tayā vā viśeṣaṇe sambhavati tat avāntarabheda upādānam niratharkam eva
tathā ca ekam eva idam dūṣaṇam syāt

original: liṅgarāhityagrahaṇena cādūṣaṇānāmapi dūṣaṇatayā paraparigaṇitānāmāśrayavyadhikaraṇasādhyānyathāsiddhīnāṃ nirāso labhyate anyathāsiddherdūṣaṇatve  #
analyzed: liṅga rāhitya grahaṇena ca adūṣaṇānām api dūṣaṇa tayā para parigaṇitānām āśraya vyadhikaraṇa sādhya anyathāsiddhīnām nirāsaḥ labhyate anyathāsiddheḥ dūṣaṇa tve
pi prakāra antasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: anadhyavasitatvādibhedo 'pi kiṃ vyāptyabhāve sambhavatītyetāvatā parisaṅkhayeyo vyavahāropayogitvādvā /
analyzed: anadhyavasita tva ādi bhedaḥ pi kim vyāpti abhāve sambhavati iti etāvatā parisaṅkhayeyaḥ vyavahāra upayogi tvāt vā
na ādyaḥ
vyartha vyutpādanasya atiprasaṅgi tvāt
na dvitīyaḥ
vaiyarthya prasakteḥ

original: nedaṃ sādhakamanaikāntikatvādityasya hi sapakṣavṛttitve sati vipakṣavṛttitvādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: na idam sādhakam anaikāntika tvāt iti asya hi sapakṣa vṛtti tve sati vipakṣa vṛtti tvāt iti arthaḥ
na ca atra viśeṣaṇa vyavacchedyam kiñcid asti
evam viruddha tvāt ityasya sapakṣa avṛtti tve sati vipakṣa vṛtti tvāt iti arthaḥ
tathāca vaiyarthyam eva
sādhya viparyaya vyāpya tvāt iti atra api sambandha mātreṇa kṛtārtha tve vyāpti grahaṇam vyartham eva
evam avāntarabheda vyutpādanam api nirastam

original: śiṣyamativaiśadyāya vyutpādanaṃ tvanumatameveti na svīyavyavahāravirodha iti /
analyzed: śiṣya mati vaiśadyāya vyutpādanam tu anumatam eva iti na svīya vyavahāra virodhaḥ iti
virodha vat asaṅgateḥ api prabhedāḥ svayam eva ūhanīyāḥ
evam sākṣāt yukti doṣam abhidhāya vācanika doṣam āha nyūna iti
nyūna ādhikye tu vācike
nyūna śabdaḥ bhāva pradhānaḥ
yukteḥ dūṣaṇam iti prakṛtam anuvartate
avaśya vaktavya a paripūrtiḥ nyūna tvam
kṛta kārya tvam ādhikyam
vacana doṣāt tad pratipāditā yuktiḥ api duṣyā syāt iti etayoḥ vācanika tvam
nanu ayuktaḥ yam vibhāgaḥ
virodha asaṅgatyoḥ api vāci canika tvāt
nahi kṛtaka tvam svayam eva duṣyam
anitya tva sādhane pi tathātva āpatteḥ
kṛśānu śaitya ādau tathā iti ced

original: tatkiṃ kṛtakatvaṃ kṛśānuśaityaṃ vā śabdanityatvaṃ vā sādhayituṃ svayameva pravṛttam /
analyzed: tat kim kṛtaka tvam kṛśānu śaityam vā śabda nitya tvam vā sādhayitum svayam eva pravṛttam
yena tatra duṣyam syāt
kinnāma tat sādhanatayā śabdena pratipādi darśitam
evam asaṅgatau api siddhasādhanatā ādi lakṣaṇāyām vācyam iti āśaṅkā nirāsa artham tuśabdaḥ
nyūna ādhikye eva vācanike
na virodha asaṅgatī
svārtha anumāne pi darśanāt iti bhāvaḥ
santu tarhi pratipattṛ pratipādakayoḥ eva ete doṣāḥ

original: yathā niśātam kṛśānuśaityādau vyāpārayanpuruṣa evāparādhī syāt natu kṛtakatvādikamiti /
analyzed: yathā niśātam kṛśānu śaitya ādau vyāpārayan puruṣaḥ eva aparādhī syāt na tu kṛtaka tva ādikam iti
mā evam
kṛtaka tva ādeḥ aduṣṭa tve tad vayāpārayataḥ pi aparādha anupapatteḥ
anyathā śabda nitya tva sādhane prayuñjānā u pi aparādhyeta

original: tataḥ kṛśānuśaityādeḥ sādhyatānarhatvaṃ nityatvādisādhane kṛtakatvāderasamarthatvamityādirarthaśabdagata eva doṣo 'ṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: tatas kṛśānu śaitya ādeḥ sādhyatā anarhatvam nitya tva ādi sādhane kṛtaka tva ādeḥ asamartha tvam ityādiḥ artha śabda gataḥ eva doṣaḥ ṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ

original: na hyupādhimantarbhāvya bhavan doṣo na doṣo bhavati /
analyzed: na hi upādhim antarbhāvya bhavan doṣaḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati
tathā sati bahu viplava āpatteḥ iti
nanu katham ete eva anumāna doṣāḥ
sopādhika tvasya api atiriktasya sattvāt iti atas tad svarūpa anuvādena ukta antarbhāvam āha sādhya iti
sādhya vyāpaka vailomyam avyāptiḥ sādhanasya ca
sādhanasya yat sādhya vyāpaka vailomyam sā avyāptiḥ
caśabdāt sat pratipakṣa tā ca
sādhyasya adharma sādhana tva ādeḥ vyāpakaḥ yaḥ niṣiddha tva ādi dharmaḥ
yatra adharma sādhana tvam tatra niṣiddha tvam iti niyamāt

original: tena sādhanasya hiṃsātvādervailomyaṃ sādhyāpekṣayā vaiparītyamavyāptatvamiti yāvat /
analyzed: tena sādhanasya hiṃsā tva ādeḥ vailomyam sādhya apekṣayā vaiparītyam avyāpta tvam iti yāvat
yatra hiṃsā tvam tatra niṣiddha tvam iti niyama abhāvāt
vaidhahiṃsāyām sati api hiṃsā tve niṣiddha tva abhāvāt
tat anena sopādhika tvasya svarūpam uktam

original: sādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhanāvyāpako hi dharma upādhiḥ,
analyzed: sādhya vyāpaka tve sati sādhana avyāpakaḥ hi dharmaḥ upādhiḥ
tadvat tvam ca sādhanasya sādhya vyāpaka avyāpya tvam eva
etat prāk anumānāt vayāpti grahaṇa velāyām avyāptiḥ eva
sādhya vyāpakam parityajataḥ sādhya parityāga avaśyambhāvāt
nahi sādhyam a parityajan tat vayāpakam parityajati iti yujyate
sādhya parityāgaḥ ca avyāptiḥ eva
apare tu nirupādhikaḥ sambandhaḥ vyāptiḥ
sopādhika tve tu lakṣaṇa abhāvāt vayāpti abhāvaḥ iti ācakṣate
tat asat

original: vyāptijñānādhīnamupādhijñānaṃ tadadhīnaṃ ca nirupādhikatvajñānaṃ tadāyattaṃ vyāptijñānamiti cakrakaprasaṅgena tasya vyāptilakṣaṇatvānupapatteḥ
analyzed: vyāpti jñāna adhīnam upādhi jñānam tad adhīnam ca nirupādhika tva jñānam tad āyattam vyāpti jñānam iti cakraka prasaṅgena tasya vyāpti lakṣaṇa tva anupapatteḥ
tat kim sa apādhikasya api asti vyāptiḥ
mā evam
vyāpta tva anupādhika tvayoḥ sama niyame pi vyāpti bodha anaṅga tayā upādhi abhāvasya lakṣaṇa tva anupapatteḥ ukta tvāt
nanu evam ced katham sādhya sādhana vyavahāraḥ
āgāmi sambhāvanā apekṣayā iti brūmaḥ

original: vastutastu yo dharmo yadvayāpakāvyāptastasya tenāvyāptirityeva vaktavyam /

original: sādhanasya sādhyavyāpakaparityāgo hi pakṣādanyatra vā syātpakṣe vā /

na tāvat ādyaḥ

original: dvitīye tu sādhyavyāpakasya pakṣādvayāvṛttiḥ sādhyamapi vyāvartayatīti satpratipakṣataiva /
analyzed: dvitīye tu sādhya vyāpakasya pakṣāt vayāvṛttiḥ sādhyam api vyāvartayati iti satpratipakṣa tā eva

original: nahi yadabhāvo yatra dūṣaṇaṃ so 'pi tatra dūṣaṇamiti yukta virodhāditi parāstam /

atra brūmaḥ

sādhya padena avacchinna anavacchinna sādhyasya abhidhānāt
na ca tatra pratipakṣa asambhavaḥ
yad avacchinna sādhye yaḥ upādhiḥ tad vayāvṛtteḥ tad viśiṣṭa abhāve hetu tva upapatteḥ

original: yathā samavāyaḥ sambandhatve sati samavetatvena hīno 'kāryatvādākāśavat /
analyzed: yathā samavāyaḥ sambandha tve sati samaveta tvena hīnaḥ kārya tvāt ākāśa vat
vāyuḥ dravya tve sati spārśana tvena hīnaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt ākāśa vat iti
na ca atra sādhya viśeṣaṇa vaiyarthyam

original: śabdo na sparśavadviśeṣaguṇaḥ pratyakṣatve satyakāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvādityādāviva vyabhicāraparihārārthatvāt /
analyzed: śabdaḥ na sparśavat viśeṣa guṇaḥ pratyakṣa tve satya kāraṇa guṇa pūrvakatvāt ityādau iva vyabhicāra parihāra ārthatvāt
kvacid sādhya avacchedaka avacchinnasya upādhi abhāvasya hetu tvāt

original: yathā vāyuḥ spārśano na bhavati dravyatve satyacākṣuṣatvāditi /
analyzed: yathā vāyuḥ spārśanaḥ na bhavati dravya tve sati acākṣuṣa tvāt iti
vyatireka vyāptau tu uktam eva uttaram
sādhya sādhana padābhyām ca prakṛtayoḥ eva vivakṣita tvāt na kaścid kṣudra upadravaḥ

original: yo yatsādhyavyāpako yatsādhanāvyāpaka iti vāsyārtha iti sarvaṃ sustham / *5,467*

mā evam
pratijñā artha viruddha tā iti anena eva prabala pramāṇa viruddha tā lakṣaṇa kāla atīta tā
vat sama bala pramāṇa viruddha tāyāḥ sat pratipakṣa tāyāḥ api saṅgṛhīta tvāt
prati spardhi sadbhāva mātram hi pratijñā artha viruddha tā iti uktam

original: evaṃ tarhi durbalena virodho 'pi pratijñārthaviruddhatā syāt,
analyzed: evam tarhi durbalena syāt
ukta lakṣaṇa upeta tvāt iti atas āha durbalena iti

ayam arthaḥ

original: prakaraṇādivaśāddhi sāmānyaśabdā api viśeṣe vatarnta iti prasiddham /
analyzed: prakaraṇa ādi vaśāt hi sāmānya śabdāḥ api viśeṣe vatarnte iti prasiddham

original: yathā viśiṣṭasamaye puruṣamānayetyukte puruṣaviśeṣa evānīyate na tu yaḥ ko 'pi puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: yathā viśiṣṭa samaye puruṣam ānaya iti ukte puruṣa viśeṣaḥ eva ānīyate na tu yaḥ puruṣaḥ

na
kintu prabala sama bala pramāṇa viruddha tā eva iti
nanu evam ādhikya nirāse pi nā anumāna virodha traividhyam sambhavati

original: svavākyena virodhe 'pi naiva sādhakatāṃ vrajet // MAnuv_2,1.38ab //

original: kintu svavākyena virodhe 'pi pramāṇaṃ naiva sādhakatāṃ vrajet /

original: kinnāma tadanapekṣasya pratyakṣāderapi tathā cānyatropalabdhasāmarthyasyānumāne 'pi svātantryasiddhirityāśayavatā prastāvādanumānamiti vaktavye  #

bādha pratirodha rūpaḥ pramāṇa virodhaḥ tu na svatantra doṣaḥ

original: pramāṇavirodhe hi heturapakṣadharmo vā syāt anaikāntiko vā (syāt) /

jijñāsita dharmaṇaḥ dharmiṇaḥ pakṣa tvāt

sādhya dharma

na ca sapakṣa vipakṣau eva anvaya vyatireka gamya avinābhāva darśana viṣayau na pakṣaḥ iti sāmpratam

original: yadi hi pakṣaṃ vihāya bahirevāvinābhāvo 'vagamyate tadā bahirvyāptibalena pakṣadharmo 'pi heturna pakṣe sādhyaṃ sādhayet /

original: saṃvādānuktisaṃyuktā eta eva ca nigrahāḥ // MAnuv_2,1.38cd //

original: nanu ca pratijñāhānyādīnāṃ vaktṛdoṣāṇāṃ kathamarthavacanadoṣeṣu virodhāsaṅgatinyūnādhikyeṣvanupraveśa ityata uktam- saṃvādānuktisaṃyuktāṃ iti

original: tatrānumānasyaiva yadasādhāraṇaṃ virodhādi tatrānumānadoṣāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ praveśo 'bhihitaḥ /

original: tāśca kathā vādādibhedena tisraḥ trividhā ityarthaḥ /

original: tattvajñānāyogyānasataḥ prati sadbhiḥ svasiddhāntasādhane teṣāṃ tattvajñānotpādaprasaṅgāt /

analyzed: yatas vidyayā ucca tvena nirṇīta tvam eva jayaḥ nīca tvena nirṇīta tvam ca parājayaḥ iti arthaḥ
iti vidyā parīkṣaṇam vādena iti vakṣyamāṇena anvayaḥ
evam upayuktam abhidhāya vyatirekam āha vinā eva iti
vinā eva tattva nirṇītim nahi jalpa ādinā kvacid
ucca nīca tva vijñānam iti vidyā parīkṣaṇam
nirṇīyate naya iti nirṇītiḥ tattvasya nirṇītiḥ tattva nirṇītiḥ vādaḥ iti yāvat

original: tattvanirṇītiṃ vinoccanīcatvavijñānaṃ na hītyevokte vinā vādeneti vakṣyamāṇavirodhaḥ syāt /

original: tathāpi taduddeśenāpravṛttestādarthvasya prathamamaniścayānna tadarthaṃ jalpo dātuṃ śakyate / *5,500*

original: tau ca vāda eva sambhavato na jalpavitaṇḍayoḥ /

jalpa vitaṇḍā arthinoḥ vidyā parīkṣāyām vādena kṛtāyām kim kāryam

viṣama vidya tā avadhāraṇāyām kim vidheyam iti apekṣāyām āha tad siddhau iti

original: tena vādenaiva tasya nīcoccabhāvasya siddhau satyāmanyayorjalpavitaṇḍayorvyarthatā /

original: prāk parīkṣāto lokasaṃvādādinānyatarasya pratiyogyapekṣayā bahuvidyatvasiddhau tu vādo 'pi naiva dātavyaḥ /

original: tatphalaṃ tvanyata eva jātamiti kiṃ parīkṣayā kiṃ tadaṅgena vādeneti / *5,503*

original: vidyāparīkṣārthe vāde jayino 'rthādikamapi sabhāpatinā sampādanīyamiti bhāvaḥ /

original: naca phalāntaramasti yena punarjalpavitaṇḍārambhaḥ syādityata āha- tattvāprakāśa eveti // *5,506*

yadi api vidyā sāmya vaiṣamyayoḥ nirṇīti jayau syātām tathā api tāttvika kathā phala rūpau eva

original: kvacitsūkṣme prameye eteṣāṃ prāśnikānāṃ kāraṇāntaradvājñāne sati vādinorguṇadoṣanirṇayāya sabhyāśca pramāṇaṃ syuriti vakṣyamāṇenānvayaḥ /

tadā teṣu api ajñāna śaṅkayā anye varaṇīyāḥ
teṣu api evam iti atas āha eṣām ca iti
eṣām ca dūra gāḥ
pramāṇam nirṇayāya syuḥ

original: eṣāṃ sabhyānāṃ cājñāne sati dūragā deśāntarasthāḥ /
analyzed: eṣām sabhyānām ca ajñāne sati dūra gāḥ deśa antara sthāḥ
na ca evam sabhya saṃvaraṇam api anarthakam
tatas param prāyeṇa ajñāna śaṅkā anudayāt
laukikaḥ ca ayam arthaḥ iti
dūragān nirṇāyaka tva sambhavāya viśinaṣṭi pakṣa iti

eka deśa utkīrtanena yathoktam sabhya ādi lakṣaṇam atidiśati
a prakāśya sva siddhāntam iti vitaṇḍā lakṣaṇam uktam
tat katham vāda jalpābhyām vyāvartakam iti atas āha ubhābhyām iti

original: ubhābhyāṃ sādhanaṃ caiva dūṣaṇaṃ vādajalpayoḥ // MAnuv_2,1.51ab //

na tu prativādinaḥ parapakṣa dūṣaṇa mātreṇa kṛtārtha tā iti

original: idānīṃ tu vitaṇḍāyā lakṣaṇadvayaṃ vivakṣustāvadupayuktamāha- ubhābhyāmiti //
