analyzed: smṛtiḥ kena nimittena apodyate pramāṇāt bahis kriyate na kena api iti arthaḥ
tathā hi
kim ayathārtha tvāt
yāthārthye pi ananubhūti tvāt vā aprāmāṇye bādhaka abhāvāt vā prāmāṇye sādhaka abhāvāt bādhaka sadbhāvāt vā
ādyam dūṣayati kena iti
smṛtiḥ kena prabalena pramāṇena apodyate bādhyate
yena yathārthā na syāt
bādhaka abhāvāt na ayathārtha tvam vācyam iti
dvitīyam nirākaroti kena iti
kim anubhūti tvam pramāṇa lakṣaṇam iti kṛtvā ananubhūti tvāt smṛtiḥ apramāṇam iti ucyate kim vā ghaṭa ādi dṛṣṭānta avaṣṭambhena
tathā ca kena smṛtiḥ apodyate
dvitīye pi smṛtiḥ eva kena apodyate
asmṛti tvena anubhūtiḥ kutas nā apodyate viśeṣa abhāvāt iti
tṛtīyam apākaroti pūrvā iti

original: pūrvānubhūte kiṃ mānamityukte syāt kimuttaram // MAnuv_2,1.58cd //
analyzed: pūrva anubhūte kim mānam iti ukte syāt kim uttaram

original: yadi smṛtirapramāṇaṃ syāttadā pūrvānubhūte kiṃ mānamiti praśno niruttaraḥ syāt /
analyzed: yadi smṛtiḥ apramāṇam syāt tadā pūrva anubhūte kim mānam iti praśnaḥ niruttaraḥ syāt
smṛti vyatiriktasya
tad pramāṇasya abhāvāt
tathā ca sākṣi ādi lokavyavahāraḥ lupyeta
smṛtiḥ eva pramāṇam kintu liṅgatayā iti ced na
tathā anubhava abhāvāt
anyathā sākṣātkāreṇa kāryeṇa karma kāraka tayā
numānam iti api syāt
caturtham pratyāha pūrvā iti
smṛtiḥ iti eva hi vaktavyam
vacanāt ca anubhavaḥ numīyate iti lokavyavahāraḥ eva atra pramāṇam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu yadi smṛtiḥ pramā syāttadā tatkāraṇasya saṃskārasyānupramāṇatvaṃ prasajyeta /
analyzed: nanu yadi smṛtiḥ pramā syāt tadā tad kāraṇasya saṃskārasya anupramāṇa tvam prasajyeta
tathā ca anupramāṇa tri tvam bhajyeta
na hi saṃskāraḥ pratyakṣa ādiṣu antarbhavati
an indriya sannikarṣa tvāt ajñāta karaṇa tvāt ca iti pañcamam apākaroti mānasam iti
mānasam tat hi vijñānam

original: hi yasmāttatsmaraṇaṃ mānasaṃ manaḥpratyakṣajaṃ na saṃskārakaraṇakaṃ tato noktadoṣa iti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: hi yasmāt tat smaraṇam mānasam manaḥ pratyakṣa jam na saṃskāra karaṇakam tatas na ukta doṣaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
a sākṣātkāra rūpa tvāt na pratyakṣa phala tvam iti atas uktam vijñānam iti
sākṣātkāraḥ iti arthaḥ

original: smaraṇasya mānasatvaṃ sākṣātkāratvaṃ ca kuta ityata āha- tacceti //
analyzed: smaraṇasya mānasa tvam sākṣātkāra tvam ca kutas iti atas āha tat ca iti
tat ca sākṣi pramāṇakam
tat iti mānasa tvam
caśabdāt sākṣātkāra tvam ca
yat vā dvayam api tad śabdena parāmṛśyate
prakṛta anusandhāna arthaḥ caśabdaḥ

original: nanvindriyāṇāṃ prāpyakāritvaniyamādatītena ca manasaḥ prāpterayogātkathaṃ smṛtermānasapratyakṣajatvamityata āha- atīteti //
analyzed: nanu indriyāṇām prāpyakāri tva niyamāt atītena ca manasaḥ prāpteḥ ayogāt katham smṛteḥ mānasa pratyakṣa ja tvam iti atas āha atīta iti
atīta anāgatam yadvat yogibhiḥ dṛśyate ñjasā
evam pūrva anubhūtam ca manasā eva avagamyate
santi tāvat yoginaḥ ṇima ādi siddhi sampannāḥ atīta anāgata darśinaḥ śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa prasiddhāḥ
śruti ādeḥ siddhārthe prāmāṇyasya sādhita tvāt
karma vidhi samāna yogakṣema tvāt ca yoga vidhīnām
na ca tat jñānam asākṣātkāraḥ
śruti ādinā sākṣātkāra tva pratīteḥ

original: tathāhi śrutiḥ“apaśyamapyaye māyayā viśvakarmaṇyado jagannihitaṃ śubhracakṣuḥ'; iti /
analyzed: tathā hi śrutiḥ apaśyam apyaye māyayā viśvakarmaṇi adaḥ jagat nihitam śubhra cakṣuḥ iti
purāṇam ca nārāyaṇa prasādena ityādi
dadāmi te cakṣuḥ ityādi
tat idam uktam añjasā iti
sākṣāt iti arthaḥ

original: evañca yathā yogināmindriyeṇaivātītānāgatātharsākṣātkārastathātītamapi manasā smaryata iti ko doṣaḥ /
analyzed: evam ca yathā yoginām indriyeṇa eva atīta anāgata athar sākṣātkāraḥ tathā atītam api manasā smaryate iti kaḥ doṣaḥ

original: nanvindriyasyārthaprāptirnāma na saṃyogaḥ samavāyo veti niyamaḥ /
analyzed: nanu indriyasya artha prāptiḥ nāma na saṃyogaḥ samavāyaḥ vā iti niyamaḥ
kintu pratyāsatti mātram
asti ca tad yogi indriyāṇām
tad tad upadarśaka yoga ja dharma sahakṛta tva lakṣaṇam iti ced

original: evaṃ tarhi manaso 'pi pūrvānubhavajanitasaṃskārasācivyalakṣaṇāstyatītārthena pratyāsattirityāśayavatoktam- pūrvānubhūtaṃ ceti // *5,554*
analyzed: evam tarhi pūrva anubhava janita saṃskāra sācivya lakṣaṇā asti atīta arthena pratyāsattiḥ iti āśayavatā uktam pūrva anubhūtam ca iti
etat uktam bhavati

original: yadi prāptiḥ saṃyogādilakṣaṇā vivakṣitā tadā tadabhāvo 'naikāntikaḥ /
analyzed: yadi prāptiḥ saṃyoga ādi lakṣaṇā vivakṣitā tadā tad abhāvaḥ na aikāntikaḥ
pratyāsatti mātra vivakṣāyām tu asiddhiḥ iti
dṛṣṭānta kathanam tu pratyāsatti mātrasya sākṣātkāra hetutām sambhāvayitum

original: kāryadarśanavaśācceyaṃ kalpanāsau nātiprasaṅga iti darśayituṃ ca /
analyzed: kārya darśana vaśāt ca iyam kalpanā asau na atiprasaṅgaḥ iti darśayitum ca

original: etena mānasaṃ cetsmaraṇaṃ syānna saṃskārajaṃ tadānanubhūte 'pyu(vyu)
analyzed: etena mānasam ced smaraṇam syāt na saṃskāra jam tadā ananubhūte
tpadyeta iti parāstam
saṃskārasya sannikarṣa sthānīya tayā aṅgīkṛta tvāt
yat smṛteḥ mānasa tvam sākṣi siddham iti uktam tat abhinayena darśayati vijñātam iti
vijñātam manasā pūrvam mayā etat kṛtam iti api
sākṣāt anubhavāt siddham

original: etanmayā pūrvaṃ kṛtamityetanmayā manasā vijñātaṃ smṛtamapīti smaraṇasya mānasatvaṃ sākṣādanubhavātsākṣyanubhavena siddhamiti /
analyzed: etat mayā pūrvam kṛtam iti etat mayā manasā vijñātam smṛtam api iti smaraṇasya mānasa tvam sākṣāt anubhavāt sākṣi anubhavena siddham iti

original: yaduktaṃ paraiḥ pūrvānubhavāvacchinnārthagocarā smṛtistadyāthārthyādikamanuvidadhānā na svayaṃ yathārtheti,
analyzed: yat uktam paraiḥ pūrva anubhava avacchinna artha gocarā smṛtiḥ tad yāthārthya ādikam anuvidadhānā na svayam yathārthā iti
tat asat
anubhava vat śuddhārtha viṣaya tvasya api sākṣi siddha tvāt iti darśayitum mayā etat kṛtam iti api iti uktam

original: nanu manaso 'pratyakṣatvātkathaṃ smaraṇasya mānasatā sākṣipratyakṣagamyeti cenna /
analyzed: nanu manasaḥ pratyakṣa tvāt katham smaraṇasya mānasa tā sākṣi pratyakṣa gamyā iti ced na
tasya sākṣi vedya tāyāḥ vakṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: tathāpi kāryakāraṇabhāvo na pratyakṣa iti cedanvayavyatirekasacivasya sākṣiṇastatra prāmāṇyābhyupagamāt /
analyzed: tathā api kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na pratyakṣaḥ iti ced anvaya vyatireka sacivasya sākṣiṇaḥ tatra prāmāṇya abhyupagamāt
jñānam nitya anumeyam iti ced na
jñāta tāyāḥ nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt
sva prakāśam iti ced na
anātva tvāt ghaṭa vat
mānasa vedya tā tu nirasiṣyate iti āśayavān āha katham evā iti
katham eva hi apodyate
yāthārthyam eva ityādinā uktasya prakṛta upayogam āha evam iti
evam lakṣaṇake māna traye brahma ādi vastuṣu
pramāṇam vedaḥ eva ekaḥ

original: yasmānmānatrayamevaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ tasmādbrahmādivastuṣu veda eva pramāṇaṃ na yuktyādestatrāvakāśaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt māna trayam evaṃlakṣaṇakam tasmāt brahma ādi vastuṣu vedaḥ eva pramāṇam na yukti ādeḥ tatra avakāśaḥ
indriyam hi rūpa ādimati eva dravye pravatarte
na ca brahma ādikam tathā
anumānam ca vyāpti sāpekṣam
na ca veda nirapekṣasya tasya brahma ādau sañcāraḥ sti
upādhi pratipakṣayoḥ tu sarvatra sambhavena vyāpti aniścayāt
veda anusaraṇe tu sādhya avyāpaka tva bādhita viṣaya tvayoḥ āvaśyaka tvāt
pauruṣeya āgamaḥ tu paratantraḥ eva iti
tatas kim iti atas āha tad prāmāṇyam ca iti
tad prāmāṇyam ca sādhitam

original: ya(ta)smādvedaviṣaye na yukteravakāśastato virodho 'pi sa evokta ityupapannam /
analyzed: yatasmāt veda viṣaye na yukteḥ avakāśaḥ tatas saḥ eva uktaḥ iti upapannam
tathā ca vedasya pramāṇa virodha abhāvāt tad prāmāṇyam ca sādhitam
yat uktam prāk tasmāt veda prāmāṇyam iṣyate
iti tat siddham iti arthaḥ
iti śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām na vilakṣaṇa tva adhikaraṇam
atha śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām caturthaḥ bhāgaḥ abhimāni adhikaraṇam
om abhimāni vyapadeśaḥ tu viśeṣa anugatibhyām om
yukti antara virodham vedasya parihartum idam ārabhyate
syāt etat
yukti virodhāḥ kim pratyekam pariharaṇīyāḥ
uta upalakṣaṇayā
na ādyaḥ
nirasanīya yukti ābhāsa ānantyena śāstra aparyavasāna prasaṅgāt
sūtra tva vyāghātāt ca
dvitīye tu anārambhe eva asya adhikaraṇasya
nirantara atīta adhikaraṇena eva upalakṣaṇayā sakala yukti virodhānām parihṛta tvāt iti
mā evam
abhyadhika śaṅkā sadbhāvena tad upapatteḥ iti āśayavān pūrvapakṣam tāvat āha tathā api iti
abhimāni vyapadeśaḥ tu viśeṣa anugatibhyām
tathā api mṛd jala ādīnām buddhi vāc ādi vācakaḥ

original: dṛṣṭavyāptiviruddhatvāt tatra mānaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,1.62 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭa vyāpti viruddha tvāt tatra mānam katham bhavet
yadi api phala vyabhicāra ādi virodhaḥ vedasya parihṛtaḥ tathā api iti arthaḥ
mṛd jala ādīnām iti ādi padena tejaḥ prabhṛtīnām grahaṇam
buddhiḥ jñānam
vāc vaktṛ tvac
ādi grahaṇena śrotṛ tva ādikam
vedaḥ iti anuvartate

original: dṛṣṭā pramitā vyāptiryasyā yukteḥ sā tathoktā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭā pramitā vyāptiḥ yasyāḥ yukteḥ sā tathā uktā
vyāpti grahaṇam pakṣa dharma tāyāḥ api upalakṣaṇam
kvacid tad niyama anabhyupagamāt sva śabdena asaṅkīrtanam
tayā viruddha tvāt
tatra mṛd jala ādīnām buddhi vāc ādau
katham iti ākṣepe
pratipādya antaram tu na asti apratīteḥ iti śeṣaḥ
etat uktam bhavati
mṛdabravīt
āpaḥ bruvan
tat tejaḥ aikṣata
tāḥ āpaḥ aikṣanta
ṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ
viduṣaḥ nu prāṇāḥ
aham śreyasi vyūdire
āpaḥ vai akāmayanta
iti ādi vedaḥ tāvat na pramāṇam
yukti viruddha artha abhidhāyi tvāt
nīlam nabhaḥ itivat
mṛd jala ādīnām buddhi vāc ādimat tvam khalu asya arthaḥ
sa ca vimatā mṛd na vaktrī mṛd tvāt sampratipanna mṛd vat ityādi yukti viruddhaḥ
tathā ca veda vākya antare pi aprāmāṇyam anumāsyate
nanu na vilakṣaṇa tvāt
iti anena eva nyāyena ayam api virodhaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ
mā evam
tatra hi yathā ukta anuṣṭhāne pi phala vyabhicāraḥ ced hetuḥ tat āpātataḥ tāvat sandigdha viśeṣaṇa asiddhiḥ
kartṛ ādi vaiguṇyasya api sambhavāt

original: nityatvena vedaprāmāṇyasya sthitau tu viśeṣaṇāsiddhiniścaya eva /
analyzed: nitya tvena veda prāmāṇyasya sthitau tu viśeṣaṇa asiddhi niścayaḥ eva

original: phalavyabhicāramātrasya hetutve tu anaikāntikatvamityevaṃ vyāptipakṣadharmatāvirahavyutpādanena yuktivirodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ /
analyzed: phala vyabhicāra mātrasya hetu tve tu anaikāntika tvam iti evam vyāpti pakṣa dharma tā viraha vyutpādanena yukti virodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ
na ca asyāḥ yukteḥ vyāpti ādi aṅga vaikalyam sambaddham
prasiddha mṛd ādau tathā upalambhāt
na ca tatra api buddhayādi sadbhāvaḥ
kadāpi
na api sambaddham api vyabhicīrṇam
vyabhicāra anupalambhāt
na ca anupalambha māna vyabhicāram api sa upādhikam
upādheḥ anirūpaṇāt
buddhayādimattve ca mṛd ādīnām śarīra indriyavat tā api syāt
akaraṇaka kriyā darśanāt
na ca tat yuktam indriya ādīnām api vaktṛ tva ādi vat adarśanāt

original: tato 'nukūlatarkasanāthenopādhivyabhicārānupalambhasahakṛtena sahabhāgagrāhakeṇa pramāṇena siddhā mṛttvādīnāmavaktṛtvādinā vyāptiḥ /
analyzed: tatas nukūla tarka sanāthena upādhi vyabhicāra anupalambha sahakṛtena saha bhāga grāhakeṇa pramāṇena siddhā mṛd tva ādīnām avaktṛ tva ādinā vyāptiḥ
na ca mṛd ādiṣu mṛd ādi tvam mṛd tva ādikam
na asti iti yuktam
vyāghātāt
mṛd abravīt ityādi prayogāt ca
tatas pakṣa dharmatā api siddhā evā iti

original: nanu ca nityatayā vedasya prāmāṇye vyavasthite tadviruddhāyā yukterevāprāmāṇyamucitamiti /
analyzed: nanu ca nitya tayā vedasya prāmāṇye vyavasthite tad viruddhāyāḥ yukteḥ eva aprāmāṇyam ucitam iti
mā evam
vyāpti pakṣa dharma tā upetāyāḥ yukteḥ api niravakāśa tvāt
tatas ca sat pratipakṣa tayā niścāyaka tva abhāvena aprāmāṇyam vedasya
nanu prasiddha mṛd ādi pakṣīkāre siddha sādhana tā
pakṣa sapakṣa bheda abhāvaḥ ca
jaḍa tvasya hetu ukaraṇe tu asiddhiḥ syāt
tasmāt ādi kālīnam mṛd ādikam pakṣayitavyam
na ca tat pratyakṣa ādi siddham iti vedaḥ eva upajīvyaḥ
tathā ca dharmi grāhaka pramāṇa virodhāt aprāmāṇyam yukteḥ iti ced na
vyāpti ādimatyāḥ tad asambhavāt
ādi kālīna mṛd ādi sva rūpa para vākya antareṇa paridṛśyamāna kārya liṅgena dharmi graha upapatteḥ
etena vaidike rthe yukteḥ avakāśa abhāvāt na tad virodhaka tvam iti apāstam

original: tadevaṃ mṛdabravīdityādivedavākyānāṃ yuktiviruddhatvenāprāmāṇye vedatvāt“yato vā imāni (bhūtāni)
analyzed: tat evam mṛd abravīt ityādi veda vākyānām yukti viruddha tvena aprāmāṇye veda tva atyatas vai imāni bhūtāni
ityādi vākyānām api aprāmāṇyāt na veda samanvayena brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇatva siddhiḥ iti
siddhāntam āha tatas iti
tatas tad nāmakaḥ kaścid pumān anyaḥ bhavet iti
yukta yāgama avirodhena prāptam atra abhidhīyate

original: vedasya yukteśca niravakāśatvaṃ tata iti parāmṛśati /
analyzed: vedasya yukteḥ ca niravakāśa tvam tatas iti parāmṛśati
tad nāmakaḥ mṛd ādi nāmakaḥ kaścid iti asmat ādi atīndriya tvam abhipraiti
pumān cetanaḥ smat ādi vilakṣaṇaḥ ntardhāna ādi śaktimān bhavet

original: asyāṃ śrutau vaktṛtvādinā pratipādyata iti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: asyām śrutau vaktṛ tva ādinā pratipādyate iti śeṣaḥ
iti śabdasya prāptam iti anena anvayaḥ
prāptam pramitam
yukti āgama virodhena iti arthāpattim sūcayati
tatas ca ayam arthaḥ
na mṛd abravīt ityādi vākyānām yukti virodhena aprāmāṇyam vaktavyam
atra mṛd ādi śabdasya cetana viṣaya tvāt
tathāca tad pakṣīkāre hetoḥ asiddheḥ
śabda mātreṇa hetu tve atiprasaṅgāt
acetana mṛd ādi pakṣīkāre ca prakṛta avirodhāt
nanu katham cetaneṣu mṛd ādi śabda pravṛttiḥ
abhidhāna śaktyā iti brūmaḥ
mṛd ādi abhimāni tvāt
nanu ete bhimāninaḥ kim abhimata artha vyāpinaḥ tad eka deśa vṛttayaḥ vā
ādye api sa dehāḥ videhāḥ vā
ādye tad upalambha prasaṅgaḥ
dvitīye teṣām indriya abhāvena vaktṛ tva ādi anupapattau punar yukti virodha tādavasthyam
tṛtīye tad vaiyarthyam tad anadhiṣṭhita pradeśa vat pradeśa antara pravṛtti sambhavāt iti
mā evam
vyāpakānām sa dehānām api piśāca ādi vat antardhāna śakti yogāt adṛśya tva upapatteḥ
nanu evam sati kalpanā gauravam āpadyeta

original: keṣāñciccetanānāṃ mṛdādyabhimānitvaṃ tatastacchabdānāṃ teṣu vṛvirvyāpakatvaṃ sadehatvamantardhānaśaktistatparatā ca śruterityanekasya kalpyamānatvāt
analyzed: keṣāñcid cetanānām mṛd ādi abhimāni tvam tatas tad śabdānām teṣu vṛviḥ vyāpaka tvam sa deha tvam antardhāna śaktiḥ tatpara tā ca śruteḥ iti anekasya kalpyamāna tvāt
mā evam
arthāpattitaḥ sarvasya asya siddha tvāt
śrutiḥ hi mṛd ādīnām vaktṛ tva ādikam pratipādayati
yuktiḥ ca tad abhāvam
na ca vāstavaḥ virodhaḥ sambhavati
vastu vikalpa āpatteḥ
na ca ayam virodhaḥ vinā etad kalpanayā śāmyati
jaḍa svīkāre yukti virodhāt
anabhimāni svīkāre ca pṛthak śabda śaktau pramāṇa abhāvāt
avyāpaka tva ādi aṅgīkāre ca ukta anupapatteḥ
na ca śruti yuktyoḥ anyatara aprāmāṇyena api upapadyate etat iti vācyam
ukta rītyā dvayoḥ api niravakāśa tvāt
nahi pareṇa api vidveṣeṇa eva āgama a prāmāṇyam abhidhātum yuktam
kinnāma upapattim āśritya eva

original: tathāca kathaṃ vedaprāmāṇye 'pi na dīyate dṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca katham veda prāmāṇye na dīyate dṛṣṭiḥ
tat evam yukti āgama virodhena asya arthasya prāpta tvāt na kiñcid kalpanā gauravam iti
nanu etat utsūtritam katham ucyate iti atas āha atra iti
iti uktam etat sarvam atra abhimāni vyapadeśaḥ tu viśeṣa anugatibhyām iti
sūtre bhidhīyate iti arthaḥ
yat vā atra abhidhīyate iti siddhānta upakrama vākyam
tasya evam prāpte sūtrakṛtā samādhānam abhidhīyate iti arthaḥ
evam sūtram avatārya tatas ityādinā vyākhyātam iti
yat uktam tad nāmakaḥ iti mṛd ādi śabda vācya tvam devatāyāḥ tat anupapannam
ayogāt anuyogāt ca
mṛd ādi śabdāḥ khalu acetaneṣu eva rūḍhāḥ
na devatāyām
lakṣaṇa āśrayaṇena api śruti yukti virodha śāntiḥ bhaviṣyati
na api vacana vṛttim sūtrakṛt āha iti atas āha bāla rūḍhim iti
bāla rūḍhim vinā evā api vidvas rūḍhi samāśrayāt
tad tad nāmānaḥ eva ete tad tad vastu abhimāninaḥ
santi
ete pṛthivī varuṇa ādayaḥ tad tad nāmānaḥ eva santi

original: tāni tāni mṛdādīni nāmāni vācakāni yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
analyzed: tāni tāni mṛd ādīni nāmāni vācakāni yeṣām te tathā uktāḥ
na tu tāni lakṣakāṇi iti eva śabda arthaḥ
santi bhavanti
ayoga parihārāya uktam bāla iti
a vidvat rūḍhi abhāve pi vidvat rūḍhi sadbhāvāt
mṛd ādi śabdāḥ tāvat devatā viṣayāḥ iti arthāpatti siddham
mukhya asambhave eva ca jaghanya vṛttiḥ āśrayaṇīyā
na ca atra bādhakam asti iti vaidika prayogāt eva bādhaka abhāva sahitāt vidvat rūḍhiḥ avagamyate

original: yaccoktaṃ vacanavṛttyaṅgīkāraḥ prakṛtānupayogīti tatparihārāyoktaṃ tattanmṛdādivastvabhimānina iti /
analyzed: yat ca uktam vacana vṛtti aṅgīkāraḥ prakṛta anupayogī iti tad parihārāya uktam tat tat mṛd ādi vastu abhimāninaḥ iti
ayam arthaḥ

original: mṛdādiśabdānāṃ cetanaviṣayatāmātreṇa prakṛtavirodhaśāntāvapi vastusthitiṃ vijijñāpayiṣatā sūtrakāreṇa vyapadeśastviti tuśabdena mukhyavṛttiḥ  #
analyzed: mṛd ādi śabdānām cetana viṣaya tā mātreṇa prakṛta virodha śāntau api vastu sthitim vijijñāpayiṣatā sūtrakāreṇa vyapadeśaḥ tu iti tuśabdena mukhya vṛttiḥ
sūcitā
tatra upapatti jñāpanāya abhimānī iti ca uktam
anyathā cenana vyapadeśaḥ iti avakṣyat
abhimānī khalu abhimatasya sattā ādeḥ prayojakaḥ
tatas ca tad adhīna tvāt iti nyāyena saḥ eva tad mu
mukhya arthaḥ iti
tat etat asmābhiḥ sūtram vyākurvadbhiḥ abhihitam iti

original: nanvatra tannāmaka ityekavacanaṃ prakramya tattannāmāna iti bahuvacanaprayoge kinnimittam /
analyzed: nanu atra tad nāmakaḥ iti ekavacanam prakramya tad tad nāmānaḥ iti bahuvacana prayoge kinnimittam
tathā bhāṣye pi abhimāni devatā tatra vyapadiśyate
tāsām ca ityādi
ucyate
atra abhimāni vyapadeśaḥ iti abhimāni śabdaḥ hi ekavacana antaḥ samastaḥ
vyapadeśa śabdasya ekavacana anta tvāt
nahi bahūnām ekaḥ vyapadeśaḥ iti sambhavati
uttara sūtre ca ekavacanam eva
atas yathāsūtram prathamam vyākhyātam
atha idānīm prāpramā
ṇa saṃvādi ghaṭanāya jātau idam ekavacanam iti āśayavatā bahuvacanam prayuktam iti
abhimāninām prādeśika tva videha tvayoḥ vaiyarthya vaktṛ tva ādi anupapattī

original: vyāptānāṃ sadehatve 'nupalambhabādha ityetatparihārāya viśeṣānugatibhyāmiti sūtrakhaṇḍaṃ kaścidanya iti tātparyato vyākhyātam /
analyzed: vyāptānām sa deha tve nupalambha bādhaḥ iti etad parihārāya viśeṣa anugatibhyām iti sūtrakhaṇḍam kaścid anyaḥ iti tātparyataḥ vyākhyātam
tat prapañcayati teṣām iti
teṣām viśeṣeṇa śaktiḥ anyebhyaḥ ucyate
viśeṣeṇa atiśayena
anyebhyaḥ smat ādibhyaḥ
vyāptiḥ ca ucyate iti sambandhaḥ
dehavat tvasya api upalakṣaṇam etat
yadi api etat sarvam arthāpattyā eva labdham
anyathā virodha śānteḥ eva apayarvasānāt
tathā api ucyate iti pṛthivī ādi abhimāninyaḥ iti āgamam api atra saṃvādayati
dinam darśayati
yadi api atra ākāṅkṣā anusāreṇa vyāptim ādau uktvā śakti viśeṣaḥ nantaram abhidhātavyaḥ

original: tathāpyalpāctarasya pūrvanipātamanusṛtya pravṛttaṃ sūtramanugacchatā kramo bhagnaḥ / *6,24*
analyzed: tathā api alpa a c tarasya pūrva nipātam anusṛtya pravṛttam sūtram anugacchatā kramaḥ bhagnaḥ  /

original: nanu ca pṛthivyādyabhimāninya iti vākyaṃ kathamupādeyam 'ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāśca hi',
analyzed: nanu ca pṛthivī ādi abhimāninyaḥ iti vākyam katham upādeyam ātmani ca evam vicitrāḥ ca hi
utkrānti gati āgatīnām ityādi āgāmi sūtreṇa acintya śakteḥ sarvagata tvasya ca viruddha tvāt iti atas āha ukta anusāreṇa iti
vyāptiḥ ca ukta anusāreṇa
ātmani ca evam ityādi ukta anusāreṇa śaktiḥ vyāptiḥ ca ucyate iti anvayaḥ
syāt ayam virodhaḥ yadi śaktiḥ vyāptiḥ ca niravadhikā atrā ucyate
na ca evam
pramāṇa antara anusāreṇa antardhāna ādi śakteḥ abhimata artha vyāpteḥ ca pratipādya tā aṅgīkārāt iti
evam asmat ādi apekṣayā abhimāninām anupalambham aṅgīkṛtya tad bādhaḥ parihṛtaḥ
idānīm asiddhaḥ ca asau iti āha dṛśyante ca iti
dṛśyante ca adhikāribhiḥ
adhikāribhiḥ antarhita artha darśana samarthaiḥ yogibhiḥ
etat ca bhāṣyā udā
udāhṛta smṛti siddham
etena dṛśyate ca
iti sūtram vyākhyātam bhavati

original: ye tu mīmāṃsakaṃmanyā vigrahavatī devatāṃ na sahante te 'pyanenaiva nirastā bhavanti /
analyzed: ye tu mīmāṃsakaṃmanyāḥ vigrahavatī devatām na sahante te pi anena eva nirastāḥ bhavanti
arthāpattyā pratyakṣeṇa ca tad siddheḥ
samarthitam ca āgamānām siddhārthe prāmāṇyam

original: anupalambhaḥ anekatra yugapatsannidhānaṃ ca śaktiviśeṣādupapadyate piśācādivat /
analyzed: anupalambhaḥ anekatra yugapad sannidhānam ca śakti viśeṣāt upapadyate piśāca ādi vat
na ca piśāca ādayaḥ na santi
mantra auṣadha ādinā asmat ādibhiḥ api upalabhyamāna tvāt
arthakriyayā saṃvādena ca prāmāṇya upapatteḥ
vakṣyati ca sūtrakāraḥ udeva ādi vat

original: ityuktvā tatrāpi vipratipannaṃ prati“api lokaḥ'; iti /
analyzed: iti uktvā tatra api vipratipannam prati api lokaḥ iti
kiñca indra agni varuṇa ādi padam kasyacid vācakam pada tvāt go pada vat
na ca acetana mātre tad prayogaḥ sti

original: naca cetano muktaḥ pralīno vā tadvācyaḥ /
analyzed: na ca cetanaḥ muktaḥ pralīnaḥ vā tad vācyaḥ
jagat vayāpāra sambandhini api prayogāt
na ca asau vigraha vidhuraḥ sambhavati iti alam
nanu tathā api mṛd abravīt ityādi vedasya abodhaka tva lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam durnivāram
tathā hi
yadi api vākya tā āpannāni padāni vākya artham padārthānām anyonya saṃsarga viśeṣa rūpam apūrvam eva avagamayanti
tathā api padārthaiḥ vācya vācaka bhāva rūpa sambandha pratipatti lakṣaṇām vyutpattim apekṣante anvaya vyatirekābhyām tathā avadhāraṇāt
na ca mṛd ādi śabdānām pṛthivī ādiṣu devatāsu vyutpattiḥ sambhavati
sambandha jñāna
sya sambandhi jñāna sāpekṣa tvāt
pratisambandhi rūpāyāḥ ca devatāyāḥ pratyakṣeṇa duradhigama tvāt
liṅga abhāvena anumāna ayogāt
na ca śabdataḥ tad avagamaḥ
satyām vyutpattau śabdataḥ devatā āgamaḥ
sati ca tasmin vyutpattiḥ iti paraspara āśraya tvāt
naca śabda viśeṣasya agṛhīta saṅgatikasya eva bodhaka tvam
adṛṣṭa kalpanā prasaṅgāt
yadi api dṛśyate ca iti uktam
tathā api asmat ādīnām vyutpati anupapattiḥ eva
devatā darśanam tu ca
yoginām veda artha jñāna uttara bhāvanā janyam aṅgīkriyate iti na vyutpatti hetuḥ
lakṣaṇā api vācyārtha darśanam vinā anupapannā evā iti atas āha śāstra uktā iti
śāstra ukta vastunaḥ ca eva vyutpattiḥ śāstra liṅgataḥ
caśabdaḥ pyarthaḥ
evaśabdaḥ sāmarthyāt śāstra śabdena sambandhanīyaḥ
śāstra eka samadhigamya vastunaḥ iti
pratyakṣa ādi agamyāyāḥ api devatāyāḥ iti yāvat
vastunaḥ vyutpattiḥ ati mṛd ādi śabdasya tad sambandhi vācaka tva pratipattiḥ iti arthaḥ
yujyate iti śeṣaḥ
anena ca eva śabdasya sambandhaḥ
śāstra liṅgataḥ tad jñāna sambhavāt iti śeṣaḥ

original: yadvā śāstroktavastuno 'pi śāstraliṅgato 'dhigatisambhavāttatra śabdasya vyutpattiryujyata iti yojanā /
analyzed: yat vā śāstra ukta vastunaḥ śāstra liṅgataḥ dhi gati sambhavāt tatra śabdasya vyutpattiḥ yujyate iti yojanā
devatāyāḥ
iti vaktavye śāstra ukta vastunaḥ ca iti vacanam śaṅkā anuvāda rūpam
śāstram eva liṅgam śāstra liṅgam
mṛd abravīt ityādi śāstrāt eva upapatti virodha sahitāt mṛd ādi śabda vācyatayā eva devatā svarūpam avagamyate iti

original: yadvā śāstraṃ taistaiḥ praṇītaṃ tatsadbhāve liṅgam /

nahi vedāt anyat vākyam vaktāram antareṇa upapadyate

yat vā śāstram śāsanam
varṣaṇa ādi upalakṣaṇam etat

original: yathā khalu loke yathā mudgastathā mudgaparṇī,

original: kintu sarvatrāpi vedavākye pramitavyāptipakṣadharmatāvadyaktivirodhe satīdṛśa evānyathārthasvīkāreṇa virodhaparihāro nyāyaḥ prakāro draṣṭavya  #

iti
om asat iti ced na pratiṣedha mātra tvāt om

ha alpa vākyā iti

original: sati taddṛṣṭāntena brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvābhidhāyakasyāpi vedasya vedatvādaprāmāṇye
analyzed: sati tad dṛṣṭāntena brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇatva abhidhāyakasya api vedasya veda tvāt aprāmāṇye

original: siddhāntastu yuktivadvedasyāpyapauruṣeyatvena dṛḍhatvāt vāstavavirodhasyānupapatteḥ aviruddhātharkalpanopapatteḥ nāprāmāṇyamiti / *6,42*

original: iha punarvedavākyāntarasaṃvādena sudṛḍhayā yuktyā viruddhatvādbrahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvābhidhātrīṇāṃ
analyzed: iha punar veda vākya antara saṃvādena su dṛḍhayā yuktyā viruddha tvāt brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇatva abhidhātrīṇām

original: śrutīnāmeva tatra prāmāṇyānupapattau prathamādhyāyoktavastunirṇayo na bhavediti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: śrutīnām eva tatra prāmāṇya anupapattau prathama adhyāya ukta vastu nirṇayaḥ na bhavet iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
siddhāntaḥ tu
pūrvapakṣiṇā utprekṣitābhyaḥ śruti sahita yuktibhyaḥ pi prabalānām tad virodhi yuktīnām sadbhāvāt tad viruddhānām pūrvapakṣa śruti yuktīnām aprāmāṇyāt upapannataraḥ
prāk uktaḥ rthaḥ iti
atas pūrva uttarapakṣa nyāyayoḥ agata tvena yuktaḥ dhikaraṇa ārambhaḥ iti
etat ca anupadam eva udāharaṇena prapañcayiṣyāmaḥ

original: nanvevaṃ sati śrutīnāṃ śrutiyuktivirodhaparihāro 'syādhikaraṇasyārtha ityuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: nanu evam sati śrutīnām śruti yukti virodha parihāraḥ syāt adhikaraṇasya arthaḥ iti uktam bhavati
saḥ yam caturtha pāda arthe eva iti tatra eva asya adhikaraṇasya upanibandhanam ucitam
na atra iti atas vailakṣaṇyam darśayitum uktam alpa iti
bahulā iti ca
atra alpa tvam upasajarna tvam
bahula tvam ca
pradhāna tvam iti jñātavyam
eva śabdaḥ tu guṇa pradhāna bhāva vyatyāsaḥ caturtha pāde iva iti arthe

original: nanu śrutiyuktibhyāṃ pūrvapakṣite kathaṃ prabalayuktimātrāśrayeṇa siddhāntaḥ /
analyzed: nanu śruti yuktibhyām pūrvapakṣite katham prabala yukti mātra āśrayeṇa siddhāntaḥ
kathañcid pratipakṣatā mātra sambhavāt iti atas uktam vivṛṇvan āha yukteḥ tu iti
yukteḥ tu yukti bāhulyam āgamāt āgamasya ca
katham na nirṇayam kuryāt

original: tathā pūrvapakṣāgamāpekṣayā virodhyāgamasya ca bāhulyaṃ kathaṃ nirṇayaṃ na kuryāt /
analyzed: tathā pūrvapakṣa āgama apekṣayā virodhi āgamasya ca bāhulyam katham nirṇayam na kuryāt

original: pūrvapakṣyutprekṣitayuktyāgamābhyāṃ prabalau virodhiyuktyāgamau tadbādhayā vastuvyavasthāṃ kuruta ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: pūrvapakṣi utprekṣita yukti āgamābhyām prabalau virodhi yukti āgamau tad bādhayā vastu vyavasthām kurutaḥ iti arthaḥ
kuryāt iti pratyekam sambandhaḥ
na kevalam siddhānte prabala yukti mātram
kinnāma prabala āgamaḥ api asti iti bhāvaḥ
iti atas adhikaraṇa ārambhaḥ sambhavati iti śeṣaḥ
adhikaraṇa upādhi vyutpādana samāpti dyotakaḥ vā iti śabdaḥ

original: tadidamudāharaṇaniṣṭhaṃ vyutpādayituṃ pūrvapakṣamanuvadati sūtrakāraḥ- asaditi cediti //
analyzed: tat idam udāharaṇa niṣṭham vyutpādayitum pūrvapakṣam anuvadati sūtrakāraḥ asat iti ced iti

original: īśvarādīnāṃ pralaye 'sattvasiddhau prāgabhāvasya kāraṇatvamātrasādhane 'pi tasyaiva kāraṇatvamiti siddhayati /
analyzed: īśvara ādīnām pralaye sattva siddhau prāgabhāvasya kāraṇa tva mātra sādhane tasya eva kāraṇa tvam iti siddhayati

original: nanu ca yatkāryaṃ tatsakartṛkamiti niyamānmahadādikartṛtveneśvaro 'vaśyamaṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ / na /

pralaye
bhāvasya pramita tvena prāgabhāvasya eva jagat kartṛ tva upapatteḥ

original: tathāpi prāgabhāvasyaiva kāraṇatvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ca na kvāpyupalabdhamiti cenna /

abhāvaḥ śrutyā jagat kartṛ tvena ucyate

aparā api vṛttiḥ
bhāva tva hetunā kārya vat īśvara ādikam api pralaye sat anumīyate iti
atra asat śabdaḥ kartṛ sādhanaḥ

original: iha prathamāṃ vṛttimabhipretya neti siddhāntāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe(vyākhyāti)- asaditi //

iti asat kāraṇam na hi

hi iti anena idam āha
upapatti viruddhaḥ tāvat na veda atharḥ sambhavati

iti ced na

original: prāgabhāvasya niyatapūrvabhāvitvena viśvakāraṇatvaṃ siddhayan kartṛtayaiva setsyatīti vaktavyam /

original: tadidaṃ pratyanumānaparāhatamityāśayavān pratiṣedhamātratvaditi sautraṃ hetuṃ vyākuvarn sādhyamadhyāharati- niṣedheti //
analyzed: tat idam pratyanumāna parāhatam iti āśayavān pratiṣedha mātra tvat iti sautram hetum vyākuvarn sādhyam adhyāharati niṣedha iti
niṣedha eka svarūpasya na kartṛ tā
niṣedha eka svarūpasya iti hetu garbha viśeṣaṇam

original: vipratipanno 'bhāvo na kartā pratiṣedhamātratvāt niṣedhaikasvarūpatvāt sampratipannaghaṭābhāvavaditi /
analyzed: vipratipannaḥ bhāvaḥ na kartā pratiṣedha mātra tvāt niṣedha eka svarūpa tvāt sampratipanna ghaṭa abhāva vat iti
kartṛ tva mātrasya abhāve viśvakartṛ tvam dūra utsāritam
na ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya vikalaḥ

original: anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kulālādeḥ kartṛtvaniścaye tu abhāvasya tatkalpakābhāvāt / *6,65*
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekābhyām kulāla ādeḥ kartṛ tva niścaye tu abhāvasya tad kalpaka abhāvāt

kartṛ tvam ca kaḥ virodhaḥ

original: tathāca ghaṭādyabhāvasyākartṛtve 'pi pralayakālīno 'bhāvaḥ kartā bhaviṣyatītyataḥ kartṛtvaniṣedhaikasvarūpatvayovirredhaṃ sphorayituṃ kartṛtvasvarūpamāha-  #

buddhi iti
buddhi pūrva pravṛttiḥ hi kartṛ tvam iha niścitam
niścitam sarvaiḥ api parīkṣakaiḥ

original: vṛkṣeṇa sthīyata ityādau kartṛtvaṃ pāribhāṣikaṃ na tu svābhāvikamiti hi sarve 'pi pratipannāḥ /
analyzed: vṛkṣeṇa sthīyate ityādau kartṛ tvam pāribhāṣikam na tu svābhāvikam iti hi sarve pratipannāḥ
atra buddhi pūrva pravṛttiḥ iti etat buddhayā vivicya vyākhyeyam
tathā hi
syāt kartṛ niṣedha eka svarūpa tvayoḥ avirodhaḥ
yadi tṛtīya ādi viṣaya tvam eva kartṛ tvam syāt
na ca etat asti
api tarhi icchā prayatna ādi rūpā pravṛttiḥ eva
sarvaiḥ api parīkṣakaiḥ tasyāḥ eva kartṛ tvena niścita tvāt
prakaraṇāt ca etat eva niścitam
atra eva hi vipratipattiḥ na anyatra
sā ca iyam pravṛttiḥ buddhi pūrvā buddhi vyāptā
kāryāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ buddhi kāraṇaka tvāt
akāryāyāḥ ca buddhi vyabhicārāt yat aśarnāt
na ca kartṛ tva apara paryāyāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ vyāpikā buddhiḥ abhāve sambhavati

original: tato vyāpyaṃ kartṛtvamapi na sambhavatyeveti kathaṃ kartṛtvaniṣedhaikasvarūpatvayorna virodha iti /
analyzed: tatas vyāpyam kartṛ tvam api na sambhavati evā iti katham kartṛ tva niṣedha eka svarūpa tvayoḥ na virodhaḥ iti
atra kartṛ tva anuvādena buddhi pūrva pravṛttiḥ iti vyākhyānāt niścitam iti napuṃsaka upapattiḥ
bhāve vā kta pratyayaḥ iti
nanu mā bhūt aprayojaka tvam hetoḥ
tathā api vaiyarthyam a parihāyarm
abhāva paryāyaḥ hi pratiṣedha śabdaḥ
kartṛ tvam ca kārya utpatti anukūla icchā ādi yogaḥ iti uktam
na ca pratiṣedha tvam kartari vartate
yena a kartṛkam vyabhicaret
tad nirāsa artham ca viśeṣaṇam sārthakam syāt

original: ataḥ pratiṣedhatvādityetāvatākartṛtvavyabhicārābhāvātsūtre mātragrahaṇaṃ vyākhyāne 'pyekagrahaṇaṃ vyarthamityata āha- pratiṣedheti //

pratiṣedha ātmaka tvam tu bhāvasya
bhāvasya api kulāla ādeḥ kartuḥ pratiṣedha ātmaka tvam vidyate
atas pratiṣedha tvāt iti utya iva
kte kulāla ādau
akartṛ tvena hetoḥ
vyabhicāraḥ syāt

eka grahaṇam ca sārthakam iti

original: nanu kulālāderbhāvasya kathaṃ pratiṣedhātmakatvamityata āha- abhāveti //

abhāva dharmataḥ

sa

pratiṣedha ātmakaḥ anyonya abhāvaḥ dharmaḥ iti

original: yaḥ kartā dharmī kulālādiḥ na tasya pratiṣedhātmakatvam,
analyzed: yaḥ kartā dharmī kulāla ādiḥ na tasya pratiṣedha ātmaka tvam

original: yaśca pratiṣedhātmako 'nyonyābhāvo na tasya kartṛtvamittaya āha- dharmeti //
analyzed: yaḥ ca pratiṣedha ātmakaḥ nyonya abhāvaḥ na tasya kartṛ tva mittaye āha dharma iti
dharma dharma aikyataḥ ca eva
dharma dharmiṇoḥ kulāla anyonya abhāvoḥ eka tvataḥ
caśabdaḥ hetu samuccaye
abhāva dharmataḥ dharma dharmya aikyataḥ ca pratiṣedha ātmaka tvam bhāvasya asti iti anvayaḥ
eva śabdaḥ bheda vyudāsa arthaḥ
anyonya abhāvaḥ hi dharmiṇā atyanta abhinnaḥ bhyupeyate
na tvayā avaddravyabhāvī dharmaḥ iva bhinna abhinnaḥ

original: astvevaṃ pratiṣedhatvasya kulālādau vyabhicārastathāpi kathaṃ mātragrahaṇasya sārthakyam /
analyzed: astu evam pratiṣedha tvasya kulāla ādau vyabhicāraḥ tathā api katham mātra grahaṇasya sārthakyam

tat atra katham iti atas āha na tu iti
na tu tanmātra tā bhavet
kulāla ādeḥ kartuḥ bhāvasya pratiṣedha tve pidhā ātmaka tve pi
tad mātra tā pratiṣedha mātra tā na bhavet
atas sti mātra grahaṇasya vyabhicāra parihāra aupayika tvam
tuśabdaḥ sandigdha vyabhicāra parihāra arthaḥ
nanu evam ekam sandhitsataḥ nyat
param pracyavate
yatas vyartha viśeṣaṇa tā parihāre svarūpa asiddhiḥ āpannā
tathā hi

original: pakṣīkṛte abhāve prameyatvādidharmāḥ santi na vā /

original: anyathā pañcaiva bhāvāstadatirikto 'bhāva iti kalpanāyāṃ samavāyāderapi bhāvatvaṃ na syāt /

original: tathāca yathā kulālādervipakṣasya vidhiniṣedhātmakatvena pratiṣedhamātratvābhāvastathā pakṣīkṛthābhāvasyāpi (dharmadvārā vidhirūpasya)

pratiṣedha mātra tva abhāvāt svarūpa asiddhaḥ hetuḥ syāt

original: ghaṭābhāvasyāpi dharmadvārā vidhirūpasya pratiṣedhamātratvābhāvādityata āha- abhāvasya ceti //
analyzed: ghaṭa abhāvasya api dharma dvārā vidhi rūpasya pratiṣedha mātra tva abhāvāt iti atas āha abhāvasya ca iti
abhāvasya ca bhāvaḥ
prathama api śabdāt pūrvam yadi iti adhyāhāryam

original: yadyapyabhāvasya pakṣīkṛtasya dṛṣṭāntīkṛtasya ca bhāvaḥ prameyatvādidharmo 'sti /

original: anyathā ghaṭaḥ paṭo na bhavatītyabhāvaḥ prameya iti ca vyavahārānupapatteḥ /

original: nacāśeṣanṛnāśastu dṛṣṭo dṛśyo 'sti vā kvacit // MAnuv_2,1.76ab //

dṛśyaḥ vā na eva iti anāgatasya
na eva asti vā dṛśyamānaḥ iti vartamānasya
idam uktam bhavati

original: anaikāntikatvaṃ hi pramite vipakṣe hetuvṛttau satyāṃ(hetuvṛttyā) vaktavyam /
analyzed: anaikāntika tvam hi pramite vipakṣe hetu vṛttau satyām hetu vṛttyā vaktavyam
na apramite
tathā sati anamina mātra uccheda prasaṅgāt
na ca aśeṣa puruṣa nāśaḥ kāla traye pramitaḥ
yena nāśa tvasya tatra vyabhicāraḥ syāt
pramita tva aṅgīkāre ca pramātuḥ evā urvarita tvena vyāghātaḥ ca syāt
naca nāśa kartuḥ puruṣasya avaśiṣya tā sādhya tvena iṣyā
yena sunda upasunda ādi nāśaḥ pratyudāhriyeta
kintu puruṣa vi
śeṣavat tva mātram iti
anena pralaya kālaḥ puruṣavān kāla tvāt idānīntana kāla vat iti api anumānam sūcitam
na ca tadā kāla abhāvāt āśraya asiddhiḥ
tathā sati tadā iti eva vaktum aśakya tvāt
parakīya anumāne ca pralaya viśeṣaṇa anupapatteḥ
yadi api atrakālaḥ ṅgīkriyate na vā
ādye tatra eva bhāva tva hetoḥ vyabhicāraḥ
dvitīye pralaya viśeṣaṇa anupapattiḥ
sakala kārya vināśa viśiṣṭa kālasya pralaya tvāt

original: atha kāryavināśa eva pralayastathāpīśvarābhāvasya tena sambandhābhāvādīśvarādikaṃ pralaye 'saditi pratijñārthānupapattiḥ /
analyzed: atha kārya vināśaḥ eva pralayaḥ tathā api īśvara abhāvasya tena sambandha abhāvāt īśvara ādikam pralaye sat iti pratijñā artha anupapattiḥ
deśa ādi dvārā sambandha abhyupagame tatra eva bhāva tvasya vyabhicāraḥ
pralaya viśeṣaṇa parityāge tat śiṣyaiḥ eva uhyatām iti na sūtra bhāṣyakārābhyām abhihitam
sūcitam ca api itau iti sūtrakṛtā
laye mānam ca kim bhavet
iti bhāṣyakṛtā api
tat idam jīva īśvara sādhāraṇam anumānam uktam
idānīm pralaye jīva sadbhāva sādhakam anumānam āha dharma iti
dharma adharma āśraya tvena svīkāryaḥ pi naraḥ laye
na kevalam ukta anumānena
kinnāma dharma adharma śraya tvena api iti sambandhaḥ
naraḥ jīva ātmā
ayam atra prayogaḥ
evam adharmam api pakṣīkṛtya prayoktavyam
na ca dharma adharma āśrayaḥ jīvātmanaḥ sambhavati
evam ca pralaye jīvātma sadbhāvāt bhāva mātrā sattva sādhanam anupapannam iti
yatra īśvara sadbhāva sādhanam idam
āśraya śabdasya adhiṣṭhātṛ para tvāt
tatra evam prayogaḥ
pralaya kāla vartinau dharma adharmau kenacid adhiṣṭhitau
kāraṇa tve sati acetana tvāt
vāśi ādi vat iti
na ca atīndriyayoḥ dharma adharmayoḥ adhiṣṭhātṛ tvam īśvarāt anyasya upapadyate

original: ato dharmādharmādhiṣṭhātṛtvenāpi naraḥ paramapuruṣo laye svīkārya iti / *6,103*
analyzed: atas dharma adharma adhiṣṭhātṛ tvena api naraḥ paramapuruṣaḥ laye svīkāryaḥ iti

original: nanu pralaye bhāvamātrasyāsattvamabhyupagacchato mama tadā dharmādharmāvapi na sta evetyāśrayāsiddhiriti /
analyzed: nanu pralaye bhāva mātrasya asattvam abhyupagacchataḥ mama tadā dharma adharmau api na staḥ eva iti āśraya asiddhiḥ iti
idam iha vaktavyam

original: kiṃ dharmādharmasaṃjñitamadṛṣṭamasti kāryamātrasya kāraṇaṃ ca bhavatītyabhyupagamya pralaye tadabhāvo 'bhīdhīyate,
analyzed: kim dharma adharma saṃjñitam adṛṣṭam asti kārya mātrasya kāraṇam ca bhavati iti abhyupagamya pralaye tad abhāvaḥ bhīdhīyate
uta sat api tat akāraṇam iti abhyupetya
atha tat eva na asti iti aṅgīkṛtya
ādyam dūṣayati anādi tvam iti

original: anāditvaṃ vinādṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ syāt kāraṇaṃ kvacit // MAnuv_2,1.77ab //
analyzed: anādi tvam vinā adṛṣṭam katham syāt kāraṇam kvacid
anādi tvam iva anādi tvam pralaye sattvam iti arthaḥ
kvacid iti sṛṣṭi kāle

original: yadyadṛṣṭaṃ pralaye na syāttadā'dikālīnasya kāryasya kāraṇaṃ na syāt /
analyzed: yadi adṛṣṭam pralaye na syāt tad ādi kālīnasya kāryasya kāraṇam na syāt
asataḥ kāraṇa tva ayogāt
tathā ca sarva utpattimatām nimittam iti abhyupagamaḥ bhagnaḥ iti atharḥ

uta tat mūlam

original: ādyaṃ tu kathaṃ svayamadṛḍhabhūmikaṃ paraṃ pratirundhyāt /
analyzed: ādyam tu katham svayam adṛḍha bhūmikam param pratirundhyāt
nahi bhavati tarakṣoḥ pratipakṣaḥ hariṇa śāvaḥ
kintu ādyena eva pramāṇa mūlena bādhyate
dvitīyam tu syāt eva pramāṇam
ādyam ca apabādheta
ubhayathā api na sarva anumāna aprāmāṇyam

original: yada tūbhayoḥ api pramāṇamūlatvasandehaḥ tadāstu pratirodhaḥ /
analyzed: tu ubhayoḥ api pramāṇa mūla tva sandehaḥ tadā astu pratirodhaḥ
kintu na evam sarvatra
avadhāraṇāyām tu pūrvā eva gatiḥ iti
dvitīya yojanāyām tu praṣṭavyam
kim pramāṇa anugraha rahitam anumānam pratyanumāna parāhata tvāt apramāṇam
uta tat mūlam
ādye sampratipattim uttaram āha āgama iti
tathā api na evam sarvatra iti bhāvaḥ
pratiṣṭhitaḥ pramāṇa bhūtaḥ
dvitīye tu āha akṣa ja iti
akṣaja āgama mūlasya syāt eva asya pratiṣṭhitiḥ
pratiṣṭhitaḥ prāmāṇyam
tena eva pratiprayogasya bādhita tvāt
ubhayoḥ vāstava pramāṇa mūla tva asambhavāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: yastvetāṃ vyavasthāmanabhyupagamya sarvatrāpi pratipakṣasyāstyavakāśa iti sarvamanumānamapramāṇamiti ca manyate tasya sūtrārūḍhamuttaramāha-  #
analyzed: yaḥ tu etām vyavasthām an abhyupagamya sarvatra api pratipakṣasya asti avakāśaḥ iti sarvam anumānam apramāṇam iti ca manyate tasya sūtra ārūḍham uttaram āha
anyathā iti

original: anyathāsyāpratiṣṭhā ca svavācā vyāhataiva hi // MAnuv_2,1.80ef //
analyzed: anyathā asya apratiṣṭhā ca sva vācā vyāhatā eva hi

original: etenaivamupapādite 'pi yo naivaṃ manyate tasya svavacanavyāghātādanirmokṣaprasaṅga iti sūtrayojanā sūcitā /
analyzed: etena evam upapādite pi yaḥ nā evam manyate tasya sva vacana vyāghātāt anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti sūtra yojanā sūcitā
tathā hi

original: sarvamanumānapramāṇaṃ pratipakṣapratihatatvāditi tvadīyamanumānaṃ pratipakṣaparāhataṃ cāpramāṇaṃ ca bhavati na vā /
analyzed: sarvam anumāna pramāṇam pratipakṣa pratihata tvāt iti tvadīyam anumānam pratipakṣa parāhatam ca apramāṇam ca bhavati na vā
ādye na anena sarvasya a prāmāṇya siddhiḥ

anyathā ukta vyavasthām vihāya
asya sarvasya api anumānasya apratiṣṭhā apramāṇa tā
sva vācā eva vyāhatāḥ hi iti
apare tu vilakṣaṇa tvāt
ityādīni sūtrāṇi brahmaṇaḥ jagat upādāna tva ākṣepa samādhāna arthatayā vyācakṣate
tad prakṛti adhikaraṇe eva nirākṛtam

original: yaccātra sūtre tarkāpratiṣṭhānāditi vākyaṃ bhittvā siddhāntatayaiva varṇayanti,
analyzed: yat ca atra sūtre tarka apratiṣṭhānāt iti vākyam bhittvā siddhānta tayā eva varṇayanti

original: nahi jñānakaraṇasya pramāṇagṛhītavyāptyādimattvenāprāmāṇyakāraṇavyabhicārādiśaṅkākalaṅkavikalasya prāmāṇyaṃ nāstīti yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /

original: anyathoktānabhyupagamenāsya pramāṇamūlasyāpyanumānasyāpratiṣṭhā svavācā vyāhataiva sūtrakṛtaḥ syāt /

original: svayameva hi yuktyanusandhānarūpāṃ brahmamīmāṃsāmārabhya pramāṇamūlasyāpi tarkasyāprāmāṇyamabhidadhānaḥ sūtrakāro na vyāhatabhāṣī kathaṃ syāt
analyzed: svayam eva hi yukti anusandhāna rūpām brahmamīmāṃsām ārabhya pramāṇa mūlasya api tarkasya aprāmāṇyam abhidadhānaḥ sūtrakāraḥ na vyāhata bhāṣī katham syāt
yat api vṛtti kāraiḥ uktam ekena tārkikeṇa utprekṣitam tarkam aparaḥ dūṣayati
tena utprekṣitam api aparaḥ
iti atas puruṣa mati vaiśvarūpya janmā tarkaḥ syāt apratiṣṭhitaḥ iti

original: yato 'syāpi tarkasya prāmāṇye 'prāmāṇye vā asyāpratiṣṭhā ca sva(vācā)
analyzed: yatas syā api tarkasya prāmāṇye prāmāṇye vā asya apratiṣṭhā ca sva vācā

original: vyāhataiveti nāyaṃ vākyabhedo yukta ityukta eva sūtrārthaḥ /

original: atra sūtram oṃ etena śiṣyā aparigrahā api vyākhyātā iti /

tat kecid vayācakṣate
etena na vilakṣaṇa tvāt

original: ityādinā prakṛtena śiṣyaiḥ kenacidaṃśena parigṛhītasya pradhānakāraṇavādasya nirākaraṇena
analyzed: ityādinā prakṛtena śiṣyaiḥ kenacid aṃśena parigṛhītasya pradhāna kāraṇa vādasya nirākaraṇena
śiṣyaiḥ manuvyāsa prabhṛtibhiḥ kenacid api aṃśena a parigṛhītāḥ ye ṇu ādi kāraṇavādāḥ te pi
vyākhyātāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ iti
tat idam dūṣayati na ca iti
etena śiṣṭa a parigrahāḥ api vyākhyātāḥ
na ca śiṣya agṛhīta tvam nirīśa ādīśavādinaḥ
āstām tāvat abhyadhika āśaṅkā prakāraḥ
parihāra atideśa prakāraḥ ca
yat tāvat uktam sāṅkhayāt api vaiśeṣika ādeḥ atiśayena śiṣya agṛhīta tvam
tat ati tīva viruddham
sāṅkhayasya nirīśvara tvāt
vaiśeṣika ādeḥ tu sa īśvara tvāt
vaiparītyasya eva ucita tvāt

original: iha hi brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatve vipratipattayo nirasyante /

vaiśeṣika ādiḥ tu

original: brahma tasya jagannimittatvaṃ cāṅgīkṛtyopādānatāmātraṃ nāṅgīkuruta itīṣadvirodhitvāt īṣacchiṣyāparigṛhīta iti yuktam /

satkārya vādi tva ādikam tu prakṛta asaṅgatam eva
anyathā yāgīya hiṃsā niṣedha ādinā viparivartaḥ syāt
atha veda saṃvāda bāhulya a bāhulya prayuktam idam

tat na

yat api uktam ādi pada gṛhītāt aitadātmyam idam sarvam ityādi vākyāt tad ananyatva siddhiḥ iti tat api asat
ādi padena vākya antara grahaṇasya anupapatteḥ

atra hetum āha avikāra tve iti

original: brahmaṇo 'vikāratva uktanyāyena sādhite sati jagatastu vikārātmakatve pratyakṣādipramite sati viruddhadharmādhikaraṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ vikāra tve ukta nyāyena sādhite sati jagataḥ tu vikāra ātmaka tve pratyakṣa ādi pramite sati viruddha dharma adhikaraṇa tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
dvitīyam ākṣipati katham ca iti
vikāri vikāra tva rūpaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
ākṣepe yuktim āha jagataḥ tu iti
vyākhyānam pūrvavat
nanu evam upapatti viruddhā api jagataḥ brahma ananyatā aṅgīkaraṇīyā
anyathā etad ātmyam idam sarvam ityādi śrutīnām aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt iti atas āha katham ca iti
avikāri tve pi vikāra tvāt anyasmin tad adhīna tva ādau śruti arthe svātantrye ca viśiṣṭa tve
iti ukta nyāyena sādhite sati katham tad ananyatā aṅgīkartum ucitā
sa avakāśa śruti pratītā u pi arthaḥ niravakāśa upapatti virodhāt tyājyaḥ eva
yathā uktam abhimāni adhikaraṇe iti bhāvaḥ

iti prāha iti anuvartate

nahi brahma ananyatva śabdaḥ

original: nanu ca tadananyatvaṃ tadvayatirekeṇābhāva iti vyākhyātam /

original: yata evaṃ jagato brahmānanyatvamanekavidhamapi nātra pratipādyaṃ,

tena iti arthaḥ

mahat ādikam vā sa apekṣa utpattikam

īśvaraḥ vā svatantra kāraṇa savya ṇa antarasā

original: vaditi yuktiviruddhatvājjanmādisūtre 'bhipretaṃ yatparasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ svātantryaṃ tannopapadyate /
analyzed: vat iti yukti viruddha tvāt janma ādi sūtre bhipretam yat parasya eva brahmaṇaḥ svātantryam tat na upapadyate
na ca śruti virodhaḥ
śrutīnām brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇatva mātra paratvāt
svatantra kāraṇa antara nirāse śruteḥ abhāvāt
bhāve pi apauruṣeya tayā śruti prābalya vat bāhulyena yukti prābalyasya api sambhavāt
sat pratipakṣa tayā
tyā abhipreta avadhāraṇa anupapatteḥ iti evam prāptam

atra adhikaraṇe

mahat ādi sṛṣṭau yat svatantra kāraṇam tasya tad ananyatvam iti
yadi atra svatantra kāraṇa abhāvaḥ iti eva brūyāt

original: tadananyatvaṃ svatantrakāraṇasyetyukte hi svatantrakāraṇaṃ tadeva nānyaditi labhyate /

satyam

original: ityataḥ prakṛtyādeḥ kāraṇajātasyeśvarādhīnasattākatva pramāṇaṃ darśayansūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- dravyamiti //

original: ato yuktibādhitatvādasyārthasya kāraṇāntaranirapekṣa eva bhagavantsṛṣṭayādikaṃ karātītyeva jyāyaḥ /

original: kiñca prāgutpattessattve paṭasya kasmānnopalabdhiḥ kathaṃ cordhvamupalabdhiriti praśnasya upalabdhyanupalabdhi(anupalabdhyupalabdhi)

bhyām eva iti parihāram vadan devānām priyaḥ ślāghanīya prajñaḥ syāt

original: api ca prāgūrdhvaṃ ca tantūpalabdhau kathaṃ tanmātrasya sataḥ paṭasyānupalabdhiḥ /
analyzed: api ca prāk ūrdhvam ca tantu upalabdhau katham tanmātrasya sataḥ paṭasya anupalabdhiḥ
anyathā tantūnām api sā syāt
atha paṭa dharmau eva vyakti avyaktī

original: tadā tāvapi tantūnāṃ vidyete na vā /
analyzed: tadā tau api tantūnām vidyete na vā
na ced na kārya kāraṇayeḥ atyanta abhedaḥ
vidyete ced tatra āha anavasthā iti

original: utpattināśavyavahārahetūvyaktyavyaktī yadi tantuṣvapi vidyete tadā sarvatrotpattināśayoranavasthā syāt /
analyzed: utpatti nāśa vyavahāra hetū vyakti avyaktī yadi tantuṣu api vidyete tadā sarvatra utpatti nāśayoḥ anavasthā syāt
tantavaḥ na utpannāḥ na naṣṭāḥ
kintu paṭaḥ eva iti utpatti vināśa vyavasthā na syāt iti
kiñca iyam abhivyaktiḥ utpatti ādi vyavahāra kāraṇatayā upādīyate

original: sā kiṃ cakracīvarādibhiḥ prāgasatyevotpadyate mudgarābhighātādinā ca naśyati,
analyzed: sā kim cakra cīvara ādibhiḥ prāk asatī evā utpadyate mudgara abhighāta ādinā ca naśyati
uta prāk api satī eva a vināśinī ca
evam avyaktiḥ api kim prāk asatī mudgara abhighāta ādinā utpadyate
kiṃvā prāk api satī
ubhayatra ādyau dūṣayati anavasthā iti
vyakti avyaktyoḥ utpatti nāśa vat tve sarvatra utpatti nāśayoḥ anavasthā vyavasthā bhāvaḥ syāt
na kiñcid asat utpadyate na kiñcid sat vinaśyati iti siddhānta virodhaḥ hāniḥ
syāt iti arthaḥ
dvitīyau dūṣayati anavasthā iti
vyakti avyaktyoḥ sadā sattve sarvatra utpatti nāśayoḥ anavasthā vyavasthitiḥ syāt
tathā hi

original: etāvantaṃ kālamanutpanno ghaṭa idānīmutpanna iti tāvanna syāt /
analyzed: etāvantam kālam anutpannaḥ ghaṭaḥ idānīm utpannaḥ iti tāvat na syāt
utpatti vyavahāra hetoḥ abhivyakteḥ prāk api sattvāt
tathā mudgara abhighāta ādi uttarakālam api ghaṭa sattva vyavahāraḥ syāt
tad hetoḥ abhivyakteḥ avinaṣṭa tvāt

original: tathedānīmeva naṣṭo ghaṭa ityapi na syāt /
analyzed: tathā idānīm eva naṣṭaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti api na syāt
vināśa vyavahāra kāraṇa anabhivyakteḥ prāk api sattvāt iti
kāraka vyāpāra vaiphalya tādavasthyam sphuṭam eva
atha etad doṣa parihārāya vyakti avyaktyoḥ api vyakti avyaktī svīkriyete
tadā tayoḥ api ukta vikalpa doṣa anuṣaṅgaḥ syāt
atha tatra api vyakti avyakti antara aṅgīkāraḥ tadā anavasthā syāt iti āha anavasthā iti
utpatti nāśayoḥ iti viṣaya saptamī
santu anantāḥ vyaktayaḥ vyaktayaḥ ca
mūla kṣaya abhāvāt na anavasthā doṣaḥ iti atas āha anavasthā iti
anyathā anavacchinna vyakti avyakti paramparā aṅgīkāre ghaṭa ādau utpatti nāśayoḥ anavasthā anavakḷptiḥ syāt
uttara uttara vyakti avyakti siddhau hi pūrva pūrva vyakti avyaktīnām utpatti nāśa vyavahāra nidāna tvam
tatas prayojana parikṣaya hetu tvāt anavasthā dūṣaṇam eva
nanu idam bhavatām api samānam
prāk asataḥ sattā samavāyaḥ hi janiḥ iṣyate

original: sattāsamavāyāha ca sadā santāviti prāgvināśottaramapi janiḥ syāt /
analyzed: sattā samavāya āha ca sadā santau iti prāk vināśa uttaram api janiḥ syāt
vināśaḥ ca na syāt iti atas āha anavasthā iti

original: iyaṃ sarvatrotpattivināśayoranavasthāvyavasthitiḥ anyathā samavāyasya janitvāṅgīkṛtāveva hi syāt /
analyzed: iyam sarvatra utpatti vināśayoḥ anavasthā vyavasthitiḥ anyathā samavāyasya janitva aṅgīkṛtau eva hi syāt
na asmad mate
prakāra antareṇa janeḥ vakṣyamāṇa tvāt iti

original: nanu janiḥ kiṃ prāk satī uta kārakavyāpārajanyā /
analyzed: nanu janiḥ kim prāk satī uta kāraka vyāpāra janyā
ādye prāk uktaḥ eva doṣaḥ
dvitīye janeḥ janiḥ api tathā iti anavasthā
evam vināśaḥ api iti atas āha anavasthā iti
sarvatra utpatti nāśayoḥ iyam ukta anavasthā
anyathā ghaṭa janeḥ anyā janeḥ janiḥ iti aṅgīkāraḥ eva syāt
na tu evam aṅgīkriyate
api tarhi ghaṭa janma eva janmanaḥ janma iti
yathā āhuḥ yathā janeḥ janiḥ na anyā tasyāḥ vastu janiḥ janiḥ iti

original: ghaṭo jāyate ghaṭajanma jāyata ityanayorekārthataiva hi laukikaparīkṣakasammatā /
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ jāyate ghaṭa janma jāyate iti anayoḥ ekārtha tā eva hi laukika parīkṣaka sammatā
na ca vyakti avyaktyoḥ api evam aṅgīkartum ucitam
janma vināśau upalabdhi anupalabdhī vā vihāya vyakti avyaktyoḥ eva aprāmāṇika tvāt iti

original: nanu yadyasadutpadyeta sacca vinaśyeta tadā sarvatrotpattināśayoranavasthaiva syāt /
analyzed: nanu yadi asat utpadyeta sat ca vinaśyeta tadā sarvatra utpatti nāśayoḥ anavasthā eva syāt
evam sati hi khara
śaśaviṣāṇam api utpadyeta
ātmā ca naśyet iti atas āha anavasthā iti
anyathā kāraṇa śakti an ādaraṇe hi īm utpatti vināśayoḥ anavasthā syāt
na ca evam kintu yasya utpatti kāraṇam asti tat asat api utpadyate

original: yasya ca vināśakāraṇaṃ vidyate tatsadapi niruddhayate /
analyzed: yasya ca vināśa kāraṇam vidyate tat sat api niruddhayate
na ca khara viṣāṇa janmani ātma vināśe vā kāraṇam asti iti tayoḥ janana vināśa abhāvaḥ
kāraṇa svabhāva ananugame tu satkārya vādinaḥ pi atiprasaṅgaḥ evā iti

original: athavā syādiyamanavasthā yadyatyantāsadevotpadyate sanmātraṃ vinaśyatīti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: athavā syāt iyam anavasthā yadi atyanta asat eva utpadyate sat mātram vinaśyati iti brūmaḥ

original: sadasadevotpadyata iti coktaṃ vināśakāraṇavadeva ca vinaśyatīti / *6,258*
analyzed: sat asat eva utpadyate iti ca uktam vināśa kāraṇa vat eva ca vinaśyati iti
yat ca uktam bhāve ca upalabdheḥ iti sūtra artha tvena
tad vayāpya vyāpaka bhāvena eva upapannam na atyanta abheda sādhakam
atha kāraṇa uparakta buddhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya buddhiḥ vā atra abhimatā iti matam
sā api abheda mātreṇa caritārthā na atyanta abheda sādhanāya alam
kiñca etat yukteḥ ca iti anena eva śakya saṅgraham na punar abhidhātavyam
atha anena pratyakṣam upanyasyate tat api na atyanta abheda sādhakam
atas eva bhāvāt ca upalabdheḥ iti sūtra vipariṇāmaḥ pi nirastaḥ
sattvāt ca avasyā iti yuktiḥ ced yukteḥ ca iti etena eva gatārtha tā
śrutiḥ ced śabda antarāt ca iti anena
asat vayapadeśāt iti tu paricodanā eva asaṅga tā

original: paramārthato brahmakāraṇatāparatvenāpātatastu śūnyasyābhāvasya vā kāraṇabhāvapratipādakatāpratibhāsena kāryāsattvasya śrutāvapratīteḥ /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ brahma kāraṇatā paratvena āpātataḥ tu śūnyasya abhāvasya vā kāraṇa bhāva pratipādaka tā pratibhāsena kārya asattvasya śrutau apratīteḥ
yukteḥ iti ukta yuktim tu uttaratra apākariṣyāmaḥ
śabda antaram tu ācāryeṇa eva anyatra anyathā eva vyākhyātam
paṭe prāṇa ādau ca na atyanta anupasañjāta viśeṣa tvam iti anudāharaṇam eva iti alam prapañcena

original: yaduktaṃ śakto 'pi hīti yacca nityabheda itrata tadubhayaṃ śrutyāpi sādhayati- śakto 'pīti //
analyzed: yat uktam hi iti yat ca nitya bhedaḥ tat ubhayam śrutyā api sādhayati
śaktaḥ pi bhagavān viṣṇuḥ a kartum kartum anyathā
sva bhinnam kāraṇa abhinna bhinnam viśvam karoti ajaḥ
iti śruteḥ avasitaḥ ukta arthaḥ yam aśeṣatas
a kartum śaktaḥ u pi karoti

original: anyathā vinā kāraṇaistadvayatyāsena ca kartuṃ śakto 'pi niyataiḥ kāraṇaiḥ karotīcchayeti yojyam /
analyzed: anyathā vinā kāraṇaiḥ tad vayatyāsena ca kartum śaktā api niyataiḥ kāraṇaiḥ karoti icchayā iti yojyam
svasmāt nimitta kāraṇāt bhinnam
upādānakāraṇena abhinnam bhinnam ca

original: saṃsāriṇo hi viṣyigṛhītā iveśvarapreritā aniṣyamapi dhārakaprayatnenākṛtvā na sthātumīśate /
analyzed: saṃsāriṇaḥ hi viṣyi gṛhītāḥ iva īśvara preritāḥ aniṣyam api dhāraka prayatnena a kṛtvā na sthātum īśate
na ca bhagavān tathā iti a kartum

original: aśeṣataḥ prāgidānīṃ cokto na tu sannihita evetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: aśeṣatas prāk idānīm ca uktaḥ na tu sannihitaḥ eva iti arthaḥ
iti śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām ārambhaṇa adhikaraṇam
atha śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām itara vyapadeśa adhikaraṇam
om itara vyapadeśāt hita akaraṇa ādi doṣa prasaktiḥ om

original: asminnadhikaraṇe jīvakartṛtvapakṣaḥ śrutiprāpto vistarānnirākriyata iti bhāṣyam /
analyzed: asmin adhikaraṇe jīva kartṛ tva pakṣaḥ śruti prāptaḥ vistarāt nirākriyate iti bhāṣyam
atra vaktavyam
kim atra jīvasya sarvathā kartṛ tvam nirākriyate
uta īśvara adhīnam tat aṅgīkṛtya svātantrya mātram
na ādyaḥ
tathā sati kartā śāstra atharvat tvāt ityādi vakṣyamāṇa virodha āpatteḥ
svatas kartṛ tva anupapattiḥ ityādi viśeṣaṇa vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt ca
na dvitīyaḥ
hita karaṇa ādi doṣa prasaktiḥ ityādi sūtrāṇām svātantrya nirākaraṇa paratvena śakya yojana tve pi
kṛtsna prasaktiḥ niravayava tva śabda koṣaḥ vā iti asya sūtrasya aśakya vyākhyāna tvāt

original: idaṃ hi sūtraṃ sarvathā kartṛtvaṃ nirākurvadupalabhyate /
analyzed: idam hi sūtram sarvathā kartṛ tvam nirākurvat upalabhyate
tathā hi
kartṛ tvam kṛtsna eka deśābhyām vyāptam
tatra kṛtsna prasaktau anubhava virodhaḥ

original: ekadeśāṅgīkāre ca“atha yaḥ sa jīvaḥ sa nityo niravayavaḥ';
analyzed: eka deśa aṅgīkāre ca atha yaḥ sa jīvaḥ sa nityaḥ niravayavaḥ
iti an aṃśa tva śruti vyākopaḥ syāt
nahi sāmarthya apara paryāyam prayatna ādi rūpam kartṛ tvam asmākam jīvāt bhinnam

original: yena tasya vicitratve 'pi jīvasya niraṃśatvaṃ na vyāhanyeta /
analyzed: yena tasya vicitra tve pi jīvasya niraṃśa tvam na vyāhanyeta

original: tato vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyaṃ kartṛtvamapi vicitratve 'pi jīvasya niraṃśatvaṃ na vyāhanyeta /
analyzed: tatas vyāpaka nivṛttyā vyāpyam kartṛ tvam api vicitra tve pi jīvasya niraṃśa tvam na vyāhanyeta

original: tato vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyaṃ kartṛtvamapi nivartata iti khalvasya(tra)
analyzed: tatas vyāpaka nivṛttyā vyāpyam kartṛ tvam api nivartate iti khalu asi atra

original: atha jīvakartṛtvasyeśvarādhīnatānaṅgīkāra evaito prasaṅgāvuktau na kartṛtvamātre /

original: syādapyevaṃ yadi jīvakartṛtvasyeśvarādhīnatvāṅgīkāreṇemau prasaṅgau śakyasamādhānau syātām /

original: nacaivaṃ parādhīnenāpi khalvanena kṛtsnena vā kartavyamekadeśena vā /

bhāve vā tena eva apara adhīna tve pi kartṛ tva upapatteḥ

original: ato viparyayāparyavasānānnaivaṃ vyākhyānaṃ yuktamiti kartṛtvābhāva eva tātparyam /

mā evam

atas durghaṭam etat adhikaraṇam iti atas dvitīya pakṣam aṅgīkṛtya prasaṅgau jīva kartṛ tvasya īśvara adhīna tā anaṅgīkāra viṣayau

original: evamupodghātaprakriyayā viparyayaparyavasānopapattimuktvedānīṃ vivakṣitārthe sūtraṃ yojayati- yadīti //

original: yadi bhāgena kāryeṣu jīvaśaktiṃ na yojayet /

original: haristadā hi sarvatra kṛtsnayatnoṃ'śitāpi vā // MAnuv_2,1.95 //

original: atra yadīśvarādhīnatayā kartā na syāditi vaktavye yadi bhāgenetyādivacanaṃ prasaṅgasphuṭīkaraṇārtham /

īśvara adhīna tva prakāra prapañcana artham ca

original: tatreśvarasyāpi kartṛtvāṅgīkāre kalpāgauravaṃ syādityato neśvarasya sarvakartṛtvamiti /

original: nanu ca vyatireko gandhavaditi jīvānāmanekarūpatāṃ sūtrakāra eva vakṣyati /
analyzed: nanu ca vyatirekaḥ gandha vat iti jīvānām aneka rūpatām sūtrakāraḥ eva vakṣyati

original: na cāṇoryugapadanekarūpatvaṃ vinā sāṃśatayopapadyata iti sāṃśatāpi tata eva siddhā /

original: tatkathamatra niravayavatvaśabdakopo vetyavādīditi gūḍhābhisandherāśaṅkāmaviditābhiprāyaiva pariharati- aṃśino hītyādinā //
analyzed: tat katham atra niravayavatva śabda kopaḥ vā iti avādīt iti gūḍha abhisandheḥ āśaṅkām avidita abhiprāyā eva pariharati aṃśinaḥ hi ityādinā

original: aṃśino hi paṭādyā ye bhinnaireva parasparam /

original: aṃśairaṃśina ucyante naivameva hi cetanāḥ // MAnuv_2,1.96 //

original: bahusvarūpatākhyā tu teṣvastyeva hi sāṃśatā // MAnuv_2,1.98ab //

hi śabdaḥ pramāṇa prasiddhim dyotayati

original: astyeva vakṣyamāṇānekasvarūpatāṇutvaṃ ca tadanyathānupapattisiddhā sāṃśatā ca /

na ādyaḥ
mīmāṃsāyāḥ nyāya śāstra tva āpatteḥ

original: iha hi cidānandādyātmakadivyamaṅgalavigrahavato mahāpuruṣasya prākṛtaśarīrādyabhāve 'pi sakalakāryakartṛtvamapāṇipāda ityādiśrutimāśrityoktamiti

original: pūrvasūtraiḥ sāmānyaviṣayapramāṇānyāśritya sāmānyata eva sarvānupapattiparihāro vihitaḥ /

original: yadyatra kartṛtvena prayojanavattvaṃ prasādhyāpūrṇatvasādhanaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇo vivakṣitaṃ syāttadā prathamasūtramayuktaṃ syāt /

apūrṇa tā sādhakam prati prayojanavat tva hetoḥ asiddha tvāt

original: atha kartā cetprayojanavānsyāt tathā cāpūrṇaḥ syādityāpādanaṃ vivakṣitam /

mā evam

original: dvitīye tu kartṛtvānupapattiḥ tasya prayojanavyāptatvādityubhayathāpīśvarasya jagatsṛṣṭayādikartṛtvānupapattirityatra pūrvapakṣiṇo vivakṣitam

original: yadvā kartṛtvena prayojanasya tena cāpūrṇatvasya idaṃ sa dhanaṃ vivakṣitamutāpādanamiti siddhāntī vikalpyādyamādyena nirācaṣṭe /
analyzed: yat vā kartṛ tvena prayojanasya tena ca apūrṇa tvasya idam sa dhanam vivakṣitam uta āpādanam iti siddhāntī vikalpya ādyam ādyena nirācaṣṭe
na kartṛ tvena prayojanavat tvam sādhyam

na ca asiddhaḥ hetuḥ

original: athaiṣa eva parama ānando niraniṣyo niravadya iti śruteḥ /

atas na anaikāntya ādi iti

original: yaduktamīśvarasya pravṛttiḥ prayojanena vinā svabhāvādeva pramiteti /

original: yathā loke saptadvīpāṃ medinīmadhitiṣṭhataḥ sampūṇarśauryavīryaparākramasyāpi mahārājasya kevalalīlaikaprayojanāḥ kandukādyārambhā dṛśyante

original: tathaiva parasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ svasaṅkalpamātrāvakḷptajagajjanmasthitidhvaṃsāderlīlaiva prayojanamiti tadetannirākaroti- krīḍāmiti //

original: krīḍāṃ prayojanaṃ kṛtvā sṛṣṭiḥ śrutivirodhinī // MAnuv_2,1.104ab //

original: iti krīḍāprayojanāṃ bhagavataḥ sṛṣṭayādipravṛttiṃ vadataḥ pūrvapakṣīkṛtya devasyaiva svabhāvo 'yamiti sayuktikaṃ prayojanaleśābhāvaḥ śrutyā  #
analyzed: iti krīḍā prayojanām bhagavataḥ sṛṣṭayā ādi pravṛttim vadataḥ pūrvapakṣīkṛtya devasya eva svabhāvaḥ yam iti sa yuktikam prayojana leśa abhāvaḥ śrutyā
siddhāntitaḥ
atas śruti viruddha tvāt apavyākhyānam eva etat
sūtra akṣara ananuguṇam ca etat vayākhyānam iti āha iti iti

original: iti kevalalīlaiva nirṇītā prabhuṇā svayam // MAnuv_2,1.104cd //

original: yata evaṃ“krīḍāṃ prayojanaṃ kṛtvā sṛṣṭiḥ śrutivirodhinī';

original: iti tasmāt śrutyanusāriṇā prabhuṇā svayaṃ sākṣātsṛṣṭaṃ kevalalīlaiva sṛṣṭayādipravṛttirnirṇītā līlākaivalyamiti /

original: yasmāllīlāṃ prayojanaṃ kṛtvā sṛṣṭiḥ śrutivirodhinī tasmādetatsūtre kevalalīlaiva sūtrakṛtā nirṇītā vyākhyātā na punarlīlārtheti / *6,313*

original: dṛśyante hi kṛpālavaḥ svaprayojanamanuddiśya paraprayojanārthameva pravartamānāḥ /

original: kā spṛhā na kāpīti śrutyā neti sūtrakāreṇa ca sarvathā prayojanoddeśasya nivāritatvādityata āha- ātmeti //
analyzed: kā spṛhā na kā api iti śrutyā na iti sūtrakāreṇa ca sarvathā prayojana uddeśasya nivārita tvāt iti atas āha ātmā iti
ātma prayojana arthāya spṛhām śrutiḥ avārayat
śrutiḥ iti sūtrakṛtā u pi upalakṣaṇam
para prayojana artha tām tu aṅgīkurute eva iti śeṣaḥ
kutas etat avagamyate iti atas āha na iti
na prayojanavat tvena iti atas āha jagadguruḥ
yatas para prayojanam aṅgīkṛtya ātma prayojana artha tām eva na iti nyavārayat

original: ata eva hi prayojanavattvāditi tatra hetumāha- anyathā naitaṃ brūyāt /
analyzed: atas eva hi prayojanavat tvāt iti tatra hetum āha anyathā na etam brūyāt
etat uktam bhavati

original: yadi neti sautrīpratijñā svaparaprayojanaviṣayā syāt tadā prayojanavattvāditi heturanaikāntikaḥ syāt /

svayam vyāpāra sādhya prayojanavataḥ pi para prayojana uddeśena vyāpāra darśanāt
sva prayojana mātra viṣaya tve tu na ayam doṣaḥ

original: yo 'vāptayatprayojanaḥ sa svārthaṃ na taduddiśatīti vyāpteranavadyatvāt /
analyzed: yaḥ vā āpta yad prayojanaḥ sa sva artham na tat uddiśati iti vyāpteḥ anavadya tvāt

original: ataḥ prayojanavattvāditi hetuṃ brahmaṇaḥ sūtrakṛdātmaprayojanoddeśameva neti nivāritavān /
analyzed: atas prayojanavat tvāt iti hetum brahmaṇaḥ sūtrakṛt ātma prayojana uddeśam eva na iti nivāritavān
na para prayojana uddeśam api

sva prayojana niṣedham kurvāṇaḥ viśeṣa niṣedhasya śeṣa abhyanujñā jñāpaka tvāt para prayojana spṛhām abhyupaiti iti manujānāti iti api
jñāyate iti
upalakṣaṇam etat

original: śrutirapyāptakāmasyeti hetugarbhaviśeṣaṇaṃ prayuñjānā'tmaprayojanaspṛhāmevākṣipati paraprayojanaspṛhāmabhyupaitīti jñāyata ityapi draṣṭavyam

iha hi buddhiḥ eva īśvarasya avyāhatā kriyāśaktiḥ
tathā eva sarvasya upapattau kim icchā prayatna kalpanayā
yat vā prayatnaḥ karta tvam
tasya eva ākhyāta artha tayā nirṇīta tvāt
sa ca dvedhā buddhim apekṣate
utpatti artham viṣaya niyama artham ca
tatra īśvara prayatnaḥ yadi api nitya tvāt na utpattau apekṣate buddhim

na hi nirviṣayaḥ eva asau
vyartha tva prasaṅgāt
na ca svabhāvataḥ eva artha pravaṇaḥ
buddhi tva prasaṅgāt
buddhiḥ eva hi svabhāvataḥ rtha pravaṇā
atas jñāna prayatnābhyām eva sarva nirvāhāt na īśvarasya icchā asti
na ca icchayā prayatnasya viṣaya niyamaḥ
tasyāḥ api svatas viṣaya pravaṇa tā bhāvāt

original: tadarthaṃ buddhayaṅgīkāre tayaiva prayatnasya viṣayaniyamopapatteḥ kimantargaḍunecchayeti manvā(nyamā)
analyzed: tad artham buddhayaṅgīkāre tayā eva prayatnasya viṣaya niyama upapatteḥ kim antargaḍunā icchayā iti
nāḥ kecitkā spṛhā
śrutiḥ nā īśvarasya prayojana icchā mātra niṣedha parā

atas na idam aniṣyam iti
tat idam ayuktam

original: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye hi vastuto dūṣaṇe na vā /

kim sāpekṣa tā pakṣam kakṣīkṛtya tatra dūṣaṇa parihāra kleśena
tathā ca bakabandhaka
rītiḥ iti atas bhiprāyam āha vaiṣamyam iti

original: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt tathā hi darśayati / BBs_2,1.34 /
analyzed: vaiṣamya nairghṛṇye na sāpekṣa tvāt tathā hi darśayati
vaiṣamyam ca eva nairghṛṇyam veda aprāmāṇya kāraṇam
na aṅgīkāryam atas na vaiṣamya ādi nāmakam
dvividham khalu idam vaiṣamyam nirghṛṇa tvam ca
ekam dha karma ādi an apekṣa tā prayuktam
aparam tu sāpekṣa tve pi karma ādi sattā ādeḥ api īśvara adhīnatva prayuktam
tatra ādyam veda aprāmāṇya kāraṇatvena dūṣaṇa tvāt na īśvarasya aṅgīkartum ucitam

original: vedo hi dharmaṃ sukhasādhanamadharmaṃ ca duḥkhasādhanamāha /
analyzed: vedaḥ hi dharmam sukha sādhanam adharmam ca duḥkha sādhanam āha

original: tatra yadīśvaro dharmādharmānapekṣya viṣamo nirghṛṇaśca syāt tadā vedoditaṃ dharmādharmayoḥ sukhaduḥkhasādhanatvamasatsyāt /
analyzed: tatra yadi īśvaraḥ dharma adharmān apekṣya viṣamaḥ nirghṛṇaḥ ca syāt tadā veda uditam dharma adharmayoḥ sukha duḥkha sādhanatvam asat syāt
tathā ca tasya katham prāmāṇyam syāt
atas sūtrakāreṇa karma ādi sāpekṣa tā pakṣam urarīkṛtya tat parihṛtam

original: ato 'nyattu dvitīyaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ nairghṛṇyaṃ ca na vaiṣamyādināmakaṃ dūṣaṇarūpaṃ na bhavatīti yāvat /
analyzed: atas nyat tu dvitīyam vaiṣamyam nairghṛṇyam ca na vaiṣamya ādi nāmakam dūṣaṇa rūpam na bhavati iti yāvat

original: tathāhi vaiṣamyādikaṃ tāvanna svarūpeṇa doṣaḥ kintu doṣahetutayā /
analyzed: tathā hi vaiṣamya ādikam tāvat na svarūpeṇa doṣaḥ kintu doṣa hetutayā
na ca idam veda aprāmāṇya kāraṇam
nā api jīvānām iva īśvarasya pratyavāya hetuḥ
tad abhāvāt
atas dūṣaṇa tvāt aṅgīkṛtam sūtrakṛtā iti na kaścid doṣaḥ
tathā ca bhāgyam
na ca punar vaiṣamya ādi āpātena doṣaḥ iti
iti śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām vaiṣamya nairghṛṇya adhikaraṇam
atha śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām sarva dharma upapatti adhikaraṇam
om sarva dharma upapatteḥ ca om

original: sarve cetanā apūrṇaguṇā doṣiṇaśca dṛṣṭāstaddṛṣṭāntena cetanatvādīśvarasyāpi samāsavyāsābhyāmaparipūṇarguṇatvaṃ doṣitvaṃ ca syāditi pūrvapakṣo  #

analyzed: tatra manaḥ vṛttim api kāmam prati ātmanaḥ eva svāmi tvam na manasaḥ
aham kāmaye iti sākṣi anubhava siddha tvāt
manasaḥ tu kāmam pratyupādāna tvam eva
yathā hi

original: kṣetropādānakānāmapi sasyānāṃ kṛṣīvala eva svāmī na kṣetraṃ tathaiva /
analyzed: kṣetra upādānakānām api sasyānām kṛṣīvalaḥ eva svāmī na kṣetram tathā eva

original: naca vācyaṃ manasa eva kāmasvāmitvamahaṃ kāmaya ityanubhavastu bhrāntirvyavahāramātraṃ veti /
analyzed: na ca vācyam manasaḥ eva kāma svāmi tvam aham kāmaye iti anubhavaḥ tu bhrāntiḥ vyavahāra mātram vā iti
bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt
na ca kauṭasthyam bādhakam
antaḥkaraṇasya eva kāma upādāna tvena aṅgīkṛta tvāt
svāmi tva mātreṇa ca kauṭasthya avighātāt
anyathā kṛpaṇa dhanasya iva ātmanaḥ vaiyarthya āpatteḥ iti
tat idam uktam kvacid iti

original: nanvastu kāmasvāmitvamātmana eva mā bhūcca manasaḥ /
analyzed: nanu astu kāma svāmi tvam ātmanaḥ eva mā bhūt ca manasaḥ
tathā api pūrva uttara virodhaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva
icchā svāmi tva abhāve pi yādṛśa tādṛśasya icchāvat tvasya manasi aṅgīkṛta ttvāt iti atas āha icchā iti
icchā svāmi tvam eva uktam icchāvat tvam na ca aparam
acetana icchā apagata ityādau icchā svāmi tvam eva icchāvat tvam uktam
na ca aparam icchā upādāna tva lakṣaṇam
etat uktam bhavati
syāt atra pūrva apara virodhaḥ

original: yadi yadevecchāvattvaṃ prāṅmanaso niṣiddhaṃ tadevātra punaraṅgīkriyeta /
analyzed: yadi yat evā icchāvattvam prāk manasaḥ niṣiddham tat eva atra punar aṅgīkriyeta
na ca etat asti
pūrvam hi icchā svāmi tva lakṣaṇam icchāvat tvam ātmanaḥ eva na tu acetanasya iti uktam
tasya eva kartṛ tva upayogāt

original: śrutyarthatayā tvicchopādānatvalakṣaṇamicchāvatvamidānīṃ manaso 'bhyupagamyata iti kuto virodha iti / *7,156*

original: tatreśvaro 'ntaḥkaraṇaṃ spaṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra jñānecchāprayatnarūpā vṛttīḥ svecchājñānaprayatnairutpādya bāhyakaraṇāni cādhiṣṭhāya ghaṭādyutpādayati

original: tathā coktam“svasvāmibhāvo dhruva eṣa yatra tarhyacyute 'sāviti kṛtyayoge'; iti / *7,161*

original: upajīvyavirodhe tu na prāmāṇyamamuṣya ca'; iti /

original: tathāca yo mukto bhaviṣyati tasmādanya eva mokṣakāma itayuktaṃ syāt /

ca abhyupagacchanti

original: sāṅkhayamatasya nirastatvātkiṃ punarupanyāsenetyato 'sya matasya tato viśeṣaṃ tuśabdena sūcayati /

analyzed: kim anena śāstreṇa tad praṇetā viṣayam pratipadyate prayojanam ca labhate
uta vineyāḥ narāḥ
ādyam dūṣayati darśanena iti
darśanena asya kaḥ rthaḥ pratyakṣa gocaraḥ
labdhaḥ tena eva hi
kim ākṣepe
arthaḥ viṣayaḥ prayojanam ca
labdhaḥ upalabdhaḥ prāptaḥ ca
pratyakṣa gocaraḥ hi iti
tatra hetuḥ
tatas ca ayam arthaḥ
na tāvat anena śāstreṇa śāstra praṇetrā asti indriyaḥ rthaḥ upalabhyate
tad abhāvāt
na api aindriyakaḥ
tasya pratyakṣa gocara tvena viṣaya tva anupapatteḥ
a prāpte hi śāstram arthavat

original: kiñca pratyakṣeṇa tamarthamupalabhya khalvasau śāstre pravīṇavān /
analyzed: kiñca pratyakṣeṇa tam artham upalabhya khalu asau śāstre pravīṇavān
anyathā tat pra
praṇayana anupapatteḥ

original: tathāca taṃ prati tamevārthamupadarśayatkathaṃ saviṣayaṃ syāt /

evam prayojanam api na tāvat atīndriyam

mbha bādhita tvāt

tat tu pareṇa tyājitam iti
dvitīyam dūṣayati naraiḥ iti

original: ... naraiḥ śāstrāt kiṃ mohanaṃ vinā // MAnuv_2,2.40cd //

prayojanam ca dharma adharma śaṅkā uparuddha artha kāma upabhogaḥ
tat katham naraiḥ śāstrāt kim labdham iti ucyate
mā evam
viṣaya pratipattau hi prayojana avāptiḥ

original: viṣayaṃ ca kiṃ śāstramāptavākyatayā pratipādayet utopapattivyutpādanena /

original: śaṅkā hi saṃśayo vā syādviparyayo vā /

dvau api viparīta artha gocara balavat pratyaya nirasanīyau

tat idam darśanena
iti prakṛta anuvṛttau satya aṃśa astrāt kim

anyaiḥ ca mithyājñānam

niṣphalam śāstram iti vakṣyamāṇam siṃhāvalokana nyāye
k itena anuvartate

original: tataśca vyāpikāyāḥ svaparaviṣayaprayojanavattāyā abhāvāttadvayāptaṃ viṣayaprayojanavattvamapi nāstītyarthaḥ /

original: yata evaṃ svamatenaiva niṣphalaṃ nirviṣayaṃ ca na kevalaṃ paropapādanameva /

original: viṣayaprayojanaśūnyaṃ cārabhamāṇo na laukiko nāpi parīkṣaka ityunmattavadupekṣaṇīyaḥ syāditi /

original: na kevalaṃ paropapādanena kintu svābhyupagame 'pyarthābhāvādanārambhaṇīyaṃ śāstramiti śeṣa iti /

atiprasaṅgāt

original: tathāca kālāntarabhāviprayojanānvayinaḥ puruṣasya abhāvātkathaṃ dharmamokṣākhyaṃ prayojanamatīndriyaśca viṣayo 'ṅgīkartuṃ śakyata ityata āha-  #

original: yathā mamārtha iti pratītau bhedapratītipūrvaka eva sambandhābhāsa iti /

original: api tarhi ghaṭasya svarūpamitivadvayavahāramātramiti cenna kalpakābhāvāt /

viparīta pratīmi

kasyacid kadācid api dehaḥ ham iti pramā bhāvāt

original: nanvastvātmā dehātiriktastathāpyarthakāmātirikte puruṣārthe tatsādhanādau ca kiṃ mānam /

prāmāṇya paratas tva āvāde pi bādhaka abhāva ādinā pratyakṣa prāmāṇya siddhiḥ iti atas āha yadi iti

original: yadi tatsādhakaṃ vedaprāmāṇye na kathaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.43cd //

original: yadi pratyakṣajñānaprāmāṇyasya jñānagrāhakaṃ vā bādhakābhāvādikaṃ vā sādhakamucyate /

original: tarhi tadeva vedaprāmāṇyaviṣaye kathaṃ sādhakaṃ na bhavet /

nahi veda vākyāt jñānam na utpadyate
na ca na pratīyate
atra veda grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam
atas eva anyā iti sāmānyena vakṣyati
nanu jñāna grāhakasya prāmāṇya grāhaka tvam iti utsargaḥ
apavādena tva
satya prāmāṇyam api gṛhyate

samam etat pratyakṣe pi
anupalambhāt apavāda ādi abhāvaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ iti ced

na ca anya amāna tā kvāpi pramāṇena avasīyate

kvāpi viṣaye
yat vā pratyakṣa prāmāṇyam abhyupagacchan praṣṭavyaḥ

original: kiṃ tvayānubhūyamānasyaikasyaiva pratyakṣasya mānatvam uta sarvasyāpi pratyakṣasya /

original: itareṣāmapi pratyakṣāṇāṃ tattulyasāmagrījanyatve satyekasyaiva pratyakṣasya mānatvamiti kenāvasīyate /

original: pratyakṣasya mānatvameva sarvamapi pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti kenāvasīyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣasya māna tvam eva sarvam api pratyakṣam pramāṇam iti kena avasīyate
anubhūyamāna pratyakṣāt anyasya pratyakṣasya
tad prāmāṇyasya vā ca avasāyakam na kim api iti arthaḥ

original: parakīyavacanena ceṣyayā vā pratyakṣamavagamya pratyakṣatvena tasya prāmāṇyamavagamyata ityata āha- yadīti //
analyzed: parakīya vacanena ceṣyayā vā pratyakṣam avagamya pratyakṣa tvena tasya prāmāṇyam avagamyate iti atas āha yadi iti

original: pratyakṣasya tatprāmāṇyasya ca sādhakaṃ vacanamanumānaṃ ca yadi pramāṇamiṣyate tarhi vedādiprāmāṇye kathaṃ na bhavet /
analyzed: pratyakṣasya tad prāmāṇyasya ca sādhakam vacanam anumānam ca yadi pramāṇam iṣyate tarhi veda ādi prāmāṇye katham na bhavet
abhyupagamaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
evam anumāna āgama prāmāṇyam prati api vikalpaḥ
ādyaḥ tu pūrvavat nirastaḥ
apasiddhāntaḥ ca adhikaḥ
dvitīyam dūṣayati na ca iti
anyayoḥ para puruṣa ādi vartinoḥ anumāna āgamayoḥ amāna tā
pūrvavat āśraya ādi asiddheḥ
tad sādhaka aṅgīkāre ca vyāghātāt iti bhāvaḥ
nanu artha sannikṛṣṭa karaṇa janya tvāt pratyakṣam pramāṇam
anumāna āgamayoḥ atīta ādikam api viṣayīkurvatoḥ tad abhāvāt katham prāmāṇyam iti

original: kiṃ yāthārthyameva prāmāṇyaṃ tanniyāmakaśca sannikarṣaḥ anyathātiprasaṅgādityabhiprāyaḥ uta viṣayasannikṛṣṭakaraṇajanyatvaṃ prāmāṇyamiti /
analyzed: kim yāthārthyam eva prāmāṇyam tad niyāmakaḥ ca sannikarṣaḥ anyathā atiprasaṅgāt iti abhiprāyaḥ uta viṣaya sannikṛṣṭa karaṇa janya tvam prāmāṇyam iti

original: ādye 'pi kiṃ yathākathañcitsannikarṣo niyāmakaḥ uta saṃyoga eva /
analyzed: ādye pi kim yathā kathañcid sannikarṣaḥ niyāmakaḥ uta saṃyogaḥ eva
ādyam dūṣayati na ca iti
evam tarhi anyayoḥ anumāna āgamayoḥ amāna tā na asti
avinābhāva ādi sannikarṣasya tatra api sattvāt iti bhāvaḥ
dvitīye doṣam āha kvāpi iti
kvāpi pramāṇe cākṣuṣe śrāvaṇe ca
na avasīyate na abhyupagamyate ṛtha saṃyukta karaṇa janya tā
pareṇa golaka ādya
tiriktasya cakṣuḥ ādeḥ anabhyupagamāt
tad ātmakasya ca artha saṃyoga abhāvāt
tatas pratyakṣasya api kasyacid prāmāṇyam na syāt iti
dvitīyam dūṣayati na ca iti
yāthārthyāt anyā artha sannikṛṣṭa karaṇa janya tā lakṣaṇā māna tā na vaktavyā
kutas iti atas āha kvāpi iti
pūrvavat cākṣuṣa ādau avyāpteḥ iti bhāvaḥ
upalakṣaṇam ca etat
viparyaya ādau ativyāptiḥ ca iti api draṣṭavyam
yāthārthye sati idam lakṣaṇam iti ced
tarhi tat eva astu kim viśeṣyeṇa
anumāna ādi vyāvṛtti artham iti ced na
tad aprāmāṇyasya adya api asiddheḥ iti āha na ca iti
nanu veda ādi arthasya anupambha bādhita tvāt katham tad prāmāṇyam iti ced na
veda ādinā eva upalabdheḥ
tad anyena na upalabhyate iti ced
tat kim pramāṇa antara saṃvādi tvam prāmāṇyam
addhā iti ced tatra āha na ca iti
pramāṇa antara saṃvāda lakṣaṇā mānatā na iti arthaḥ
kutas na iti atas āha kvāpi iti
anavasthā prasaṅgāt kvāpi pramāṇe na avasīyate
yatas yat vā kvāpi sva sukha ādi jñāne

original: ṇe saṃvāda eva nāvasīyate iti yojyamityalam / *7,225*
analyzed: saṃvādaḥ eva na avasīyate iti yojyam iti alam
sūtra artham upasaṃharati sva matena iti
sva matena artha rahitaḥ upekṣyaḥ pakṣaḥ īdṛśaḥ
sva sammatyā eva artha rahitaḥ viṣaya prayojana rahitaḥ
īdṛśaḥ īśvara ādi atīndriya anabhyupagama lakṣṇaḥ
iti śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām abhyupagama adhikaraṇam
atha śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām puruṣa aśma adhikaraṇam
puruṣa aśma vat iti ced tathā api
om puruṣa aśma vat iti ced tathā api om
atra anīśvatra nirīśvara sāṅkhaya eka deśinām puruṣa upasarjana prakṛti kartṛkatva vādinām matam apākriyate
nanu evam tarhi tad anantaram eva idam ārambhaṇīyam
satyam
tathā api abhyadhika āśaṅkā anusāreṇa iyam uktiḥ
tathā hi
parama cetanasya bhagavataḥ eva sarva kartṛ tvam prāk uktam
tasya kevala prakṛti kartṛka tva vādaḥ sākṣāt virodhi iti prathamam apākṛtaḥ
tatra mā bhūt kevalasya acetanasya pradhānasya jagat kartṛ tvam
īśvara anugṛhītasya tu bhaviṣyati iti āśaṅkā dvitīya adhikaraṇe nirastā anirākṛtā

original: mā bhūdacetanasya kartṛtvaṃ kintu śarīrasyaiva caitanyāśrayasya kartṛtvamastvityāśaṅkaya śarīrasya caitanyāśrayatāyogāt punastadavasthaḥ kartṛtvāyoga  #
analyzed: mā bhūt acetanasya kartṛ tvam kintu śarīrasya eva caitanya āśrayasya kartṛ tvam astu iti āśaṅkaya śarīrasya caitanya āśraya tā yogāt punar tad avasthaḥ kartṛ tva ayoga
iti tṛtīye bhihitam

original: idānīṃ tu kevalasyācetanasya kartṛtvāyoge 'pi cetanasannidhānena tadupapatteḥ kimīśvare(ṇetyā)
analyzed: idānīm tu kevalasya acetanasya kartṛ tva ayoge cetana sannidhānena tad upapatteḥ kim īśvareṇa iti ā
ṇā iti eṣā śaṅkā nirākriyate

original: tanmatarītiḥ sūtra evokteti tadeva vyācaṣṭe- sannidhānāditi //
analyzed: tad mata rītiḥ sūtre evā uktā iti tat eva vyācaṣṭe sannidhānāt iti
sannidhānāt cetanasya vartate yadi acetanam
tathā api abuddhi pūrva tvāt ukta doṣaḥ samaḥ bhavet

original: yathā khalvacetanameva śarīraṃ cetanasyātmanaḥ sannidhānamātreṇa aśmānayanādikaṃ karoti /
analyzed: yathā khalu acetanam eva śarīram cetanasya ātmanaḥ sannidhāna mātreṇa aśma ānayana ādikam karoti
evam acetanā api prakṛtiḥ puruṣa sannidhānāt mahat ādi kāryam kariṣyati
tathā ca prayogaḥ
mahat ādikam puruṣa upasarjana prakṛti kartṛkam kārya tvāt aśma ānayana ādi vat iti
evam ca kim īśvareṇa iti śaṅkā arthaḥ
yadi api evam abhyadhikam āśaṅkitam tathā api racanā anupapatteḥ iti ukta doṣaḥ samaḥ bhavet
na parihṛtaḥ bhavet
kutas
a buddhi pūrva tvāt
prakṛteḥ iti śeṣaḥ
buddhiḥ pūrvā yasya tat buddhi pūrvam
jñāna icchā prayatnāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: na vidyate buddhipūrvaṃ yasya tattathoktaṃ tasya bhāvastattvam /
analyzed: na vidyate buddhi pūrvam yasya tat tathā uktam tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam
tasmāt
etat uktam bhavati
jñāna icchā prayatnavat tvam hi kartṛ tvam
na ca puruṣa sannidhāne pi
na prakṛteḥ buddhimat tvam sambhavati
acetana tva aṅgīkāra virodhāt
na ca buddhai abhāve tad kāryayoḥ icchā prayatnayoḥ api sambhavaḥ
tathā ca acetanasya kartṛ tva pratijñā vyāhatā eva iti
śarīrasya aśma ānayana ādi kartṛ tvam nidarśitam
tat katham etat im iti ced na
śarīrasya api ukta rītyā kartṛ tva asammateḥ
dūṣaṇa antaram ca dṛṣṭānte darśayitum sūtram
om aṅgitva anupapatteḥ om
iti
tat vayācaṣṭe aṅgi tvāt iti
aṅgi tva anupapatteḥ ca
aṅgi tvam puruṣasya eva sarvaiḥ api anubhūyate
tad aṅga tva uktitaḥ ca eva syāt sarvasya apalāpakaḥ
aṅgi tvam pradhāna tvam śarīram prati iti śeṣaḥ
tad aṅga tva uktitaḥ tasya upasarjana tva aṅgīkārāt
syāt sāṅkhayaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
nanu etat prakṛta viruddham
parameśvarasya hi sarva kartṛ tvam upapādayitum ayam ārambhaḥ

original: tathāca aśmānayanādikārye jīvasya prādhānyopapādanaṃ kathaṃ na prakaraṇaviruddhamiti cenna /
analyzed: tathā ca aśma ānayana ādi kārye jīvasya prādhānya upapādanam katham na prakaraṇa viruddham iti ced na

original: jīvagatasya amukhyasya kartṛtvasya nirāsa eva yadā pramāṇavirodhaḥ tadā kimu vaktavyaṃ
analyzed: jīva gatasya amukhyasya kartṛ tvasya nirāsaḥ eva yadā pramāṇa virodhaḥ tadā kimu vaktavyam
sarva kartuḥ īśvarasya apalāpaḥ iti etad pradarśanāya eva sūtrakṛtā jīvasya aṅgi tva upapādanāt iti āśayavān āha kimu iti
kimu sarveśvarasya asya hi apalāṣāt yatas khilam
asya sarva kartṛ tvena pratipipādayiṣitasya
uttara sūtre ca asya aṅgīkāra vāda tvam sphuṭībhaviṣyati iti hi śabdena sūcayati

original: kathaṃ jīvasya prādhānyanirāsādapyatiśayeneśvaranirāsaḥ pramāṇaviruddha ityata āha- yata iti //
analyzed: katham jīvasya prādhānya nirāsāt api atiśayena īśvara nirāsaḥ pramāṇa viruddhaḥ iti atas āha yatas iti

original: yataḥ kāraṇādakhilaṃ pramāṇaṃ yogipratyakṣānumānāgamātmakaṃ sarvakartāramīśvaraṃ pratipādayati tasmāditi pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: yatas kāraṇāt akhilam pramāṇam yogi pratyakṣa anumāna āgama ātmakam sarva kartāram īśvaram pratipādayati tasmāt iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ
iti śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām puruṣa aśma adhikaraṇam
atha śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām anyathā anumiti adhikaraṇam
anyathā anumitau ca jña śakti viyogāt
om anyathā anumitau ca jña śakti viyogāt om
prakṛti upasarjana puruṣa kartṛ tva vādinām nirīśvara sāṅkhaya eka deśinām matam atra nirākriyate
tathā hi aśma ānayana pra
na ādi pravṛttau tāvat puruṣasya prādhānyam śarīrasya ca upasarjana tvam anubhava siddham iti uktam
tathā ca tad dṛṣṭāntena mahat ādi kāryam api prakṛti upasarjana puruṣa kartṛkam anumīyate
puruṣasya ca cetana tvena na kartṛ tva anupapattiḥ
suṣupti ādau ca kartṛ tva anupalambhāt prakṛtiḥ upasarjana bhūtā aṅgīkaraṇīyā
evam ca kim īśvareṇa iti

original: atra vaktavyaṃ kiṃ puruṣasyaikākinaḥ kutrāpi svātantryaṃ nāsti uta astīti /
analyzed: atra vaktavyam kim puruṣasya ekākinaḥ kutra api svātantryam na asti uta asti iti
ādyam dūṣayitum sūtram vyācaṣṭe aṅgi tvam iti
aṅgi tvam yadi tasya eva svātantryam ced na ca akhilam
tad preraṇe pi aśakta tvāt svatantraḥ nyaḥ hi apekṣitaḥ
yadi puruṣasya eva aṅgi
sya aṅgi tvam prādhānyam kartṛ tvam iti yāvat
prakṛteḥ tu upasarjana tvam eva iti pūrva matāt anyathā anumīyate

original: tatrāpi ca puruṣasyākhilaṃ svātantryaṃ nāstīti pakṣo yadyaṅgīkriyate tadā svatantro 'nyaḥ parameśvaro 'ṅgīkaraṇīya eva syāt /
analyzed: tatra api ca puruṣasya akhilam svātantryam na asti iti pakṣaḥ yadi aṅgīkriyate tadā svatantraḥ parameśvaraḥ ṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ eva syāt
kutas
prakṛti preraṇe puruṣasya aśakta tvāt
mā bhūt tāvat kārya antara artham īśvara apekṣā
tathā api prakṛti preraṇa artham apekṣaṇīyaḥ eva asau iti apeḥ arthaḥ
etat uktam bhavati

original: na tāvatsattāmātreṇa saṃyogamātreṇa vā pradhānasya kartāraṃ puruṣaṃ pratyupasarjanatvam /
analyzed: na tāvat sattā mātreṇa saṃyoga mātreṇa vā pradhānasya kartāram puruṣam prati upasarjana tvam
supti pralaya ādau api prasaṅgāt
kintu karaṇa tva ādinā
na ca kartrā aprayujyamānasya karaṇa tva ādikam dṛṣṭam
na ca tat eva tad preraṇe karaṇa ādi
sva vṛtti virodhāt

original: tathāca prakṛtinirapekṣasya puruṣasya kvāpi vyāpārāsāmarthye 'vaśyamanyena sahakāriṇā bhāvyam /
analyzed: tathā ca prakṛti nirapekṣasya puruṣasya kvāpi vyāpāra asāmarthye vaśyam anyena sahakāriṇā bhāvyam
na ca asau api evaṃvidhaḥ eva
tasya api sahakāri antara apekṣāyām anavasthā prasaṅgāt
atas svatantraḥ eva asau aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ

original: sa eva ceśvara iti kathamasau nābhyupagamyata iti / *7,234*
analyzed: saḥ eva ca īśvaraḥ iti katham asau na abhyupagamyate iti
dvitīyam niṣedhati na ca iti
na ca svātantryam asya eva
tathā sati prakṛti anapekṣa tva prasaṅgena asya
sva siddhānta virodha āpatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ
anena vipratiṣedhāt ca iti sūtram vyākhyātam bhavati
vipratiṣedhāt ca asamañjasam
sūtrasya artha antaram āha pratyakṣa ādi iti
pratyakṣa ādi virodhataḥ
pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇaiḥ hi puruṣasya asvātantryam sarvadā
palabhyate
prakāra antareṇa vyācaṣṭe hita iti
hita ākṛti ādi doṣāt ca
ādi padena āhita kriyā upādīyate
evam pañca matāni nirākṛtya upasaṃharati bhadram iti
bhadram na anīśvaram matam
pātañjala abhimatasya īśvarasya īśvara lakṣaṇa abhāvāt tat api anīśvaram eva matam iti

original: nanvanyānyapi bhinnakasaṃsāramocakādīnyanīśvarāṇi matāni santi tāni kuto na nirākriyante /
analyzed: nanu anyāni api bhinnaka saṃsāra mocaka ādīni anīśvarāṇi matāni santi tāni kutas na nirākriyante
ukta doṣaiḥ eva nirasta tvāt abhyadhika āśaṅkā bhāvāt ca iti āha saṃsāriṇaḥ iti
saṃsāriṇaḥ sarva īśam sarva śaktim anaupamam
cetana acetanasya asya sattva ādeḥ tad adhīna tām

original: nāṅgīkurvanti ye teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca samā ime // MAnuv_2,2.49 //
analyzed: na aṅgīkurvanti ye teṣām sarveṣām ca samāḥ ime
saṃsāri padam īśvara atirikta upalakṣaṇam
sarva īśam iti viśeṣya padam
tena na paunaruktayam
upamā eva upamam
svārthikaḥ ṇ
na asti aupamam yasya asau anaupamaḥ
yat vā upamāyāḥ ayam aupamaḥ
sa upamaḥ iti yāvat
tatas nañ samāsaḥ
asya prapañcasya
ime kathitāḥ doṣāḥ iti śeṣaḥ
na kevalam sarva īśam sva rūpeṇa anaṅgīḥ kurvatām ime doṣāḥ
kintu tam aṅgīkṛtya api jīva adya
nya tva ādi viśeṣaṇāni tasya an aṅgīkurvatām api
tathātve phalataḥ tasya anīśvara tvāt iti
kim atas yadi evam anīśvara matam asamañjasam iti atas āha tasmāt iti
tasmāt śruti pramāṇena yuktibhiḥ ca paraḥ hariḥ
aṅgīkā yartamaḥ nityaḥ sarvaiḥ api su niścitam
na parapakṣa nirāsa mātreṇa sva pakṣa siddhiḥ iti atas śruti pramāṇena ityādi uktam
paraḥ utkṛṣṭaḥ ukta viśeṣaṇa upapannaḥ
nityaḥ iti sāmarthyāt aṅgīkārasya viśeṣaṇam
sarvadā iti yāvat
niścayasya sva para pakṣa sādhana upālambha atirikta anapekṣa tvāt prāmāṇika niścayasya ca asamīcīna tva ayogāt su niścitam iti uktam

original: prathamādhyāyavyutpāditena parapakṣopālambhena ca yathālakṣitaṃ brahma siddhamityāśayaḥ /
analyzed: prathama adhyāya vyutpāditena parapakṣa upālambhena ca yathā lakṣitam brahma siddham iti āśayaḥ
nanu evam tarhi uttara adhikaraṇānām ānarambhaḥ eva
nirākariṣyamāṇaiḥ u
rapi ukta viśeṣaṇasya īśvarasya anabhyupagata tvāt iti ced
satyam
tathā api tad matānām atyanta heya tā pradarśanāya dūṣaṇa antarāṇi vyutpādanayitum uttaraḥ granthaḥ
iti śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām anyathā anumiti adhikaraṇam
atha śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām vaiśeṣika adhikaraṇam
mahat dīrgha vat vā hrasva parimaṇḍalābhyām
