nitya jñāna prayatna iccham saṅkha yad yaiḥ api pañcabhiḥ
yuktam īśam vadanti anye
atra paramāṇu ārambha vādinām vaiśeṣika ādīnām matam apākriyate
nanu vaiśeṣika ādayaḥ parameśvaram aṅgīkurvanti eva

original: tatkathaṃ tannirāsāyādhikaraṇārambha ityāśaṅkaya yadyapīśvaraṃ svarūpeṇāṅgīkuvarnti tathāpi taddharmeṣu sukhādiṣu vipratipadyanta eva /
analyzed: tat katham tad nirāsāya adhikaraṇa ārambhaḥ iti āśaṅkaya yadi api īśvaram svarūpeṇa aṅgīkuvarnti tathā api tad dharmeṣu sukha ādiṣu vipratipadyante eva

original: tathā sṛṣṭipralayādividhiṃ cānyathā manyanta ityato yuktastannirāsāyādhikaraṇārambha ityāśayavāṃstanmatamupanyasyati- nityeti //
analyzed: tathā sṛṣṭi pralaya ādi vidhim ca anyathā manyante iti atas yuktaḥ tad nirāsāya adhikaraṇa ārambhaḥ iti āśayavān tad matam upanyasyati nitya iti
īśam vadantaḥ nye iti āhuḥ iti vakṣyamāṇena anvayaḥ
nityā jñāna prayatna icchā yasya asau tathā uktaḥ
saṅkhaya ādyaiḥ saṅkhaya a parimāṇa pṛthak tava saṃyoga vibhāgaiḥ
sa avadhāraṇam ca etat
evam aṣṭaguṇakam eva vadantaḥ iti
nitya dravya āśritāni ekatva ekapṛthaktava parimāṇāni nityāni eva dvitva dvipṛthaktava ādīni

original: saṃyogavibhāgau ca savartrānityā eveti siddhatvātsaṅkhayādau vidyamāno 'pi nityānityavibhāgo nābhihitaḥ /
analyzed: saṃyoga vibhāgau ca savartrā anityāḥ eva iti siddha tvāt saṅkhaya ādau nitya anitya vibhāgaḥ na abhihitaḥ
jñāna ādīnām tu jīva āśritānām anitya tvāt atra nitya tva saṅkīrtanam
yadi api kecid īśvaram ṣaḍguṇam ācakṣate
tathā api na tat paramam matam iti aṣṭaguṇa tvam eva upanyastam
evam ātreyasya jñāna anitya tvam api nā upanyastam
yat vā nitya tva saṅkīrtanam guṇa antara abhāve yukti tvena kṛtam
tathā hi
jīvātmānaḥ buddhi sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatna dharma adharma bhāvanābhiḥ navabhiḥ viśeṣa guṇaiḥ yuktāḥ
tatra nitya yathārtha jñānasya moha abhāvāt tad prabhavasya dveṣasya abhāvaḥ
tad abhāve tad mūlayoḥ dharma ādyayoḥ abhāvaḥ
icchāyāḥ api moha abhāvena arāga rūpa tvāt na dharma ādi kāraṇa tvam
dharma ādi abhāve ca tad kāryayoḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ abhāvaḥ eva
nitya jñāna tvāt eva smṛti asambhavena kalpaka abhāvāt bhāvanāyāḥ api abhāvaḥ iti
athavā nitya tvena jñāna ādīnām akhaṇḍa tvam sūcayati
evam api īśvara viṣayām vipratipattim upanyasya sṛṣṭi viṣayām upanyasyati tat icchā iti
tad icchā dṛṣṭa coditāḥ
paramāṇavaḥ catur vargāḥ saṃyujyante dviśas khilāḥ
mahāpralaye hi vakṣyamāṇaḥ nitya vargaḥ nityāḥ ca dharma adharma saṃskāra ādayaḥ vatiṣṭhante

original: tato brahmavarṣaśatānte prāṇināṃ bhogabhūtaye maheśvarasya sisṛkṣā sañjāyate /
analyzed: tatas brahmavarṣa śata ante prāṇinām bhoga bhūtaye maheśvarasya sisṛkṣā sañjāyate

original: tayā ca sarvātmagatā dharmādharmalakṣaṇādṛṣṭādayo labdhavṛttayo bhavanti /
analyzed: tayā ca sarva ātma gatāḥ dharma adharma lakṣaṇa adṛṣṭa ādayaḥ labdha vṛttayaḥ bhavanti
tatas tad icchayā sisṛkṣā lakṣaṇa īśvara icchayā adṛṣṭaiḥ adṛṣṭa vat ātma saṃyogaiḥ ca iti yāvat
coditāḥ preritāḥ
kriyāvantaḥ iti yāvat

original: prāk pravibhaktatayāvasthitāḥ paramāṇavaścaturguṇāḥ pāthirvāḥ pāthasīyāstaijasā vāyavīyāśca dviśaḥ saṃyujyante /
analyzed: prāk pravibhakta tayā avasthitāḥ paramāṇavaḥ caturguṇāḥ pāthirvāḥ pāthasīyāḥ taijasāḥ vāyavīyāḥ ca dviśas saṃyujyante

original: atra paramāṇava ityevokte manasāmapi grahaṇaṃ syāt /
analyzed: atra paramāṇavaḥ iti eva ukte manasām api grahaṇam syāt
teṣām saṃyoga sadbhāve vakṣyamāṇam dravya ārambhaka tvam gagana vat asparśavat tvāt ayuktam
atas tad vayāvṛttaye catur vargāḥ iti uktam

original: yadvā sajātīyasaṃyoga eva dravyārambhako na tvanya iti anena sūcayati /
analyzed: yat vā sajātīya saṃyogaḥ eva dravya ārambhakaḥ na tu anyaḥ iti anena sūcayati
akhilāḥ iti
dviśas saṃyoge niyama vacanāt

original: ye paramāṇavo dravyārambhāya saṃyujyante te 'khilā dviśo dvau dvāveveti / *7,249*
analyzed: ye paramāṇavaḥ dravya ārambhāya saṃyujyante te khilāḥ dviśas dvau dvau eva iti
tatas kim iti atas āha paramāṇu iti
paramāṇu dvayena eva dvayaṇukam nāma jāyate
dvayaṇuka trayeṇa tryaṇukam taiḥ caturbhiḥ tad ātmakam
tatas tu aniyamena eva khaṇḍa avayavinām bhavaḥ
tatas ca aniyamena eva sarva avayavi sambhavaḥ
paramāṇu puñja vādam pariṇāma vādam aniyama vādam ca evaśabdena vyāvartayati
paramāṇu dvayena eva
na tu nirantara tayā utpanna paramāṇu dvayam
nā api paramāṇu dvayam eva saṃyuktam āsādita pariṇāma viśeṣam
na ca traya ādinā iti
jāyate iti asatkārya vādam sūcayati
jāti apekṣayā ekavacanam

original: tataśca saṃyuktasajātīyaparamāṇudvayaistato 'tyantabhinnāni tatsamavetāni prāgasantyeva dvayaṇukanāmakāni dravyāṇyutpadyanta ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca saṃyukta sajātīya paramāṇu dvayaiḥ tatas tyanta bhinnāni tad samavetāni prāk asanti eva dvayaṇuka nāmakāni dravyāṇi utpadyante iti arthaḥ
dvayaṇuka trayeṇa tryaṇukam jāyate iti anurvate
eva iti ca
atra api pūrvavat vayākhyānam
aṇu tva parimāṇasya paramāṇau dvayaṇuke ca sāmyāt dvayaṇuka saṃjñā vat tryaṇuka saṃjñā api upapadyate eva

original: taiḥ sajātīyaiḥ saṃyuktaiścaturbhistryaṇukaiḥ tadātmakaṃ dravyaṃ jāyate /
analyzed: taiḥ sajātīyaiḥ saṃyuktaiḥ caturbhiḥ tryaṇukaiḥ tad ātmakam dravyam jāyate
tryaṇukeṣu aṇu saṃjñā upacārāt
kecid dvayaṇukaiḥ eva catur aṇuka ārambham abhyupayanti
tad mata anusāreṇa taidvaryaṇukaiḥ iti vyākhyeyam
dvayaṇukāni trīṇi dravyam
yat kāyarma ārabhante tat tri aṇukam
caturbhiḥ ārabdham catur aṇukam iti
atra ca saṃjñā mukhyā eva
tatas tri aṇukebhyaḥ catur aṇekebhyaḥ vā
tuśabdaḥ viśeṣa arthaḥ
tam eva āha
aniyamena eva etāvadbhiḥ eva iti saṅkhaya aniyamam vinā iti arthaḥ
dravya samavāyi kāraṇāni khaṇḍa avayavinaḥ

original: tryaṇukāderantyāvayavinaśca madhye naikameva khaṇḍāvayavi kintu aniyamenānekānyapi bhavantīti sūcayituṃ bahuvacanam /
analyzed: tryaṇuka ādeḥ antya avayavinaḥ ca madhye na ekam eva khaṇḍa avayavi kintu aniyamena anekāni api bhavanti iti sūcayitum bahuvacanam

original: tataḥ taiḥ khaṇḍāvayavibhiścāniyamenaiva saṅkhayāniyamaṃ vinaiva sarvāvayavināmantyāvayavināṃ śarīrendriyaviṣayāṇāṃ sambhavaḥ /
analyzed: tatas taiḥ khaṇḍa avayavibhiḥ ca aniyamena eva saṅkhaya aniyamam vinā eva sarva avayavinām antya avayavinām śarīra indriya viṣayāṇām sambhavaḥ
tat anena dravya utpattiḥ abhihitā
guṇānām karmaṇām ca sva āśraya dravyeṣu utpādaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
sarvam api kāryam bhāva rūpam kāraṇa tritaya janyam
kāraṇāni ca samavāyi asamavāyi nimitta anāmāni
tatra yat sama
samavetam tat samavāyi kāraṇam
tad svarūpeṇa darśayati kāraṇam iti

original: kāraṇaṃ samavāyyākhyaṃ paramāṇvādi tatra hi // MAnuv_2,2.54ab //
analyzed: kāraṇam samavāyi ākhyam paramāṇu ādi tatra hi
atra dvayaṇuka ādi kārya utpattau paramāṇu ādi dravya padārthaḥ samavāyikāraṇam
kutas

original: atra paramāṇvādau dravye hi yasmātsarvakāryaṃ samavetamutpadyate tasmāditi śeṣaḥ / *7,254*
analyzed: atra paramāṇu ādau dravye hi yasmāt sarva kāryam samavetam utpadyate tasmāt iti śeṣaḥ
samavāyi asamavāyi vyatiriktam kāraṇam nimittam
tat udāharati īśa iti
īśa icchā dṛṣṭa kālāḥ tu nimittam kāraṇam matam
nimittam tu iti anvayaḥ
idam ca sarva kārya sādhāraṇam nimittam darśitam
evam anyat api draṣṭavyam
yathā turī vema ādikam paṭasya ityādi
samavāyi kāraṇa pratyāsannam avadhṛta sāmarthyam asamavāyi kāraṇam
samavāyi kāraṇa tad samavāyi kāraṇayoḥ anyatara samaveta tvam samavāyi kāraṇa pratyāsanna tvam
sāmarthya avadhāraṇam ca ananyathāsiddha niyata pūrva bhāvi tvena bhavati
tat ca asamavāyi kāraṇam dravyam samavāyi kāraṇam iti vat na eka uktayā vaktum śakyam
pratikāryam pṛthaktavāt

original: atastadvivekena darśayituṃ tajjñānasya kāyarjñānasāpekṣatvātkāryākāryavibhāgaṃ tāvadāha- sāmānyeti // *7,256*
analyzed: atas tad vivekena darśayitum tad jñānasya kāya ṛju jñāna sāpekṣa tvāt kārya akārya vibhāgam tāvat āha sāmānya iti
sāmānya antya viśeṣau ca samavāyaḥ ca tat trayam

original: nityaṃ kriyā anityāstu guṇadravye dvirūpake // MAnuv_2,2.55 //
analyzed: nityam kriyāḥ anityāḥ tu guṇa dravye dvi rūpake

ṣaṭ ime dravya guṇa karma sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyāḥ bhāva rūpāḥ padārthāḥ
abhāvaḥ saptamaḥ
vidhi rūpaḥ bhāvaḥ
niṣedha rūpaḥ abhāvaḥ
guṇa āśrayaḥ dravyam
samavāyi kāraṇam vā
calana ātmakam karma
nityam ekam aneka anugatam
ka samavetam sāmānyam

original: nityeṣveva dravyeṣveva vartanta eva ye te (antya)viśeṣāḥ /

atyanta vyāvṛtti hetavaḥ vā
ayuta siddhayoḥ sambandhaḥ samavāyaḥ

viśeṣaḥ iti eva ukte dravya guṇa karma sāmānyānām api grahaṇam syāt

dravyam ca daṇḍa ādikam a daṇḍi ādibhyaḥ devadatta ādikam vyāvartayati

original: tatra parasāmānyasyānuvṛttimātrahetutvena sāmānyamātratve 'pyaparasāmānyaṃ vyāvṛtterapi hetutvādviśeṣo 'pi ye vyāvartakā bhavanti te 'ntyāḥ

atyanta vyāvṛtti hetavaḥ iti yāvat
nahi daṇḍa ādikam tathā
daṇḍi antara ādibhyaḥ vyāvartaka tvāt

original: evaṃ kāryākāryavibhāgamuktavā yasya yadasamavāyikāraṇaṃ tadāha- kārya iti //

original: tataśca kārye 'kārye ca dravye jāyamānānāṃ guṇānāṃ samavāyikāraṇasamavāyikāraṇasthāḥ samavāyikāraṇasthāśca guṇāḥ samavāyikāraṇasthaṃ karma  #
analyzed: tatas ca kārye kārye ca dravye jāyamānānām guṇānām samavāyi kāraṇa samavāyi kāraṇa sthāḥ samavāyi kāraṇa sthāḥ ca guṇāḥ samavāyi kāraṇa stham karma
ca samavāyi anya kāraṇam asamavāyi kāraṇam
karmaṇaḥ ca asamavāyi kāraṇa sthāḥ guṇāḥ eva asamavāyi kāraṇam iti yojyam

dvitīyasya dravya kāraṇam tu iti anvayaḥ
yat vā dvau api anukta samuccaya arthau
tat ca uktam
tathā hi
kārya gatānām rūpa rasa gandha sparśa parimāṇa ekatva ekapṛthaktava uttara saṃyoga vibhāga guru tva drava tva sneha vegānām kāraṇa gatāḥ rūpa ādayaḥ samavāyikāraṇam

original: pārthivaparamāṇugatānāṃ rūparasagandhasparśānāṃ pārthivataijasaparamāṇugatadravyasya tadgata eva tejaḥ saṃyogaḥ /
analyzed: pārthiva paramāṇu gatānām rūpa rasa gandha sparśānām pārthiva taijasa paramāṇu gata dravyasya tad gataḥ eva tejaḥ saṃyogaḥ
sarvatra aneka tva anekapṛthaktavayoḥ āśraya gata eka tva ekapṛthaktavāni
saṃyoga vibhāga vegānām āśraya gatam karma
paratva aparatvayoḥ āśraya gatau diś kāla saṃyogau
ātma viśeṣa guṇānām ātma gataḥ manaḥ saṃyogaḥ
śabdasya ākāśa gatāḥ saṃyoga vibhāga śabdāḥ
karmaṇaḥ ca āśraya gatāḥ guru tva drava tva vega saṃyogāḥ iti
dravyasya tu samavāyi kāraṇānām avayavānām saṃyogaḥ samavāyi kāraṇam iti
uktasya kvacid apavādam āha evam iti

original: evaṃ sthite 'pi siddhānte viśeṣastatra kalpitaḥ // MAnuv_2,2.57ab //

original: kāraṇagataṃ parimāṇaṃ kāryagatasya parimāṇasyāsamavāyikāraṇamityevaṃ sāmānyataḥ siddhānte sthite 'pi,

original: tryaṇukādigataṃ tu mahattvaṃ dīrghatvaṃ ca caturaṇukādiparimāṇaṃ pratyasamavāyikāraṇaṃ bhavatyeveti / *7,276*

original: tatra dvayaṇukaparamāṇuparimāṇānāṃ tryaṇukadvayaṇukaparimāṇāni prati kāraṇatvābhāve vairūpyaṃ vijātīyatvaṃ kāraṇam /

sajātīyayoḥ eva hi tantu paṭa parimāṇayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

dvayaṇuka tryaṇuka parimāṇe na kārya kāraṇa bhāvavatī vijātīya parimāṇa tvāt

paramāṇoḥ aṇu tvam dvayaṇuka aṇu tvasya kāraṇam astu iti ced na

original: tatrāpi nityaparimāṇatvasya paramāṇutvasya ca vairūpyasya sattvāt /

original: prabalatarkopabṛṃhitamatanirāse sāmarthyaṃ sūtrakṛtaḥ kathamityata uktam- svayaṃ sākṣātsarvavidyānāmadhīśastasmātprabhuriti / *7,279*

na vaiśeṣika ādi mata virodhena ukta arthasya anyathātvam śaṅkanīyam

tathā hi
yat tāvat uktam dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇam na tryaṇuka ādi parimāṇasya asamavāyi kāraṇam iti

iti sūtram vyācaṣṭe mahat tvam ca iti
mahat tvam ca eva dīrgha tvam tryaṇuka ādyeṣu kalpitam
tasmāt ca sadṛśam kāryam tat kāryeṣu upajāyate

tri aṇuka ādyeṣu dravyeṣu

kāryam parimāṇam

original: kārye tryaṇuke dvayaṇuke ca samatvataḥ kāryaparimāṇatvādisāmyāditi hetuvacanam /

vibhakti vipariṇāmena vā sakāśāt iti adhyāhāreṇa vā tasmāt iti uktam
atra etāvat ādau vaktavyam

original: yathā tasmātkāryeṣu kāyarmupajāyate tathaiva hrasvatvātpārimāṇḍalyato 'pi kārye parimāṇaṃ jāyeta samatvato hīti / *7,285*

etat uktam bhavati

dvayaṇuka paramāṇu parimāṇam parimāṇa ārambhakam dravya samavāyi kāraṇa parimāṇa tvāt
tryaṇuka parimāṇa vat tryaṇuka dvayaṇuke vā parimāṇa ārabhya parimāṇavatī kārya dravya tvāt caturaṇuka ādi vat
dvayaṇuka paramāṇū parimāṇa asamavāyi kāraṇa parimāṇavantau dravya samavāyi kāraṇa tvāt tryaṇuka vat iti
na ca vivakṣita artha asiddhiḥ
anyathā anupapattyā tad siddheḥ

original: naca yatra kevalena pracayena parimāṇamārabhyate tatra vyabhicāra iti vācyam,
analyzed: na ca yatra kevalena pracayena parimāṇam ārabhyate tatra vyabhicāraḥ iti vācyam

dvayoḥ api kṷpta śakti tvāt

parimāṇa tvāt paṭa parimāṇa vat
ityādinā sat pratipakṣa tā iti ced na

paramāṇu parimāṇam parimāṇa anārambhakam nitya parimāṇa tvāt gagana parimāṇa vat iti api na
dravya samavāyi kāraṇa parimāṇa tva abhāvasya upādhi tvāt

paramāṇavaḥ dravya anārambhakāḥ nitya tvāt gagana vat
ityādi ābhāsa tulya tvāt ca

na ca anaṇu tvam upādhiḥ
vakṣyamāṇa nyāyena parimāṇa avāntara jāteḥ apākaraṇāt
pakṣīkṛtāt hrasva tvāt avyāvṛtteḥ ca

original: nanu ca tryaṇukādiparimāṇaṃ caturaṇukādiparimāṇaṃ ca sajātīyamiti yuktastatra kāryakaraṇabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: nanu ca tri aṇuka ādi parimāṇam catur aṇuka ādi parimāṇam ca sajātīyam iti yuktaḥ tatra kārya karaṇa bhāvaḥ
dvayaṇuka tryaṇuka parimāṇayoḥ tu vijātīya tvāt katham tathātvam iti atas dṛṣṭānta dārṣyāntikayoḥ sadṛśam iti uktam
yathā tri aṇuka ādi parimāṇāt catur aṇuka ādau sajātīyam parimāṇam utpadyate

original: tathā dvayaṇukaparamāṇuparimāṇādapi tryaṇukādau sajātīyaparimāṇotpādasyaiva sisādhayiṣitatvānna doṣa ityarthaḥ / *7,294*
analyzed: tathā dvayaṇuka paramāṇu parimāṇāt api tryaṇuka ādau sajātīya parimāṇa utpādasya eva sisādhayiṣita tvāt na doṣaḥ iti arthaḥ  /

original: nanu ca tryaṇukādau mahattvadīrghatve dvayaṇukādau tvaṇutvahrasvatve pramāṇasiddhe /
analyzed: nanu ca tryaṇuka ādau mahat tva dīrgha tve dvayaṇuka ādau tu aṇu tva hrasva tve pramāṇa siddhe

original: tatkathaṃ sājātyasādhane bādho na bhavedityata uktam- mahattvaṃ ceti //
analyzed: tat katham sājātya sādhane bādhaḥ na bhavet iti atas uktam mahat tvam ca iti
kalpanā eva eṣā vaiśeṣikāṇām na tu parimāṇa avāntara jāti bhede pramāṇam asti
kinnāma parimāṇam eka jātīyam evā utkarṣa apakaṣarvat iti bhāvaḥ
anena vairūpyasya asiddhiḥ uktā veditavyā
nanu ca dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇasya paramāṇu ādi parimāṇa ajanya tve bādhaka abhāvāt aprayojaka tvam anumānānām

original: dvayaṇukādiparimāṇasya saṅkhayaiva janmasambhavādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharan vāśabdaṃ vyākhyāti- nacediti //
analyzed: dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇasya saṅkhayā eva janma sambhavāt iti āśaṅkām pariharan vā śabdam vyākhyāti na ced iti

original: na cenmahattvataścaiva dīghartvādapi no bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.61ab //
analyzed: na ced mahattvataḥ ca eva dīghartvāt api no bhavet
ca api śabdau itaretarayoge
eva śabdaḥ naḥ bhavet eva iti sambaddhayate
idam iha vaktavyam
dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇe samavāyikāraṇa lakṣaṇam asti na vā iti

original: ādye 'samavāyikāraṇalakṣaṇasadbhāve 'pi tryaṇukādiparimāṇaṃ dvayaṇukādiparimāṇajaṃ ca cedbhavettadā tryaṇukādigatānmahattvato dīrghatvācca
analyzed: ādye samavāyikāraṇa lakṣaṇa sadbhāve tryaṇuka ādi parimāṇam dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇa jam ca ced bhavet tadā tryaṇuka ādi gatāt mahattvataḥ dīrgha tvāt ca
catur aṇuka ādi parimāṇam iti śeṣaḥ
idam uktam bhavati
yadi samavāyi kāraṇa pratyāsanna tva ādi sadbhāve pi na asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam tadā idam ativyāpaka tvāt alakṣaṇam syāt
tathāca na tathābhūtasya api mahat tva ādeḥ asamavāyikāraṇa tvam syāt iti
dvitīye kim samavāyi kāraṇa pratyāsattiḥ na asti uta sāmarthya avadhāraṇam
na ādyaḥ

samavāyi kāraṇa samaveta tva abhāvāt na ced dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇāt tryaṇuka ādi parimāṇasya utpādaḥ tadā

original: tryaṇukādigatābhyāṃ mahattvadīrghatvābhyāṃ caturaṇukādiparimāṇamapi no bhavet tasyāpi
analyzed: tri aṇuka ādi gatābhyām mahat tva dīrgha tvābhyām catur aṇuka ādi parimāṇam api no bhavet tasya api

original: sarveṣāmapi pakṣāṇāṃ duṣṭatvaṃ pratijānīte- sadṛśasya hīti // *7,300*

original: sadṛśasya hi kāryasya naiva yogaḥ kathañcana // MAnuv_2,2.61cd //

yogaḥ ghaṭanā

iti ced
yadi paramāṇu parimāṇāt aṇu tvena sajātīyam dvayaṇuke

dīrgha tve mahatvasya avarjanīya tvāt iti pakṣa dvaya dūṣaṇam spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam

original: atra tāvadvikalpiteṣu mahattvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti- na mahattvaṃ ceti //

parimāṇa utkarṣa taratama bhāvaḥ nantaḥ na vadhikaḥ iti eva dṛśyate
na tu iyat tā paricchedavān iti
bādhaka pramāṇa sadbhāvāt sādhaka abhāvāt ca iti arthaḥ
kāla atyaya apadiṣyam ca asmin pakṣe numānam iti āha tathā iti
tathā anantya maṇau api
tathāśabdaḥ dūṣaṇa samuccaye
na kevalam parimāṇa utkarṣa taratama bhāvaḥ nantaḥ iti dṛśyate
kintu asau aṇau parimāṇa apakarṣa tāratamye pi ānantyam anavadhika tvam dṛśyate iti arthaḥ
dṛśyate nantaḥ iti eva

original: itīyattāparicchedo na dṛṣṭānte dṛśyata iti evaśabdena uktam /

tat viśadayati na iti

paricchinnaḥ
mahat tvam iti dravya viśeṣasya ivam syā eva saṃjñā
tena āt mahataḥ iti eṣa vidhiḥ na bhavati

original: parimāṇotkarṣatāratamyasyeyattāparicchedo hi tathā sati dṛṣṭaḥ syāt /

original: yadi mahattattvādiparimāṇagaṇanayeśvarādiḥ etāvānpañcaguṇaparimāṇavān ṣaḍguṇaparimāṇavānveti paricchinnaḥ syāt /

atra mahat tattva grahaṇena idam sūcayati

original: yaduktaṃ vaiśeṣikādibhiḥ pṛthivyādīni navaiva dravyāṇi iti tadasat /

original: asmādetāvadbhāgameva parimāṇamapākṛṣṭate nāto 'dhikamityasyārthasya hi siddhāvapakarṣakāṣṭhāśrayabhūtaṃ kutaścidapyanutkṛṣṭamāṇaṃ dravyaṃ siddhayatīti

original: yathā hi parimāṇotkarṣo gaganādāvanadhikastathā tadapakarṣo 'pyanavadhika eveti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvābhyupagame na ko 'pi doṣa iti / *7,355*

ānantyam nāma analpa tvāt anyat iti etat pratyayayitum dṛṣṭānta antaram āha bahu tva iti
bahu tva alpa tvayoḥ yadvat sāṅkhayāyām upalabhyate
ānantyam
yadvat yathā saṅkhayāyām bahutva alpatvayoḥ viśeṣaṇatayā ānantyam upalabhyate
bahu tvam anantam alpa tvam ca anantam iti
tathā prakṛte pi iti

original: yadyanantvaṃ nāmānalpatvaṃ syāt tadā na bahutvasya viśeṣaṇaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yadi anantvam nāma analpatvam syāt tadā na bahutvasya viśeṣaṇam syāt
tasya eva tad viśeṣaṇa tva ayogāt
na api alpatvasya virodhāt
atas avaccheda abhāvaḥ eva ānanta tvam iti aṅgīkṛtya bahu tvam alpa tva ca ananta
ca aparyavasitam iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ boddhavyaḥ
tathā parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣayoḥ api iti
nanu ca na asti eva saṅkhayāyām bahu tva alpa tvayoḥ ānantyam
bahu tvasya parārdhe eva paryavasita tvāt
alpatvasya ca ekaā
tva avadhi tvam
yathā uktam
sā ca ekatva ādi parārdha paryantā iti

original: ataḥ kathamayaṃ dṛṣṭānta ityata āha- eketi //
analyzed: atas katham ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti atas āha eka iti
eka bhāgānām tāvat tvam hi eva gaṇyate
saṅkhayām adhikṛtya hi gaṇita śāstram pravṛttam
tatra ca kalā savaṇa ṛnapra bhāga bhāga anubandha bhāga apavāha bhāga bhāga ādi prakaraṇeṣu eka bhāgānām

original: tāvattvamanavadhikatvaṃ gamyate hi yasmāttasmādavagamyate astyekatvādapyapakṛṣṭānavadhikā saṅkhayeti /
analyzed: tāvattvam anavadhikatvam gamyate hi yasmāt tasmāt avagamyate asti ekatvāt api apakṛṣṭa anavadhikā saṅkhayā iti
parārdhāt paratas pi saṅkhaya asadbhāvaḥ sphuṭaḥ evā iti nā upapāditaḥ

original: sambhavati hi pareṣāmapīśvarāpekṣābuddhayā paramāṇvādau parārdhātparato 'pi saṅkhayotpattiḥ /
analyzed: sambhavati hi pareṣām api īśvara apekṣā buddhayā paramāṇu ādau parārdhāt paratas saṅkhaya utpattiḥ

original: tataḥ paraṃ saṃjñākaraṇaṃ tu gaṇakānāṃ prayojanābhāvāt /
analyzed: tatas param saṃjñākaraṇam tu gaṇakānām prayojana abhāvāt
etām eva vipratipattim apanetam saṅkhaya adṛṣṭānta upādānam kṛtam iti

original: evaṃ kālākāśayoḥ parimāṇotkarṣāpakarṣānantyaṃ sākṣiṇā prasādhyeśvare tadāgamena sādhayati- aṇīyāṃśceti //
analyzed: evam kāla ākāśayoḥ parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣa ānantyam sākṣiṇā prasādhya īśvare tad āgamena sādhayati aṇīyān ca iti
aṇīyān ca mahīyān ca bhagavān āgama uditaḥ
aṇoḥ aṇīyān mahataḥ mahīyān ātmā
iti āgamena bhagavān īśvaraḥ ṇoḥ api aṇīyān mahataḥ pi mahīyān uditaḥ
na ca tatra aṇu mahat śabdābhyām kiñcid vayavasthitam ucyate
viśeṣaṇa abhāvāt

original: tato yadyapakṛṣṭaparimāṇaṃ tatastato 'pyapakṛṣṭaparimāṇo yadyaccotkṛṣṭaparimāṇaṃ tatastato 'pyutkṛṣṭaparimāṇa ityuktaṃ syāt /
analyzed: tatas yadi apakṛṣṭa parimāṇam tatas tatas pi apakṛṣṭa parimāṇaḥ yat yat ca utkṛṣṭa parimāṇam tatas tatas pi utkṛṣṭa parimāṇaḥ iti uktam syāt
tathā ca īśvara gatayoḥ parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣayoḥ anavadhika tvam eva labhyate

original: nanvaṇīyānmahīyānityukta eva bhagavati parimāṇotkarṣāpakarṣayoḥ paryavasānātkathaṃ tayoḥ anavadhikatvamityata āha- aṇīyāniti //
analyzed: nanu aṇīyān mahīyān iti ukte eva bhagavati parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣayoḥ paryavasānāt katham tayoḥ anavadhika tvam iti atas āha aṇīyān iti
aṇīyān mahīyān iti uktayoḥ api aṇoḥ mahataḥ ca iti śabda viṣaya tvāt iti
nanu evam sati svasmāt api svayam apakṛṣṭaḥ utkṛṣṭaḥ ca iti āgatam

original: tatra yadā parimāṇānantyasya vācakastadā dvidhānantye 'pi utkarṣāpakarṣābhyāmanantye 'pi mānatāṃ yāti /

na tu utkarṣa ānantya mātre viśeṣa abhāvāt iti

ucyate

paricchedaḥ ca

original: do hi deśataḥ kālato vastutaśca bhavanyupagapadeva prāpnoti /

original: kimidaṃ kālato guṇataścālpatvamāpādyaṃ kimalpā eva guṇāḥ santi brahmaṇo na bahutarāḥ /

original: brahmaṇo 'lpaparimāravattvaṃ ca vyomaṃ dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya vyomavacceti sūtrakhaṇḍena prāha- sūtrakāraḥ /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ lpa parimāravat tvam ca vyomam dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya vyoma vat ca iti sūtrakhaṇḍena prāha sūtrakāraḥ
atas brahmaṇaḥ gaganasya vā anavadhika parimāṇa ra utkarṣa apakarṣa sadbhāvaḥ tad siddhāntaḥ bhavati eva iti

original: kiñca yo 'rtho niravakāśapramāṇasiddho yadviparyaye cāniṣyaṃ sa sarvo 'pi siddhānta eva /
analyzed: kiñca yaḥ rthaḥ niravakāśa pramāṇa siddhaḥ yad viparyaye ca aniṣyam sa sarvaḥ siddhāntaḥ eva
tatra kāla ākāśayoḥ īrapī

original: śvare cānavadhikaparimāṇotkarṣāpakarṣasadbhāvaḥ sākṣiṇā'gamena ca siddha ityuktam /
analyzed: śvare ca anavadhika parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣa sadbhāvaḥ sākṣiṇā āgamena ca siddhaḥ iti uktam
tad viparyaye bādhakam āha yadi iti

original: yadyalpadeśasaṃsthānaṃ na sarvatrāpi no bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.76cd //
analyzed: yadi alpa deśa saṃsthānam na sarvatra api no bhavet
kāla ādeḥ iti vartate
sarvatra api saṃsthānam iti ca
kāla ādīnām sarvagata tvam pareṇa api aṅgīkṛtam
sarvagata tvam ca sarvatra
deśe saṃsthānam

original: tathāca yadi kālāderalpālpataradeśeṣu saṃsthānaṃ na syāt /
analyzed: tathā ca yadi kāla ādeḥ alpa alpatara deśeṣu saṃsthānam na syāt
tadā sarvatra avasthānam api no bhavet
kutas iti atas āha sthitasya hi iti
sthitasya hi alpa deśeṣu sarvaga tvam bhavet dhruvam
ekatra api anavasthasya kutas evā akhila stha tā
dhruvam iti avadhāraṇe
alpa deśeṣu sthitasya eva iti
yathā khalu ekaikam varṇam uccārayataḥ eva savardha eva uccāraṇam
na tu ekam api varṇam an uccārayataḥ
tathā alpa alpatara deśeṣu sthitasya eva hi sarva deśa gata tvam bhavet
eka ekatra api deśe nava sthitasya akhila deśa stha tā kutas eva bhavet

original: anena yo yatsamudāyaṃ vyāpnoti sa tadekadeśānapi vyāpnoti(tyeva)
analyzed: anena yaḥ yad samudāyam vyāpnoti sa tad eka deśān api
yaḥ ca eka deśāt na vyāpnoti na asau tad samudāyam iti anvaya vyatirekau darśitau
na kevalam alpa alpatara deśa stha tva abhāve sarvaga tva abhāva prasaṅgaḥ
kintu śaśaviṣāṇa ādi vat sattā api na syāt iti āha śūnyatvam eva iti

original: śūnyatvameva tasya syād yasyaikatrāpi na sthitiḥ // MAnuv_2,2.78ab //
analyzed: śūnya tvam eva tasya syāt yasya ekatra api na sthitiḥ
evam ca kāla ādīnām alpa alpatara deśa avasthāne lpa alpatara parimāṇavat tvam api avarjanīyam iti anavadhika parimāṇa apakarṣa siddhiḥ

original: anavadhikotkarṣastu pareṇāpyaṅgīkṛta eveti na tadviparyaye bādhakamuktam /
analyzed: anavadhika utkarṣaḥ tu pareṇa api aṅgīkṛtaḥ eva iti na tad viparyaye bādhakam uktam
sarvatra api no bhavet iti eva vā draṣṭavyam
nahi parama mahā tva abhāve sarvagata tvam sambhavati
tathā ca āha vibhu tvāt mahān ākāśaḥ ityādi
alpa alpatara deśa paryavasitasya alpa alpatara parimāṇa tvam
na ca evam ākāśa ādi iti ced
tat kim ākāśa ādi samudita rūpam yena paryavasāna aparyavasāna viṣaya tvam aśnuvīta
kintu ekam eva
tat ca yadi alpa alpatara deśeṣu tiṣṭhet tadā tat tat parimāṇam bhavati eva bhavet eva

original: yadi tava tatra sthitasya tattatparimāṇatvaṃ tadā ghaṭādāvapi tatprasaṅga iti cenna /
analyzed: yadi tava tatra sthitasya tad tad parimāṇa tvam tadā ghaṭa ādau api tad prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na

ākāśa ādeḥ anāśrita tvāt

original: nahi ghaṭo gaganena saṃyujyamāno bhavati paramamahānnāpi paramāṇunā saṃyujyamānaḥ paramāṇuḥ /

original: svayaṃ ca tatparimāṇa iti ko doṣaḥ /

original: ato nāṇutvaviśrāntirna mahattvasya ca kvacit // MAnuv_2,2.78cd //

original: yadi sākṣī svayambhāto na mānaṃ kena gamyate /
analyzed: yadi sākṣī svayambhātaḥ na mānam kena gamyate
akṣaja ādeḥ ca māna tvam

original: sākṣī nāma mānaṃ yadi neṣyate tadākṣajāderjñānasya mānatvam /
analyzed: sākṣī nāma mānam yadi na iṣyate tadā akṣa ja ādeḥ jñānasya māna tvam

original: caśabdādbahiḥ kālākāśādikamantaḥsukhādikaṃ ca kena pramāṇena gamyate /
analyzed: caśabdāt bahis kāla ākāśa ādikam antar sukha ādikam ca kena pramāṇena gamyate
na kena api
tad grāhakasya pramāṇa antarasya abhāvāt
na ca tat mā bhūt iti vācyam
tad vayavahāra vilaya prasaṅgāt iti
nanu astu sākṣiṇam an aṅgīkurvāṇasya idam bādhakam
sādhakam tu
kim iti atas āha svayambhātaḥ iti

original: yastu svayaṃ prakāśamāne 'pi sākṣiṇi vipratipadyate so 'kṣajādermānatvaṃ sapramāṇakaṃ vastutvādghaṭavaditi prasaṅgasūcitenānumānena bodhanīyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu svayam prakāśamāne sākṣiṇi vipratipadyate saḥ kṣaja ādeḥ māna tvam sa pramāṇakam vastu tvāt ghaṭa vat iti prasaṅga sūcitena anumānena bodhanīyaḥ
prasakta pratiṣedhaḥ ca vakṣyamāṇa nyāyena bhaviṣyati

original: dhamirgrāhakapramāṇenaiva siddherna tatprāmāṇye pṛthak pramāṇaṃ vaktavyam /
analyzed: dhamiḥ grāhaka pramāṇena eva siddheḥ na tad prāmāṇye pṛthak pramāṇam vaktavyam
atas eva mānam iti uktam
na sākṣiṇaḥ na abhyupagame pi akṣaja ādi jñāna prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇikam prasajyate

original: pravṛttisāmarthyena tajjātīyatvena vānumānena tatsiddherityata āha- anavastheti //
analyzed: pravṛtti sāmarthyena tad jātīya tvena vā anumānena tad siddheḥ iti atas āha anavasthā iti
anavasthā athavā bhavet
anyathā sākṣi itara pramāṇa vedya tva aṅgīkāre
tarhi sākṣi prāmāṇyam api anyena grāhyam iti anavasthā evā iti ced na
tasya sva prakāśa tvāt iti
tat idam uktam svayambhātaḥ iti

original: kimato yadyevaṃ sākṣī nāma pramāṇamastītyata āha- ata iti //
analyzed: kim atas yadi evam sākṣī nāma pramāṇam asti iti atas āha atas iti
atas sarva padārthānām bhāgāḥ santi eva sarvadā
sarva dikṣu api sambandhāt
sākṣitaḥ iti arthaḥ
sarva padārthānām paramāṇoḥ tad bhāgānām ca iti arthaḥ
santi eva iti siddham iti śeṣaḥ
yat vā sarva padārthānām iti anena anumānam api sūcayati
paramāṇuḥ sa bhāgaḥ padārtha tvāt ghaṭa vat iti
na ca āśraya asiddhiḥ dharmi grāhaka virodhaḥ vā
sākṣiṇā paramāṇu siddheḥ ukta tvāt
tena ca sabhāga tayā eva siddheḥ
na ca evam anumāna vaiyarthyam
pramāṇa samplava aṅgīkārāt
sa bhāga tva mātre vipratipannam prati sārthakyāt ca
anumāna antaram āha sarvadā iti
yugapad iti arthaḥ
sarva dikṣu sthitaiḥ dravyaiḥ sambandhāt saṃyogāt api bhāgāḥ santi iti avagamyate
yadi api sa bhāga tva mātra sādhane saṃyogi tva mātram prayojakam
gagana ādīnām api bhāga aṅgīkāreṇa vyabhicāra abhavāt
tathā api bahu bhāga sādhanāya viśeṣaṇa upādānam
tathā hi
paramāṇuḥ daśa bhāgavān yugapad daśa mūrta saṃyogi tvāt pa
ghaṭa vat iti
nanu dravya tvena eva alam kim saṃyogi tvena
hetu ucchitti rūpa
vipakṣe bādhaka sūcana artham iti brūmaḥ
tathā hi
asti tāvat paramāṇoḥ paramāṇu antara saṃyogaḥ
anyathā dvayaṇuka ādi ārambha anupapatteḥ
na ca ekena eva iti niyamaḥ
kāraṇa akāraṇa saṃyoga ja saṃyoga prakriyāyām ekaikasya paramāṇoḥ sajātīya vijātīya paramāṇu dvayena yugapad saṃyogasya urarīkṛta tvāt
pāṣāṇa ādi madhya vartinaḥ paramāṇoḥ paritas sthitaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ saṃyoga abhāva ādi anupapatteḥ ca
na ca mūrtānām yugapad eka deśa avasthānam sambhavati
pradeśa vartinaḥ ca saṃyogāḥ
sākṣi siddha tvāt
ghaṭa ādau tad darśanena ca
tathā ca yadi paramāṇuḥ aneka aṃśaḥ na syāt
tadā yugapad anekaiḥ na saṃyujyate iti
nanu saṃyogasya pradeśa vṛtti tvam nāma sva atyanta abhāva samāna deśa tvam eva
na tu ghaṭa saṃyogaḥ ghaṭa avayave vartate iti
tat katham bhāga abhāve saṃyoga anupapattiḥ iti
mā evam
vakṣyate ca etat

original: nanu paramāṇuḥ sāvayava iti svavyāghātasya mukhyamudāharaṇam /
analyzed: nanu paramāṇuḥ sa avayavaḥ iti sva vyāghātasya mukhyam udāharaṇam

original: yo hi sarvataḥ apakṛṣṭo yataḥ paramāṇurnāsti taṃ paramāṇumācate /
analyzed: yaḥ hi sarvatas apakṛṣṭaḥ yatas paramāṇuḥ na asti tam paramāṇum ācate

original: tasya sāvayavatve 'vayavino 'vayavānāmapakṛṣṭaparimāṇatvāvaśyambhāvātkathaṃ na vyāhatirityata āha- avibhāga iti //
analyzed: tasya sāvayava tve vayavinaḥ vayavānām apakṛṣṭa parimāṇa tva avaśyambhāvāt katham na vyāhatiḥ iti atas āha avibhāgaḥ iti
avibhāgaḥ parāṇu tā
syāt ayam virodhaḥ yadi idam paramāṇu pada pravṛtti nimittam syāt
na ca evam
sāvayava tayā sākṣi siddhe tad asambhavāt
kintu avibhāgaḥ para aṇu tā paramāṇu śabda pravṛtti nimittam
tathā ca kutas vyāghātaḥ iti
nanu avibhāgaḥ iti katham idam vijñāyate

guṇa ādeḥ api paramāṇu tva prasaṅgāt

asambhavāt

mā evam

original: yasya vibhinnāvayaveṣu satsvapi teṣāṃ vibhāgo na kadāpi bhavitumarhati sa paramāṇuriti vyākhyānāt /
analyzed: yasya vibhinna avayaveṣu satsu api teṣām vibhāgaḥ na kadāpi bhavitum arhati sa paramāṇuḥ iti vyākhyānāt
śrama abhāve na vasthā iti api parāstam
mūla kṣaya abhāvasya sūcita tvāt
yat vā vibhidyate vibhajyate iti vibhāgaḥ
tad abhāvaḥ paramāṇu tā iti
yatas sva avayavam vinā svatantram anavayava rūpam apakṛṣṭa parimāṇam vastu
na asti sa paramāṇuḥ iti yāvat
nanu evam avayava paramparā viśrānti abhāve nanta avayava ārabdha tva aviśeṣāt sarṣapa mahīdharayoḥ parimāṇa aviśeṣaḥ syāt
na ca kāraṇa saṅkhaya aviśeṣe tad parimāṇa pracaya viśeṣāt sarṣapa mahīdharayoḥ parimāṇa viśeṣaḥ iti vācyam
avayava ānantya sāmye tayoḥ api anupapatteḥ iti
ucyate
kim ayam prasaṅgaḥ
uta anumānam
ādye hi ayam arthaḥ
yadi sarṣapa mahīdharau aviśrānta avayava parasparau syātām tadā ananta avayava ārabdhau
tathā ca sama parimāṇau bhavetām iti
tatra ubhayatra api vyāpti abhāvaḥ
yat aviśrānta avayava parasparam tat ananta avayava ārabdham
yat ca evam tat tulya parimāṇam iti
kinnāma bhavatā upalabdham
kiñca avayava paramparā viśrānti abhāva te sarve sambhūya anantāḥ syuḥ
sa ṣarpa mahīdhara ārambhakāṇām ānantyam tu kutas
atas eva dvitīya prasaṅgasya āpādaka asiddhiḥ

original: etenāvayavaparamparāviśrāntyabhāve samasaṅkhayāvayavārabdhatvaṃ tataścāvayavaparimāṇādiviśeṣābhāve parimāṇāviśeṣaḥ syāditītyapi parāstam /

vyāpti asiddheḥ
sama saṅkhaya avayava ārabdha tva asiddheḥ ca
dvitīye tu idam uktam syāt
sarṣapa mahīdharau na ananta avayava ārabdhau visadṛśa parimāṇa tvāt
vimatau na aviśrānta avayava paramparau ananta avayava anārabdha tvāt iti
ādye siddhasādhanam
nahi sarṣapa ādeḥ avayava paramparā viśrānti abhāva ādinā ananta avayava ārabdha tvam aṅgīkṛtam
kintu sambhūtānām ananta tvam
tad abhāva sādhane mām prati dṛṣṭānta abhāvaḥ
guṇa ādau sādhana abhāvāt
dvitīyasya tu aprayojaka tā iti
syāt etat

original: sarṣapāvayavaparamparāyā niravadhikatve mūrtānāṃ samānadeśatvānupapattau sarṣapāvayavairjagati vyāpte viśvavyāpī sarṣapaḥ syāditi mahīdharasyānavakāśa  #
analyzed: sarṣapa avayava paramparāyāḥ niravadhika tve mūrtānām samāna deśa tva anupapattau sarṣapa avayavaiḥ jagati vyāpte viśva vyāpī sarṣapaḥ syāt iti mahīdharasya anavakāśa
eva iti āpādana artham iti ced na
pārthiva paramāṇūnām ananta tve pi sa mūrta antara avakāśa darśanāt

original: sarṣapo yāvantaṃ deśamavaṣṭabhya vartamāno dṛśyate tāvatyevānavadhikāyā api tadavayavaparamparāyā avasthānācca /
analyzed: sarṣapaḥ yāvantam deśam avaṣṭabhya vartamānaḥ dṛśyate tāvatī eva anavadhikāyāḥ api tad avayava paramparāyāḥ avasthānāt ca
atas eva hi ākāśa ādīnām api anavadhikam aṃśa paramparām upetya tatra parimāṇa apakarṣa ānantyam upapāditam
nanu mā bhūt sākṣāt sarṣapa mahīdhara ārambhakāṇām sama saṅkhaya tvam

original: tathāpyavayavaparamparāyā viśrāntyabhāve sambhūtāvayavānāṃ samasaṅkhayatvātparimāṇabhedo na syādi(tyucyata iti)ti cenna /
analyzed: tathā api avayava paramparāyāḥ viśrānti abhāve sambhūta avayavānām sama saṅkhaya tvāt parimāṇa bhedaḥ na syāt iti ucyate iti ti ced na
ānantye pi tāratamya sambhavāt
anantāḥ hi pārthiva paramāṇavaḥ nantāḥ ca antya viśeṣāḥ
na ca te sama saṅkhayāḥ
tathā sati āpya paramāṇuṣu tad abhāva āpātāt
tathā sarva kalpeṣu saṃsāriṇaḥ nantāḥ
tathā api apavarga vaśāt tāratamyam upeyam eva
evam anekam udāharaṇam iti
yat etat sūtrakṛtā parimāṇa asamavāyi kāraṇa viṣaye dūṣaṇam uktam
tat upalakṣaṇa mātram
anyatra api asamavāyi kāraṇe svayam dūṣaṇāni ūhanīyāni iti āśayavān dravya asamavāyi kāraṇa saṃyoga viṣaye anyathā pratipattim nirākaroti tad saṃyogāt iti
tad saṃyogāt aniyatāt padārthānām janiḥ bhavet

original: avayavasaṃyogo dravyāsamavāyikāraṇamiti vadanto 'pi vaiśeṣikādayaḥ paramāṇukāryotpattau dvayoreva sajātīyayoreva paramāṇvoreva saṃyoga(syāsamavāyikā)

kāraṇa tvam ityādi acakṣate
tat aśraddheyam kim nāma teṣām kāraṇānām aniyatāt ukta niyama rahitāt saṃyogāt padārthānām dravyāṇām janiḥ bhavet
kiñcid kāryam dvayoḥ paramāṇvoḥ saṃyogāt upajāyate
tat dvayaṇukam ucyate

original: kadācit trayāṇāṃ tattryaṇukaṃ caturbhiḥ paramāṇubhirārabdhaṃ ca(tacca)turuṇukam /
analyzed: kadācid trayāṇām tat tryaṇukam caturbhiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ ārabdham
evam anyat api

evam dvayaṇuka kārya utpatta śava api aniyamaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: kuta iti cet uktaniyame pramāṇābhāvādityāha- dvayoreveti //
analyzed: kutas iti ced ukta niyame pramāṇa abhāvāt iti āha dvayoḥ eva iti

original: dvayoreva tu saṃyoga iti kenāvasīyate // MAnuv_2,2.82cd //

tuśabdaḥ viśeṣa arthaḥ
tena sajātīyayoḥ paramāṇvoḥ iti niyamaḥ labhyate
saṃyogaḥ ādi kāryasya asamavāyi kāraṇam iti śeṣaḥ
kena pramāṇena iti ākṣepe
upalakṣaṇam etat
trayāṇām eva dvayaṇukānām iti api draṣṭavyam

paramāṇuḥ tu niravayavaḥ iti dvayoḥ eva iti niyama siddhiḥ iti ukta uttaram

original: nanu sajātīyasaṃyoga evārambhaka iti niyamo na niṣpramāṇakaḥ /

paramāṇu kārye gandha ādi utpatteḥ eva tatra pramāṇa tvāt
tathā hi
pārthiva āpya paramāṇubhyām yadi ekam kāryam utpadyate tadā tat agandham asneham āpadyeta
pārthiva taijasābhyām utpannam a gandha rūpam utpadyeta
ekasya gandha ādeḥ anārambhaka tvāt
atas gandha ādi utpattyā eva sajātīya saṃyogasya ārambhaka tva siddhiḥ iti atas āha kāraṇasya iti

original: kāraṇasya guṇāstena bhaveyuḥ kāryagā api // MAnuv_2,2.83ab //
analyzed: kāraṇasya guṇāḥ tena bhaveyuḥ kārya gāḥ api
tena iti
dvayoḥ eva iti niyama abhāvena iti arthaḥ

original: yadi dvayoreva paramāṇvoḥ saṃyogaḥ kāryārambhaka iti niyamaḥ pramāṇavānsyāt /

original: tathāca bahūnāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ vijātīyānāṃ saṃyogātakāryārambhe kāraṇagatā gandhādayo guṇāḥ (sadvitīyāḥ)
analyzed: tathā ca bahūnām paramāṇūnām vijātīyānām saṃyogāt a kārya ārambhe kāraṇa gatāḥ gandha ādayaḥ guṇāḥ sa dvitīyāḥ
sajātīyāḥ santaḥ kārya gāḥ
kārya gata gandha ādi ārambhakāḥ api bhaveyuḥ kaḥ doṣaḥ
nanu aniyama vādinā dvaya saṃyogasya ārambhaka tvam tāvat iṣyate

original: tatra vijātīyayorārambhakatve kārye gandhādyanutpattiḥ prasajyata iti cenna /
analyzed: tatra vijātīyayoḥ ārambhaka tve kārye gandha ādi anutpattiḥ prasajyate iti ced na
ekaikasya api gandha ādeḥ ārambhaka tve bādhaka abhāvāt
apekṣaṇīya antara abhāvāt santa utpatti prasaṅgaḥ bādhakaḥ iti ced na
kārya dravya utpatteḥ apekṣaṇīya tvāt
samavāyi kāraṇa abhāve kārya anutpādāt
anyathā aneka gandha ādi abhyupagame samānaḥ doṣaḥ
etat ca paramata rītyā uktam

original: vastutastu yataḥ kāraṇānyeva kāryākāreṇotpadyante tena kāraṇaguṇā eva kāryagā bhaveyuḥ /

tatas ca vijātīya ārambhaka tve kaḥ doṣaḥ
evam tarhi pṛthivī tva ādi jāti saṅkaraḥ syāt iti ced
tatas kim
vyavahāra vilopaḥ syāt iti ced na
vaiśeṣyāt tu tad vāde
iti parihariṣyamāṇa tvāt
tathā api sampratipanna sajātīya ārabdha kārya
dṛṣṭāntena vipratipannānām api sajātīya ārabdha tvam anumāsyate iti ced na

syāt etat
yadi bahūnām paramāṇūnām saṃyogasya ārambhaka tvam syāt
na ca evam

original: santatotpattyādiprasaṅgāttryādikalpane gauravād dvayoreva paramāṇvoḥ saṃyogo dravyārambhaka
analyzed: santata utpatti ādi prasaṅgāt tri ādi kalpane gauravāt dvayoḥ eva paramāṇvoḥ saṃyogaḥ dravya ārambhaka
iti niyama siddheḥ iti atas āha tāratamya iti

original: yataḥ kāraṇāttāratamyena sarve 'pyarthā mahāntaścāṇavaśca samathirtāḥ tataḥ parimāṇatāratamyavaditi
analyzed: yatas kāraṇāt tāratamyena sarve pi arthāḥ mahāntaḥ ca aṇavaḥ ca tatas parimāṇa tāratamya vat iti

original: dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyavikalatvāt dvayoreva tu saṃyoga itrata kenāvasīyata iti sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tvāt dvayoḥ eva tu saṃyogaḥ kena avasīyate iti sambandhaḥ
kiñca anena eva nyāyena dvayaṇuka dvaya saṃyogasya api ārambhaka tvam kim na iṣyate
bahu tva abhāve kārya mahat tva anupapatti prasaṅgāt iti ced na

original: yatastāratamyena sarve 'pi mahāntaścāṇavaśca samarthitāḥ tena dvayaṇukamahattvāttadutpattyupapatteḥ /
analyzed: yatas tāratamyena sarve mahāntaḥ ca aṇavaḥ ca samarthitāḥ tena dvayaṇuka mahat tvāt tad utpatti upapatteḥ

original: pratyakṣādyanavadhṛtavyāptyāderapi prāmāṇye 'tiprasaṅgo vā tadaprāmāṇye dṛṣṭānto vā pratibandīgraheṇa dyotyata ityadoṣa iti / *7,474*
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādi anavadhṛta vyāpti ādeḥ api prāmāṇye tiprasaṅgaḥ vā tad aprāmāṇye dṛṣṭāntaḥ vā pratibandī graheṇa dyotyate iti adoṣaḥ iti

original: dhūmasyāgnineva mahadārambhakatvādīnāmapi sāvayavatvādinā sāhityadarśanādityata āha- saheti //
analyzed: dhūmasya agninā iva mahat ārambhaka tva ādīnām api sāvayava tva ādinā sāhitya darśanāt iti atas āha saha iti
saha darśana mātreṇa na vyāptiḥ avasīyate
na dhūma ādi īm api agni ādibhiḥ saha darśana mātreṇa vyāptiḥ avasīyate
yena mahat ārambhaka tva ādīnām api sāvayava tva ādibhiḥ tatas vasīyeta

vyabhicāra anupalambhe sati sāhitya darśanam vyāpti adhyavasāya hetuḥ iti ced
kim sakala deśa kāla niṣṭhaḥ nu upalambhaḥ

na ādyaḥ

original: kathaṃ tarhi vyāptyadhyavasāyaḥ syādityata āha- yadaiveti //

original: ataḥ sāhitya iva vyabhicārābhāve 'pi pramāṇapravṛttau vyāptisiddhiḥ /

original: kintu bhūyaḥsahacaritatayā dṛṣṭā adṛṣṭavyabhicārā api dharmā vyabhicāriṇo dṛṣṭāḥ /

original: iha tantuṣvayaṃ paṭa iti vyavahārasiddhatatpratyāttatsiddhiriti cenna /

iha samavāye stitvam ityādau vyabhicārāt
bhū tala rūpa ādayaḥ bhū tala sambaddhāḥ bhū tala viśeṣaṇa tvāt ghaṭa vat iti api
bhū tala viśeṣaṇe jñāne vyabhicārāt ayuktam

original: iha tantuṣa paṭa ityādipratyaya etañjanakasaṃyogatvarahitasambandhajanya ihetipratyayatvādiha kuṇḍe badarāṇīti pratyayavat /
analyzed: iha paṭaḥ ityādi pratyayaḥ etad janaka saṃyoga tva rahita sambandha janyaḥ iha iti pratyaya tvāt iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi iti pratyaya vat

original: naceha bhūtale ghaṭābhāva iti pratyaye vyabhicāraḥ tatrāpi cakṣurbhūtalasaṃyogādijanyatvasya sattvāt,
analyzed: naca iha bhū tale ghaṭa abhāvaḥ iti pratyaye vyabhicāraḥ tatra api cakṣuḥ bhū tala saṃyoga ādi janya tvasya sattvāt
iti api na yuktam
ayam paṭaḥ etad janaka tantu rahita upādāna janyaḥ paṭa tvāt paṭa antara vat iti ābhāsa samāna yogakṣema tvāt
rūpa ādayaḥ sambandhavantaḥ prameya tvāt ghaṭa vat iti api anupapannam
samavāya abhāvayoḥ vyabhicārāt
tatra api viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva abhyupagamāt na iti ced na
tasya pareṇa sambandha tva an aṅgīkārāt
aṅgīkāre vā tena eva artha antara tvāt
matup arthasya abhāvāt bādhita viṣaya tvāt ca
samavāyaḥ svena eva sambandhī ityādi
syāt iti nirastam
idam cakṣuḥ etad janya saṃyoga jñāna tva rahita sambandha jñāna janakam cakṣuṣṭvāt anya cakṣuḥ vat
aham manniṣṭha saṃyoga jñāna tva rahita sambandha jñānavān ātma tvāt ātma antara vat
ayam kālaḥ idānīntana saṃyoga jñāna tva rahita sambandha jñānavān kāla tvāt anya kāla vat ityādīni
ābhāsa samāna yogakṣema tvāt
viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva ādinā artha antara tvāt ca apāstāni
saṃyoga tvam sambandha vyāvṛttam jāti tvāt go tva vat iti siddhasādhanam
jāteḥ prati vyakti niyata tvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvena ekasya saṃyoga tvasya saṃyoga antarāt vaya āvṛtteḥ
viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvāt itas vyāvṛtteḥ ca

original: vivādādhyāsitā mṛt ghaṭasambaddhā dravyatvādākāśavaditi ca ghaṭāntarasaṃyogenārthāntaram /
analyzed: vivāda adhyāsitā mṛd ghaṭa sambaddhā dravya tvāt ākāśa vat iti ca ghaṭa antara saṃyogena artha antaram
etad ghaṭa sambaddha iti nirdeśe pi etad ghaṭa sambandham a labdhvā vinaṣṭa dravye na aikāntikam
tatra api paramparā sambandhaḥ sti iti ced
tarhi siddha sādhanam
mṛd saṃyukta bhū talasya ghaṭa saṃyukta tvāt
tantu paṭau nitya sambaddhau dravya tvāt ākāśa vat iti
dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tvāt apāstam

original: saṃyogaḥ svavyatiriktasambandhādbhinnaḥ prameyatvādghaṭavadityatra svavyatiriktapadena svānyonyābhāvavivakṣāyāṃ siddhasādhanatā /
analyzed: saṃyogaḥ sva vyatirikta sambandhāt bhinnaḥ prameya tvāt ghaṭa vat iti atra sva vyatirikta padena sva anyonya abhāva vivakṣāyām siddhasādhanatā
ekasya saṃyogasya saṃyoga antarāt bhinna tvāt
saṃyoga tva rahita tva vivakṣāyām aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tvam
viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva ādinā tad samādhāne tena eva siddha sādhanam
ayam saṃyogaḥ etad anya saṃyoga tva rahita sambandha anyaḥ meya tvāt ghaṭa vat ityādyāḥ ca
ābhāsa samāna yogakṣema tvāt upekṣaṇīyāḥ
tat evam samavāye pramāṇa abhāvāt na bheda pakṣaḥ ṅgīkriyate

original: nanūktamatrābhedapakṣo 'pi tarhi nāṅgīkāryo viśeṣe pramāṇābhāvāditi tatrāha- yeneti //
analyzed: nanu uktam atra abheda pakṣaḥ tarhi nā aṅgīkāryaḥ viśeṣe pramāṇa abhāvāt iti tatra āha yena iti
yena pratyakṣa siddhena vyavahāraḥ khilaḥ bhavet
bhāva abhāva vibhāgena yam vinā na kathañcana

original: etaddṛśe viśeṣe 'smin ko dveṣo vādināṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,2.97 //
analyzed: etad dṛśe viśeṣe smin kaḥ dveṣaḥ vādinām bhavet
pratyakṣa siddhena iti anena pratyakṣa siddhaḥ iti labhyate
yena akhilaḥ vyavahāraḥ bhavet

original: yaṃ vinā na bhavedityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ viśeṣakāryatvaṃ vyavahārasya darśayatā
analyzed: yam vinā na bhavet iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām viśeṣa kārya tvam vyavahārasya darśayatā

original: vyavahārānyathānupapattiśca viśeṣe pramāṇaṃ tadanaṅgīkāre vyavahārocchedaprasaṅgaścetyuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: vyavahāra anyathā anupapattiḥ ca viśeṣe pramāṇam tad anaṅgīkāre vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ ca iti uktam bhavati
akhilaḥ iti asya eva vivaraṇam bhāva abhāva vibhāgena vidhi niṣedha bhedena eti
dvividhaḥ tāvat iti śeṣaḥ
nanu bheda pakṣe pi samavāya abhyupagamena akhilaḥ pi vyavahāraḥ ghaṭiṣyate
atyanta abhede vyāvṛtti svīkāreṇa bheda abhedābhyām tu sutarām
tat kim viśeṣeṇa iti atas uktam kathañcana iti
etādṛśe sarva vyavahāra nirvāha hetau kaḥ dveṣaḥ kinnimitta anupādi tā
pramāṇa abhāvaḥ hi anupādāna nimittam
sati pramāṇe na anupādāna nimittam asti iti arthaḥ
mā bhūt vayavahāraḥ iti atas uktam vādinām iti
upalakṣaṇam ca etat
jñātṛṇām ca iti api draṣṭavyam
viśiṣṭa viṣaya abhijñā abhivadana lakṣaṇaḥ hi atra vyavahāraḥ prakṛtaḥ
kiñca avayava avayavi ādi bhede pramāṇa abhāvāt ca tam parityajya abheda pakṣaḥ ṅgīkriyate
nanu uktam atra abhede pi pramāṇam na asti iti
tatra āha abhedena iti
abhedena pratītiḥ ca kārya kāraṇa pūrvake
abhāva ante padārthe smin sa viśeṣā avasīyate
iha api kārya kāraṇa grahaṇena avayavi avayavau ucyete
pūrva śabdena guṇa guṇi ādikam
abhāva śabdena anyonya abhāvaḥ gṛhyate
tasya eva dharmi abhinna tvāt
yat vā abhāva tad dharmau anena upalakṣyete
avasīyate sākṣiṇā
tathā hi
tantu paṭa ādi viṣayā buddhiḥ atyanta bhinna ghaṭa paṭa ādi viṣaya buddhitaḥ vilakṣaṇā anuvyavasīyate uta avilakṣaṇā
na tāvat dvitīyaḥ
pratīti apalāpa anupapatteḥ
ādye katham abheda pratītiḥ na asti iti śakyam vaktum
sambandhena viśe
śiṣyate iti ced na
kuṇḍa badara pratītitaḥ pi vailakṣaṇya anubhavāt
sambandhinoḥ ayuta siddha tvāt tathā iti ced na
ādhāra ādheya bhāvena avasthāna samaye tasya akiñcitkara tvāt

original: atastantupaṭayoḥ kuṇḍabadarayośca bhede sambandhe ca samāne kālāntarabhāvinaḥ sambandhavināśādeḥ sambandhivibhāgādervā pratyakṣapratītiṃ pratyupayogā(yogā)
analyzed: atas tantu paṭayoḥ kuṇḍa badarayoḥ ca bhede sambandhe ca samāne kāla antara bhāvinaḥ sambandha vināśa ādeḥ sambandhi vibhāga ādeḥ vā pratyakṣa pratītim pratyupayoga ayogāḥ
bhāvāt vailakṣaṇyam na anubhūyeta
anubhūyate ca tantu paṭa ādi buddhiḥ kuṇḍa badara ādi buddhiḥ iviḥ lakṣaṇā iti abheda viṣayā eva sā avasīyate

original: kiñca paṭotpatteḥ prāgyāvantaṃ deśamavaṣṭabhya tantavastiṣṭhanti paṭo 'pi tāvantameva /
analyzed: kiñca paṭa utpatteḥ prāk yāvantam deśam avaṣṭabhya tantavaḥ tiṣṭhanti paṭaḥ pi tāvantam eva
na ca mūrtayoḥ samāna deśa tvam yujyate
tena jñāyate tantu a bhinnaḥ paṭaḥ iti
na ca avayava avayavinoḥ rūpa rasa ādi vat
dvaitam anubhūyate ityādi abheda pramāṇam svayam ūhanīyam
nanu abhedaḥ ced pratyakṣeṇa eva īkṣyate
tadā katham śuklaḥ paṭaḥ calati paṭa
ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi vyavahāraḥ
tasya daṇḍī kuṇḍalī iti vat bheda viṣaya tvāt

original: nahi pratītivirodhī vyavahāro bhavatītyata uktam- saviśeṣeti //
analyzed: nahi pratīti virodhī vyavahāraḥ bhavati iti atas uktam sa viśeṣa iti
viśeṣeṇa viṣayeṇa upetā
ayam arthaḥ

original: yatra kevalamabhedaḥ pratīyate na tatra sāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahāro bhavati /
analyzed: yatra kevalam abhedaḥ pratīyate na tatra sāmānādhikaraṇya vyavahāraḥ bhavati
yathā ghaṭaḥ kalaśaḥ iti

original: atra tvabhedaḥ pratīyamāno viśeṣeṇa sahita eva pratīyate /
analyzed: atra tu abhedaḥ pratīyamānaḥ viśeṣeṇa sahitaḥ eva pratīyate
viśeṣaḥ ca bheda pratinidhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya vyavahāram prasūtaḥ iti
nanu abheda pratītim abhibhūya viśeṣa pratītiḥ sva kāryam katham kuryāt

original: karoti cedabhedapratītirapi viśeṣapratītimabhibhūya svakāryaṃ kathaṃ na syāt /
analyzed: karoti ced abheda pratītiḥ api viśeṣa pratītim abhibhūya sva kāryam katham na syāt
mā evam

original: nahi pratītirastītyeva vyavahāraḥ kintu prayojane 'pi sati /
analyzed: nahi pratītiḥ asti iti eva vyavahāraḥ kintu prayojane sati
prayojanam ca sāmānādhikaraṇya vyavahāreṇa eva bahulam loka vedayoḥ

original: yadā tvabhedavyavahāraḥ prayojanavāṃstadā so 'pi dṛśyata eva yathā vijñānamānandaṃ brahmetyādi / *7,542*
analyzed: yadā tu abheda vyavahāraḥ prayojanavān tadā saḥ dṛśyate eva yathā vijñānam ānandam brahma ityādi
yat vā viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣa arthāpatti siddhaḥ iti uktam
tat katham iti atas pratyakṣa siddha tām tāvat upapādayati abhedena iti
anukta samuccaya arthaḥ caśabdaḥ

original: padārtha ityekavacanaṃ jātiviṣayam asti yatastasmātsā saviśeṣāvasīyata iti yojanā /
analyzed: padārthaḥ iti ekavacanam jāti viṣayam asti yatas tasmāt sā sa viśeṣā avasīyate iti yojanā
tatas ca ayam arthaḥ
asti tāvat avayava avayavi ādi padārtha sārthe bhedena pratītiḥ
syāḥ vyāvṛtta tayā adhyavasāyāt
na ca abhedam antareṇa vyāvṛtti hetuḥ asti

original: ato 'sati nimittāntare sammatabhedavastvantarapratītito vyāvṛtteyamabheda eva viśrāmyatīti /
analyzed: atas sati nimitta antare sammata bheda vastu antara pratītitaḥ vyāvṛttā iyam abhedaḥ eva viśrāmyati iti
asti ca tathā api sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi vyavahāraḥ

original: tatra yadīyamabhedamātraviṣayā syāttadā na sāmānādhikaraṇyādivyavahāraṃ kuryāt /
analyzed: tatra yadi iyam abheda mātra viṣayā syāt tadā na sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi vyavahāram kuryāt
ghaṭaḥ kalaśaḥ iti vyavahāra adarśanāt
tatas jñāyate dhikaḥ pi viṣayaḥ vidyate iti
na ca bhedaḥ sau iti vācyam
bheda abheda vāde pi antaḥ viśeṣasya aṅgīkārya tvāt
tathā ca iyam abheda pratītiḥ indriya jā sa viśeṣā avasīyate iti
prāk uktam samavāye
kriyate iti tat na tāvat eva

original: kintu sarveṣvapi padārtheṣviti darśayanviśeṣasya vyavahārānyathānupapattisiddhatāṃ copapādayati- sāmānyādīti //
analyzed: kintu sarveṣu api padārtheṣu iti darśayan viśeṣasya vyavahāra anyathā anupapatti siddha tām ca upapādayati sāmānya ādi iti
sāmānya ādi padārtheṣu tad niṣṭha tva ādayaḥ khilāḥ

original: kathaṃ dharmā nivāryante vastvaikye 'pi hi vādibhiḥ // MAnuv_2,2.99 //
analyzed: katham dharmāḥ nivāryante vastu aikye hi vādibhiḥ
tad niṣṭha tva ādayaḥ vyakti niṣṭha tva ādayaḥ
katham iti ākṣepe
vastu aikye pi dharma aikye pi

original: kuto na nivāryata ityata uktam- vādibhiriti //
analyzed: kutas na nivāryate iti atas uktam vādibhiḥ iti
avisaṃvādi vyavahāra siddha tvāt iti yāvat
etat eva prapañcayati kāryasya iti
katham viśeṣaḥ na eva asti
asti tāvat avayavinaḥ vayava niṣṭha tvam nāma dharmaḥ
guṇānām keṣāṃcid rūpa ādīnām āśraya vyāpi tvam keṣāṃcid saṃyoga ādīnām pradeśa vṛtti tvam
rūpa ādīnām udbhūta tvam

original: sarveṣāṃ caturviṃśatitvam karmaṇaśca āśrayavyāpitvamanityatvaṃ pañcatvaṃ mūrtaniṣṭhatvam,
analyzed: sarveṣām caturviṃśati tvam karmaṇaḥ ca āśraya vyāpi tvam anitya tvam pañcatvam mūrta niṣṭha tvam
sāmānyasya api dravya guṇa karma niṣṭha tvam
dvividha tvam iti ati bahulaḥ yam padārtha dharma samūhaḥ
na ca ayam āśrayataḥ bhinnaḥ eva iti yuktam
asti ca dharma dharmya ādi vyavahāraḥ
tantuṣu paṭaḥ pagha
ṭaḥ na bhavati ghapaṭaḥ ityādiḥ

original: sa cāyamatyantābhede 'nupapadyamānaḥ svopapādakaṃ viśeṣamavagamayatīti sarvapadārtheṣu kathaṃ viśeṣo naivāsti / *7,546*
analyzed: sa ca ayam atyanta abhede sva upapādakam viśeṣam avagamayati iti sarva padārtheṣu katham viśeṣaḥ na eva asti

original: santyeva dravyādiṣu saptasvapi padārtheṣu te te dharmāḥ /

original: tathāca tatsambandhanibandhanatayaivopapadyamāno vyavahāraḥ sarvapadārtheṣu na viśeṣamākṣeptumalamityāśayena śaṅkate- sa ceti // *7,547*
analyzed: tathā ca tad sambandha nibandhanatayā eva upapadyamānaḥ vyavahāraḥ sarva padārtheṣu na viśeṣam ākṣeptum alam iti āśayena śaṅkate sa ca iti
sa ca paraḥ yadi
na kevalam guṇa ādi dravya āditaḥ bhinnam

original: kintu saḥ tattanniṣṭhatvādidharmaśca aparaḥ svāśrayādbhinno yadyaṅgīkriyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kintu saḥ tad tad niṣṭha tva ādi dharmaḥ ca aparaḥ svāśrayāt bhinnaḥ yadi aṅgīkriyate iti arthaḥ

original: tathāca ṣaḍeva padārthā sati niyamo bhajyeteti /

ṭ pada arthebhyaḥ tiricyante

analyzed: vyāpteḥ tantu karmaṇaḥ gagana vibhāga janaka tve tantu antara vibhāga janaka tvam na syāt iti ced na na
yat yat pradeśa vibhāga janakam na bhavati na tat tad pradeśa stha dravya vibhāga janakam iti

original: vyāpterākāśadeśavibhāgājanakatve tantvantarādapi vibhāgajanakaṃ na syāditi pratiprasaṅgasambhavāt / *7,601*
analyzed: vyāpteḥ ākāśa deśa vibhāga ajanaka tve tantu antarāt api vibhāga janakam na syāt iti pratiprasaṅga sambhavāt

original: kiñca tantorākāśavibhāgo yadi vibhāgajo na tu karmajastadā sakarmakasyevākarmakasyāpi kuto na syāt /
analyzed: kiñca tantoḥ ākāśa vibhāgaḥ yadi vibhāga jaḥ na tu karma jaḥ tadā sakarmakasya iva akarmakasya api kutas na syāt
vibhāgasya ubhayatra api sāmyāt
uttara vibhāge karma nimitta kāraṇam iti atas na iti ced na
ādya vibhāga jananena eva upakṣīṇasya kāraṇa tva anavadhāraṇāt
avadhāraṇe vā asamavāyi tvasya anivāraṇāt
anyathā tad lakṣaṇasya ativyāpteḥ iti alam vistareṇa

original: evaṃ chalatvenānavasthāprasaṅgaṃ nirākṛtya prakārāntareṇa nirākaroti- aṃśa iti //
analyzed: evam chala tvena anavasthā prasaṅgam nirākṛtya prakāra antareṇa nirākaroti aṃśaḥ iti
aṃśi saṃyogasya aṃśa vṛtti tva dṛṣṭeḥ ca na anavasthā doṣaḥ iti arthaḥ
dṛṣṭa tve katham adoṣa tvam iti atas āha dṛṣṭe iti
aṃśe saṃyoga dṛṣṭeḥ ca

original: āpādake 'rthe dṛṣṭe sati sā anavasthitiḥ kā na dūṣaṇamiti yāvat /
analyzed: āpādake rthe dṛṣṭe sati sā anavasthitiḥ kā na dūṣaṇam iti yāvat
etat uktam bhavati

analyzed: yadi aṃśataḥ saṃyogaḥ syāt tadā anavasthā syāt tatas ca saṃyoga abhāvaḥ eva āpadyeta
na ca asau yuktaḥ

original: tasmānnāṃśataḥ saṃyoga iti hi viparyaye paryavasānaṃ kartavyam /

anavasthāyāḥ tarka tvāt

dṛṣṭe kā sā anavasthitiḥ

original: yadyaṃśago na saṃyogaḥ kāryeṣu prathimā katham // MAnuv_2,2.110cd //

original: yadi kāraṇānāṃ saṃyogastadaṃśavṛttirna syāttadā tadārabdheṣu kāryeṣu kāraṇāpekṣayā parimāṇotkarṣo na syādityarthaḥ /

ayam abhisandhiḥ

original: praśithilatā ca saṃyogasya keṣucidaṃśeṣu vṛttiḥ keṣucidavṛttireva /

original: tataḥ saṃyogasyāṃśavṛttitvābhāve pracayo 'sau na bhavatīti kāraṇābhāvādutkṛṣṭaparimāṇotpādo na syāditi / *7,610*
analyzed: tatas saṃyogasya aṃśa vṛtti tva abhāve pracayaḥ asau na bhavati iti kāraṇa abhāvāt utkṛṣṭa parimāṇa utpādaḥ na syāt iti
astu anyasya saṃyogaḥ yathā tathā

original: prastute paramāṇau saṃyogasyāṃśavṛttitvābhāve nātiprasaṅga iti cenna /
analyzed: prastute paramāṇau saṃyogasya aṃśa vṛtti tva abhāve na atiprasaṅgaḥ iti ced na
anvaya vyatirekābhyām kāraṇa parimāṇa utkṛṣṭasya kārya parimāṇasya pracaya ākhya aṃśa vṛtti saṃyoga ja tva avadhāraṇāt kāraṇa abhāve
ca kārya abhāva niyamāt paramāṇu saṃyogasya aṃśa vṛtti tva abhāve tad kārye dvayaṇuke paramāṇu parimāṇāt utkṛṣṭa parimāṇam
na utpadyeta iti asya eva bādhakasya sattvāt
nanu idam iṣi āpādanam
paramāṇutaḥ dvayaṇuke parimāṇa utkarṣa abhāvāt iti atas āha paramāṇoḥ iti
paramāṇoḥ aṇoḥ na asti mahat tā iti adbhutam vacaḥ

original: paramāṇuparimāṇādaṇodvaryaṇukasya mahattā parimāṇotkarṣo nāstīti vaco 'dbhutaṃ svavyāhataṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: mahat tā parimāṇa utkarṣaḥ na asti iti vacaḥ dbhutam sva vyāhatam pramāṇa viruddham ca iti arthaḥ

original: ayamāḍhyo 'yaṃ paramāḍhya itivadaṇuparamāṇuśabdābhyāmeva parimāṇatāratamyāvagatestadabhāvavacanaṃ svavyāhataṃ bhavati /
analyzed: ayam āḍhyaḥ yam parama āḍhyaḥ iti vat aṇu paramāṇu śabdābhyām eva parimāṇa tāratamya avagateḥ tad abhāva vacanam su avyāhatam bhavati
dvi tantuka parimāṇa vat asaṃmṛdi
samudita avayava janya dravya parimāṇa tvena dvayaṇuka parimāṇasya paramāṇu parimāṇāt utkarṣasya anumāna avaga tvāt ca iti
nanu yat kāraṇa parimāṇa janyam utkṛṣṭa parimāṇam tat eva pracaya janmay
tryaṇuka parimāṇa vat dvayaṇuka parimāṇam api kāraṇa parimāṇa janyam na bhavati
kintu kāraṇa saṃkhyā janyam eva

original: tatkathaṃ paramāṇoḥ pracayābhāve dvayaṇuke parimāṇotkarṣānutpādāpādanamityata āha- aṇūnāmiti //
analyzed: tat katham paramāṇoḥ pracaya abhāve dvayaṇuke parimāṇa utkarṣa anutpāda āpādanam iti atas āha aṇūnām iti
aṇūnām prathima apekṣām vinā eva saḥ

original: paramāṇormahattvaṃ ca vinetyetad vacaḥ katham // MAnuv_2,2.111c-f //
analyzed: paramāṇoḥ mahat tvam ca vinā iti etat vacaḥ katham

original: dvayaṇukānāṃ parimāṇotkarṣāpekṣāṃ vinaiva saṃkhyāmātreṇa tryaṇuke sa parimāṇotkarṣo jāyate /

original: tathā paramāṇormahattvaṃ parimāṇotkarṣaṃ vinā kevalasaṃkhyayā dvayaṇuke parimāṇotkarṣo jāyata ityetadvacaḥ kathaṃ ghaṭate /

original: atra parimāṇamātragrahaṇe kartavye prathimeti mahattvamiti coktirvisadṛśaparimāratvasyānapekṣāhetoḥ nirākaraṇaṃ smārayitumiti / *7,613*

original: aṃśāṃśinoratyantābhedo bhedābhedau ceti yaduktaṃ tadviśadayati- aṃśina iti //

aṃśinaḥ ṃśaiḥ abhedaḥ yam aṃśena tu bhidā abhidā

original: yathā gaganāderyāvadaṃśabhāvinoṃ'śinaḥ svāṃśairatyantābhedastathā paṭāderaṃśino 'pi sarvairaṃśaiḥ atyantābhedaḥ ekaikāṃśena tu bhidābhidā /

original: kathaṃ caikaikatantunābhedaḥ ekaikatra paṭabuddhayabhāvādityata āha- sarveti //

original: evaṃca guṇānāṃ guṇinaikye saṃyogādyāśrayānekadravyābhedo vā saṃyogādibhedo vā'padyeta /

sāmānyam ca ekam aneka āśritam

original: tasya vyaktayabhede vyaktīnāmapyabhedaḥ sāmānyasya vā bhedaḥ prasajyetetyataḥ saṃyogavibhāgapṛthaktavānāṃ tāvadanekāśritatvaṃ nāstītyāha- saṃyogaśceti
analyzed: tasya vyaktaya bhede vyaktīnām api abhedaḥ sāmānyasya vā bhedaḥ prasajyeta iti atas saṃyoga vibhāga pṛthaktavānām tāvat aneka āśrita tvam na asti iti āha saṃyogaḥ ca iti

original: saṃyogaśca vibhāgaśca bhedaścaiva pṛthak pṛthak // MAnuv_2,2.113ab //
analyzed: saṃyogaḥ ca vibhāgaḥ ca bhedaḥ ca eva pṛthak pṛthak
bhedaḥ iti pṛthaktavam ucyate
caśabdāḥ itaretara yoge
pṛthak pṛthak eva ekaika dravya āśritāḥ eva iti arthaḥ
tatas ca ekena guṇena abhinna tve dravyayoḥ api abhedaḥ syāt iti atiprasaṅgasya āpādaka asiddhiḥ
aneka dravya abhinna tve guṇasya api bhedaḥ syāt iti asya iṣi āpattiḥ dūṣaṇam iti uktam bhavati
nanu ghaṭa paṭa saṃyoga vibhāga bhedāḥ ghaṭa paṭa sambandhi tayā anubhūyate
tat katham ekaika āśritāḥ

original: tathātve caikaikasminneva saṃyuktādipratyayaprasaṅga ityata āha- anyonyeti //
analyzed: tathātve ca ekaikasmin eva saṃyukta ādi pratyaya prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha anyonya iti
anyonya pratiyogena hi ubhayoḥ api dṛśyate

anyonyasya pratiyogaḥ nyonya pratiyogaḥ
yat saṃyoga ādiḥ ubhayoḥ api dṛśyate tat anyonya pratiyogena hi nimittena
atra ubhayoḥ api iti aneka upalakṣaṇam
bhedasya bahu sambandhi tayā api pratīteḥ
etat uktam bhavati
ghaṭa pratiyogikaḥ saṃyoga ādiḥ paṭe sti
tathā paṭa pratiyogikaḥ ghaṭe sti
tasmāt ubhaya sambandhi tayā pratibhāsaḥ tiprasaṅga abhāvaḥ ca yujyate iti
syāt etat yadi saṃyoga ādīnām eka eka vṛtti tve pramāṇam syāt
tat eva na asti iti atas āha anyonya iti
pṛthak pṛthak eva iti anuvartate

original: anyonyapratiyogena hetunā saṃyogādikamubhayorapi pṛthak pṛthageva hi dṛśyate /
analyzed: anyonya pratiyogena hetunā saṃyoga ādikam ubhayoḥ api pṛthak pṛthak eva hi dṛśyate
ayam arthaḥ

original: paṭo ghaṭena saṃyukto ghaṭādvibhakto ghaṭādbhinna iti paṭadharmaḥ saṃyogādigharṭapratiyogikatayā pratīyate /
analyzed: paṭaḥ ghaṭena saṃyuktaḥ ghaṭāt vibhaktaḥ ghaṭāt bhinnaḥ iti paṭa dharmaḥ saṃyoga ādi gharṭa pratiyogika tayā pratīyate
yaḥ ca yad pratiyogikaḥ na asau tad dharmaḥ
yathā sthavira pratiyogikam apara tvam na sthavira dharmaḥ
tasmāt na ayam saṃyoga ādiḥ ghaṭa dharmaḥ

original: evaṃ ghaṭadharmaḥ saṃyogādiḥ paṭapratiyogitayopalabhyamāno na paṭadharmo bhavitumarhati /
analyzed: evam ghaṭa dharmaḥ saṃyoga ādiḥ paṭa pratiyogitayā upalabhyamānaḥ na paṭa dharmaḥ bhavitum arhati
tathā ca pṛthak pṛthak eva saṃyoga ādiḥ aneka dharmaḥ vagamyate iti
nanu astu saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ iyam gatiḥ
na tu pṛthaktave

original: yaddhi ghaṭātpaṭaḥ pṛthak paṭācca ghaṭaḥ pṛthagityanyonyapratiyogikatayā pratīyate tadekapṛthaktavaṃ pṛthak pṛthagevābhyupagamyate /
analyzed: yat hi ghaṭāt paṭaḥ pṛthak paṭāt ca ghaṭaḥ pṛthak iti anyonya pratiyogikatayā pratīyate tat ekapṛthaktavam pṛthak pṛthak eva abhyupagamyate

original: yattu bhinnāvimau bhinnā ime iti pratīyate tadanekapṛthaktavamanekāśritameva pratiyogyanirūpyasyaikāśrita(śraya)
analyzed: yat tu bhinnau imau bhinnāḥ ime iti pratīyate tat aneka pṛthaktavam aneka āśritam eva pratiyogi anirūpyasya eka āśrita śraya
tve māna abhāvāt iti atas āha bhinnāḥ iti

original: bhinnā iti tu bhedānāṃ samudāyo hi dṛśyate /
analyzed: bhinnāḥ iti tu bhedānām samudāyaḥ hi dṛśyate

original: ime bhinnā ityādipratītau bhedānāṃ samudāyo 'nekatvaṃ hi dṛśyate /

kāya ṛk kāraṇa bhāve hi anvaya vyatirekau vā upadeśaḥ vā pramāṇam
na ca vyāvṛtteṣu vastuṣu anvaya vyatireka grahaṇam upapadyate
niyama vyabhicārayoḥ durjñāna tvāt
upadeśaḥ ca ananteṣu na sambhavati eva iti uktam
api ca vyāpti jñānam api anugata sāmānya abhāve nupapannam syāt
vyāvṛtta vastūnām anvaya vyatireka avagama anupapatteḥ
sāmānya apavāda nyāyaḥ ca anugata sāmānya abhāve na bhavet
dvayoḥ pramāṇayoḥ eka svarūpa viṣaya tve hi a
tu anyatarasya a prāmāṇyam eva syāt
bhinna viṣaya tve na apavāda viṣayaḥ sti
asti ca tāvat gauḥ ayam iti anugata ākāra pratyayaḥ
na ca asau vyāvṛtteṣu sambhavati
bhrānta tva prasaṅgāt
na ca etat sa varma nyā apoha nibandhanam
tasya api pratipiṇḍam vyāvṛtta tvāt
anugata tve vā kim aparāddham sāmānyena
tathā ca vidhi rūpaḥ pratyayaḥ api samāhitaḥ syāt
evam ca aṅgīkārye go tva ādeḥ anugame nitya tvam api anivāryam iti atas āha vyutpattiḥ api iti
vyutpattiḥ api hi sādṛśyena eva gamyate
apipadam kārya kāraṇa bhāva avadhāraṇa ādi samuccaya artham
hi śabdaḥ yasmāt iti arthe
gamyate abhyupagamyate vagamyate iti
asti tāvat sādṛśyam nāma padārtha antaram
go sadṛśaḥ gavayaḥ ityādi adhyakṣa siddha tvāt
tena eva ca upapadyate
vyutpatti ādikam
tasmāt na tad artham go tva ādeḥ anugata tvam kalpanīyam
sādṛśyena tāvat śabda vyutpatti prakāram darśayitum upakramate sarveṣu iti
sarveṣu yugapad śabdaḥ sadṛśeṣu pravartate
bahavaḥ hi śabda saṅgati grahaṇa upāyāḥ

original: tatra yadopadeśato vyutpadyate tadāyaṃ gaurityupadeśavākyaṃ vyāptigrāhakatayopayujyate /
analyzed: tatra yadā upadeśataḥ vyutpadyate tadā ayam gauḥ iti upadeśa vākyam vyāpti grāhaka tayā upayujyate
katham
sādṛśya upadhānena sarveṣu go piṇḍeṣu yugapad eka kālam ayam iti ādi śabdaḥ pravartate

original: ayaṃ gaurityasyāyametatsadṛśāḥ sarve 'pi gośabdavācya ityartho vaktrā abhipreyate /
analyzed: ayam gauḥ iti asya ayam etad sadṛśāḥ sarve go śabda vācyaḥ iti arthaḥ vaktrā abhipreyate
śrotrā ca avadhāryate iti yāvat
dvayoḥ api sārvatrika vyutpatti kāmatvena vākyasya eka piṇḍa viṣayaka
tu akalpanā anupapatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ
yadi ayam gauḥ ityādi vākyam na eka piṇḍa mātra viṣayam

original: kintvayaṃ caitatsadṛśāśca sarve gośabdavācyā iti vyāptiparaṃ tadā saṅgatigrahaṇottarakālaṃ gāmānayetyukte gośabdātsarvagopratipattiḥ syāt /
analyzed: kintu ayam ca etad sadṛśāḥ ca sarve go śabda vācyāḥ iti vyāpti param tadā saṅgati grahaṇa uttara kālam gām ānaya iti ukte go śabdāt sarva go pratipattiḥ syāt

original: abhīṣyagopratipattistu jāyate sā kathamiti taṭasthasya codyaṃ pariharati- tathāpīti //

katham

original: evaṃ sati samavāyabhedasyaupādhikatvaṃ nāmopādhijanyatvaṃ vopādhigamyatvaṃ vā vaktavyam /
analyzed: evam sati samavāya bhedasya aupādhika tvam nāma upādhi janya tvam vā upādhi gamya tvam vā vaktavyam
tathā ca pakṣa dvaye pi anantāḥ samavāyāḥ syuḥ
tat katham iti atas āha itas tatas iti
sarva deśa kāla gatānām avayava avayavi ādi upādhīnām ananta tvāt iti śeṣaḥ

original: upādhīnāmanantatve 'pi samavāyānantyaṃ kuta ityata āha- bhinnatvamiti //
analyzed: upādhīnām ananta tve pi samavāya ānantyam kutas iti atas āha bhinna tvam iti
bhinna tvam ca eva teṣu asti
caḥ yasmāt iti arthe
nahi aupādhikaḥ bhedaḥ nāma upādhīnām eva bhedaḥ
tathā sati samavāyasya iti na syāt
ukta doṣa parihāraḥ ca na bhavet

original: kintu teṣu samavāyeṣvevopādhijanyaṃ tadavagamyaṃ vā bhinnatvamasti /
analyzed: kintu teṣu samavāyeṣu evā upādhi janyam tad avagamyam vā bhinna tvam asti
bheda hetavaḥ ca upādhayaḥ nantāḥ iti katham na samavāya ānantyam

original: tathāpyaupādhikameva tadānantyamityuktasya kimāyātamityata āha- ka iti // *8,83*
analyzed: tathā api aupādhikam eva tat ānantyam iti uktasya kim āyātam iti atas āha kaḥ iti
kaḥ viśeṣaḥ upādhi ge
upādhi gaḥ tad sambandhī aupādhikaḥ iti yāvat

original: aupādhikabhede ko viśeṣo yenāsāvabhedaṃ na viruṇaddhītyarthaḥ / *8,84*
analyzed: aupādhika bhede kaḥ viśeṣaḥ yena asau abhedam na viruṇaddhi iti arthaḥ

original: nīlapaṭasadbhāve 'pi pītapaṭābhāva ityatra hi yadi viśiṣṭaviṣayau vidhiniṣedhau,
analyzed: nīla paṭa sadbhāve pi pīta paṭa abhāvaḥ iti atra hi yadi viśiṣṭa viṣayau vidhi niṣedhau

na ca evam prakṛte

original: nahi pārthivaparamāṇau rūpādayo 'gnisaṃyogajā na tvāpyaparāmāṇurūpādaya iva svābhāvikā ityetāvatā rūpādirahito 'sau bhavati /

original: yadi ca viśeṣaṇaviṣayau tadā samavāye bhedo 'styeva /
analyzed: yadi ca viśeṣaṇa viṣayau tadā samavāye bhedaḥ sti eva

original: sa tu sambandhibhirupādhibhiḥ kṛto na tvakṛtrima ityuktaṃ syāt /
analyzed: sa tu sambandhibhiḥ upādhibhiḥ kṛtaḥ na tu akṛtrimaḥ iti uktam syāt

upādhi gamyam aupādhikam iti pakṣam aṅgīkṛtya ukta doṣa abhāvam śaṅkate a vidyamāne eva iti

kintu vibhramaḥ eva

original: nacaivaṃ bhedasyāsttvaprāptyā siddhasādhanatātādavasthyamiti vācyam yato 'vidyamāna evānyaḥ samavāyo 'dhigamyate tattadupādhineti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: na ca evam bhedasya asttva prāptyā siddha sādhana tā tādavasthyam iti vācyam yatas vidyamānaḥ evā anyaḥ samavāyaḥ dhi gamyate tad tad upādhinā iti brūmaḥ
yathā aṅguli avaṣṭabdha nayana ādi upādhi vaśāt avidyamānaḥ eva dvitīyaḥ candraḥ dhigamyate

original: tathā taistaiḥ sambandhilakṣaṇopādhibhiravidyamānā evāneke samavāyāḥ pratīyante /
analyzed: tathā taiḥ taiḥ sambandhi lakṣaṇa upādhibhiḥ avidyamānāḥ eva aneke samavāyāḥ pratīyante
te ete samavāyāḥ aupādhika bheda abhinnāḥ iti ucyante
te eva ca agnimat ādi śabda vācyāḥ anumāna sādhyāḥ viśiṣṭa ākārāḥ

candra vat āropitānām anekatve pi anāropitasya ekatva avirodhāt
nā api anumānānām siddha sādhana tā

original: tathāpi tadgamakamavidyamānasamavāyasattāṃ pratipādayadanumānajātaṃ dahanaśaityānumānamiva bādhitaviṣayatayā na pramāṇaṃ bhavet /

upalakṣaṇam ca etat

original: upādhīnvinā samavāyāvabhāsasya kvāpyabhāvātsarvatrāpi tasyāvidyamānataiva syādityapi draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: upādhīn vinā samavāya avabhāsasya kvāpi abhāvāt sarvatra api tasya avidyamānatā eva syāt iti api draṣṭavyam
tat evam sarva anu dhūma ādi anu
mānānām siddha sādhana tva ādi prasaṅgāt na samavāya aikyam upapannam iti
etat ca upalakṣaṇam
āgama apanhavaḥ ca samavāya aikye syāt
padārthānām tad saṃsargāṇām ca sikatā vat viśakalitānām siddha tvāt
idānīm samavāyasya nitya tvam nirākaroti evam eva iti
evam eva asataḥ satta samavāyaḥ janiḥ matā
yathā samavāyasya sarvatra ekatva aṅgīkāre sarva anumānānām siddhasādhana tva ādi duṣṭatvam uktam

original: evameva tannityatvābhyupagame prāgasataḥ sattāsamavāyo janirduṣyā matā /
analyzed: evam eva tad nitya tva abhyupagame prāk asataḥ sattā samavāyaḥ janiḥ duṣyā matā

tat katham iti atas āha tatra api iti

ukta doṣāṇām siddha sādhana tva ādīnām
tathā hi
prāk asataḥ sattā samavāyaḥ janiḥ iti pareṇa jani lakṣaṇam abhihitam

original: tatra yadi samavāyo nityaḥ syāttadā tallakṣaṇā ghaṭajaniḥ prākkulālādivyāpārādastīti tadarthasya tasya siddhasādhanatā syāt /
analyzed: tatra yadi samavāyaḥ nityaḥ syāt tadā tad lakṣaṇā ghaṭa janiḥ prāk kulāla ādi vyāpārāt asti iti tad arthasya tasya siddha sādhana tā syāt
jñaptau hi siddhasya api sādhanam ghaṭate
kintu kvacid anapekṣatvam iti eva

original: kṛtau tu prāksiddhasya sādhanamevāśakyamiti kulālādivyāpārasya niṣphalatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: kṛtau tu prāc siddhasya sādhanam eva aśakyam iti kulāla ādi vyāpārasya niṣphala tvam syāt

original: atha samavāyasya nityatve 'pi prāgasataḥ sattāsamavāyaḥ sādhyaḥ asto ko doṣa iti cenna /

samavāya aikya vyāghātāt
aupādhikaḥ samavāyasya bhedaḥ iti ced

nahi prāk asat viṣayaḥ vyāpāraḥ sambhavati

evam tarhi kim apareṇa sattā samavāyena
tat evam samavāyasya eka tva nitya tve sarvathā api ayukte iti

original: tatrāpyuktadoṣānuṣaṅgādityato viśiṣṭādinirūpaṇe tāvaddoṣābhāvaṃ svamate darśayati- asmaditi //

original: evaṃ yatra yatra viśeṣaṇasambandho yāvadviśeṣyabhāvī tatra tatra viśiṣṭaprakāro 'pi tathābhūto viśeṣyeṇātyantābhinno draṣṭavyaḥ /

original: tathāpi viśeṣasya bhedapratinidheḥ sarvapadārtheṣvaṅgīkṛtatveneśvaraḥ sarvajña ityaparyāyaśabdapravṛttyādyanupapattidoṣo nāsti /

īśvaraḥ eva sarvajñaḥ iti abhedaḥ tāvat pramitaḥ
bhede tu na niravakāśam pramāṇam asti iti
dvitīyaḥ tu viśeṣyeṇa bhinna abhinnaḥ
yathā pavartena agnimān

original: tatra yadyapi bhedābhedau vastunaḥ svarūpabhūtau tathāpyasmatpakṣe viśeṣasya sarvatrāṅgīkṛtatvato na saṅkaradoṣaḥ /

jani nirūpaṇe doṣa abhāvam sva mate darśayati asmat iti

original: viśeṣasya pariṇāmasya janitvenāṅgīkṛtatvato na kaściddoṣo 'stīti yojanā /

kvacid bhāvaḥ viśeṣyaḥ viśiṣṭa ākāraḥ ca abhāvaḥ dṛśyate

original: abhāvasya ca dharmāḥ syurbhāvāsteṣāṃ ca te 'khilāḥ // MAnuv_2,2.134ab //
analyzed: abhāvasya ca dharmāḥ syuḥ bhāvāḥ teṣām ca te khilāḥ

original: asti tāvadidaṃ yadabhāvasyāpi bhāvā dharmāḥ syustathā teṣāṃ ca bhāvānāṃ ca te 'bhāvā dharmāḥ syuriti /
analyzed: asti tāvat idam yat abhāvasya api bhāvāḥ dharmāḥ syuḥ tathā teṣām ca bhāvānām ca te bhāvāḥ dharmāḥ syuḥ iti
akhilāḥ iti bahutva upalakṣaṇam

pratyakṣa mānataḥ sarvam etat naḥ vāraṇa kṣamam
pratyakṣa grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa artham

original: yasmādabhāvasyāpi bhāvā dharmāḥ santi bhāvasya cābhāvā ityetatsarvaṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇataḥ siddham /
analyzed: yasmāt abhāvasya api bhāvāḥ dharmāḥ santi bhāvasya ca abhāvāḥ iti etat sarvam pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇataḥ siddham
atas na vārayitum śakyam
astu abhāva bhāvayoḥ bhāva abhāva dharmavat tvam

original: tathāpi bhāvasyābhāvatvamabhāvasya ca bhāvatvaṃ kvacidastītyatra kimāyātamityata āha- sarva iti // *8,98*

original: sarve bhāvā abhāvāśca padārthāstena sarvadā // MAnuv_2,2.134ef //

original: siddhaśca dharmadharmiṇorabhedatvena kāraṇatvena sarve bhāvāḥ padārthā abhāvāśca bhavanti /
analyzed: siddhaḥ ca dharma dharmiṇoḥ abheda tvena kāraṇa tvena sarve bhāvāḥ padārthāḥ abhāvāḥ ca bhavanti
abhāvaḥ ca sarve padārthāḥ bhāvāḥ bhavanti iti uktam upapannam iti arthaḥ

original: yadyevaṃ bhāvasyāpyabhāvatvamabhāvasya ca bhāvatvaṃ tarhi dravyādayo bhāvā eva prāgabhāvādayastvabhāvā eveti sarvatra prasiddho bhāvābhāvavibhāgaḥ  #
analyzed: yadi evam bhāvasya api abhāva tvam abhāvasya ca bhāva tvam tarhi dravya ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ eva prāgabhāva ādayaḥ tu abhāvāḥ eva iti sarvatra prasiddhaḥ bhāva abhāva vibhāgaḥ
katham iti atas āha tathā api iti

original: tathāpi prathamaṃ buddheryo niṣedhasya gocara ḥ /

paraḥ bhāvaḥ

abhāva bhāvayoḥ bhāva abhāva dharmavat tvam pratyakṣa ādi siddham iti uktam
tat katham iti atas āha tasmāt iti

pradhvastam pradhvaṃsaḥ bhedaḥ pṛthaktvam
ādi padena prameya tva ādi grahaṇam
yasmāt abhāvasya bhāva dharma tvam asti

pratyakṣa ādinā iti yojanā
pradhvaṃsaḥ prāgabhāvāt vā ghaṭāt vā pṛthak prameyaḥ bhidheyaḥ ca iti avagamyate
abhāvasya ca
dharma anabhyupagame tad virodhaḥ syāt iti brūmaḥ

original: ghaṭaḥ paṭo na bhavatīti bhāvasyānyonyābhāvadharmatvaṃ sphuṭatvānna pradarśitam /
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ na bhavati iti bhāvasya anyonya abhāva dharma tvam sphuṭa tvāt na pradarśitam

original: evamabhāvayorbhāvābhāvātmakatvaṃ sāmānyataḥ prasādhya prakṛte yojayati- astīti //

original: astyabhāvo 'sti ca dhvaṃso dehābhāvaśca bhasmatā // MAnuv_2,2.136cd //

ityādi yujyate sarvam
tasmāt iti anuvartate

original: dehābhāvo bhasmatetyabhāvasya viśeṣyatvaṃ bhāvasya ca viśiṣṭatvaṃ tayoścābhedastathā ghaṭo na jānātīti bhāvo viśeṣyo 'bhāvaśca viśiṣṭākārastayoścābheda  #
analyzed: deha abhāvaḥ bhasma tā iti abhāvasya viśeṣya tvam bhāvasya ca viśiṣṭa tvam tayoḥ ca abhedaḥ tathā ghaṭaḥ na jānāti iti bhāvaḥ viśeṣyaḥ bhāvaḥ ca viśiṣṭa ākāraḥ tayoḥ ca abhedaḥ
iti uktam yujyate iti arthaḥ

original: yadi bhāvābhāvayorekatvaṃ na viruddhaṃ tadā ghaṭo 'pi svābhāvātmā kinna syādityata āha pratyakṣāditi /

bhāva abhāvayoḥ viśeṣya viśiṣṭayoḥ aikyam pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa siddham na tu ghaṭa tad abhāvayoḥ
atas na atiprasaṅgaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yadvā bhāvābhāvayordharmadharmibhāvo dharmadharmiṇośca abhedaḥ prāmāṇika ityetatkiṃ bhāvābhāvayorviśeṣyaviśiṣṭayoraikyasyopapādakaṃ kiṃvā sambhāvanāhetuḥ
analyzed: yat vā bhāva abhāvayoḥ dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ ca abhedaḥ prāmāṇikaḥ iti etat kim bhāva abhāvayoḥ viśeṣya viśiṣṭayoḥ aikyasya upapādakam kiṃvā sambhāvanā hetuḥ
ādye tu uktaḥ tiprasaṅgaḥ
dvitīye sādhakam vācyam iti atra idam uktam
anena kvacid iti uktam vivṛtam bhavati
athavā bhāvaḥ hi ityādinā pariṇāma vādaḥ prapañcyate
tathā hi

tad vyudāsa artham āha bhāvaḥ hi iti
atra bhāva abhāva śabdau sat asat parau

original: yaḥ kāraṇatvābhimato mṛtpiṇḍaḥ sa kāryaghaṭātmanābhāvaḥ sa eva tadātmanā bhāvaśca /
analyzed: yaḥ kāraṇa tva abhimataḥ mṛd piṇḍaḥ sa kārya ghaṭa ātmanābhāvaḥ saḥ eva tad ātmanā bhāvaḥ ca
yat vā sa ghaṭaḥ prāk utpatteḥ bhāvaḥ san
saḥ eva tad abhāvaḥ san ca

original: athavā yaḥ kulālādivyāpārātprāgabhāvo ghaṭātmanāsanmṛtpiṇḍaḥ sa eva tadanantaraṃ bhāvo ghaṭātmanā san bhavatīti /
analyzed: athavā yaḥ kulāla ādi vyāpārāt prāgabhāvaḥ ghaṭa ātmanā asat mṛd piṇḍaḥ saḥ eva tad anantaram bhāvaḥ ghaṭa ātmanā san bhavati iti
etat uktam bhavati
kāryam kāraṇena bhinna abhinnam
tatas eva prāk utpatteḥ sat asat

original: ataḥ kāraṇaṃ prākkārakavyāpārādakāryātmakaṃ satkāryarūpatāmāpadyate yatsā janiriti /
analyzed: atas kāraṇam prāk kāraka vyāpārāt akārya ātmakam satkārya rūpa tām āpadyate yat sā janiḥ iti

original: nanvekasyaiva bhinnatvamabhinnatvaṃ ca sattvamasattvaṃ ca viruddhamityato yathaikasyaiva bhāvatvamabhāvatvaṃ ca na viruddham /
analyzed: nanu ekasya eva bhinna tvam abhinna tvam ca sattvam asattvam ca viruddham iti atas yathā ekasya eva bhāva tvam abhāva tvam ca na viruddham

original: tathaitadapītyādau sambhāvanāṃ tāvadupadarśayannekaikasya bhāvatvamabhāvatvaṃ ca upapādayati- abhāvasyeti sārdhaślokadvayena /
analyzed: tathā etat api ityādau sambhāvanām tāvat upadarśayan ekaikasya bhāva tvam abhāva tvam ca upapādayati abhāvasya iti sārdha śloka dvayena
pūrvavat eva vyākhyānam
astu iyam sambhāvanā

original: niścāyakaṃ kimityato bhedāsattvayoḥ pareṇāpyaṅgīkṛtatvādabhedasattve pramāṇena sādhayati- tasmāditi //
analyzed: niścāyakam kim iti atas bheda asattvayoḥ pareṇa api aṅgīkṛta tvāt abheda sattve pramāṇena sādhayati tasmāt iti
pradhvastasya ghaṭa ādeḥ bhedaḥ pradhvasta bhedaḥ

original: iti yatpradhvastabhedasya sattvamavagamyate yacca ghaṭo jāyate ghaṭaṃ janayatītyanutpannasyāpi kartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ(ca) vā /

original: tattasmātkāryasya kāraṇābhedātprāgutpattervināśottaraṃ ca sattvādeva hi yujyate /

atiprasaṅgāt

original: abhāvasya ca bhāvāḥ syurdharmāste ca pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhatvādyujyanta eva na tu nirākaraṇārhā ityuktam /
analyzed: abhāvasya ca bhāvāḥ syuḥ dharmāḥ te ca pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa siddha tvāt yujyante eva na tu nirākaraṇa arhāḥ iti uktam
tat viśadayati asti iti
ādi padena ghaṭa ādeḥ bhāvasya paṭa anyonya abhāva dharma tvam gṛhyate

original: anyonyābhāvasya bhāvadharmatve 'pi tasya bhāvātpṛthaktvena kathaṃ bhāvasyāpyabhāvatvamucyate /

original: paryāyatvena te śabdā jñāyante sarva eva hi // MAnuv_2,2.138cd //

bhedasya vastu svarūpa tva anupapatteḥ

original: bhedasya vastusvarūpatve na tatraikatā samaveyādityapyanenaiva nirastam /

original: yadā bhididhāturvidāraṇārtho vivakṣitastadā bhedaśabdo vibhāgākhyaguṇavācako na tvanyonyābhāvalakṣaṇabhedavācaka iti /

iti vacanāt bhidiḥ vibhāga vacanaḥ nyatva vacanaḥ ca

original: bhinno ghaṭa ityukte sphuṭita iti gamyate /

bhinnam gaganam ghaṭāt iti anyat iti vijñāyate

original: tadeva cātra prakṛtaṃ na vibhāga ityanyatālakṣaṇasya bhedasya vastusvarūpatve vidāraṇaprasaṅgenātyalpatāpādanamapyasaṅgatameva,
analyzed: tat eva ca atra prakṛtam na vibhāgaḥ iti anyatā lakṣaṇasya bhedasya vastu svarūpa tve vidāraṇa prasaṅgena ati alpa tā āpādanam api asaṅgatam eva
chala tvāt iti

original: nanu vibhāgasyānyatvasya ca ko viśeṣo yenaivamucyata iti cenna /

anyatā ca anyonya abhāvaḥ iti sphuṭaḥ bhedaḥ
yaḥ tu guṇa ādi prakriyām na māyā vādī manyate
tam bodhayitum āha a vidāraṇe pi iti

original: avidāraṇe 'pi hyāsyasya bhinnāvoṣṭhau tu tasya ca // MAnuv_2,2.142ab //
analyzed: a vidāraṇe hi āsyasya bhinnau oṣṭhau tu tasya ca

original: yadā hi māyāvādī niruttaratayā tūṣṇīmāste tadā tadīyayoroṣṭhayorvidāraṇalakṣaṇavibhāgābhāve 'pyoṣṭhau bhinnāvanyonyābhāvalakṣaṇabhedavantau  #

original: tasya cetyanena nātaḥ paraṃ svarūpabhede kācidanupapattiḥ sambhāvitāstīti sūcitam /

original: aho pakṣapāto 'sya yatparasyāniṣyaṃ prasañjayanvyāptigrahaṇāya laukikaṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ bahumanyate vyabhicāre tu tatrodāste /

original: nanvetāni vacanānyupacaritārthāni kinna syurityata āha- kathameveti //

anantam guṇataḥ
iti pratyekam guṇānām ananta viśeṣavat tvasya āgama siddha tvāt

original: sarve nimeṣā iti hi śrutirevāha sādaram // MAnuv_2,2.164cd //
analyzed: sarve nimeṣāḥ iti hi śrutiḥ eva āha sādaram
sarve nimeṣāḥ jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣāt adhi
iti śrutiḥ eva kāla viśeṣāṇām īśvarāt janim āha hi iti arthaḥ

original: viśeṣaṇadyotata iti vidyuttasmātparamapuruṣātsarve nimeṣāḥ kālabhedā adhijajñire yatāsvaṃ jāyanta iti /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa dyotate iti vidyut tasmāt paramapuruṣāt sarve nimeṣāḥ kāla bhedāḥ adhijajñire yata āsvam jāyante iti
nanu eṣā śrutiḥ kāla upādhīnām īśvarāt jananam āha
na tu kālasya
tathā sati kāṣṭhā kalā muhartāḥ ca iti uttara vākyasya paunaruktya prasaṅgāt
nahi sarva nimeṣa atiriktam kāṣṭhā kalā ādikam asti

original: upādhayastu nimeṣādirūpāḥ pṛthageveti na tatra punaruktidoṣa ityata uktam- sādaramiti //
analyzed: upādhayaḥ tu nimeṣa ādi rūpāḥ pṛthak eva iti na tatra punarukti doṣaḥ iti atas uktam sādaram iti

original: yatsarvanimeṣajanmābhidhāya punaḥ kāṣṭhādijanmābhidhatte tadādarārthamityato na punaruktidoṣaḥ /
analyzed: yat sarva nimeṣa janma abhidhāya punar kāṣṭha ādi janma abhidhatte tat ādara artham iti atas na punarukti doṣaḥ
upādhi bhedaḥ tu na upapadyate iti uktam eva iti
nanu nimeṣa ādi śabdāḥ akṣi pakṣma saṃyoga ādi vācinaḥ na sākṣāt kāla abhidhāyinaḥ

original: ato neyaṃ śrutirvyaktaṃ kālasyaiveśvarājjanma pratipādayitumalamityato 'tra spaṣṭāṃ śrutiṃ cāha- udīrayatīti //
analyzed: atas na iyam śrutiḥ vyaktam kālasya eva īśvarāt janma pratipādayitum alam iti atas spaṣṭām śrutim ca āha udīrayati iti
udīrayati kāla ākhya śaktim iti asya vāc api
saḥ ntar śarīre rpita bhūta sūkṣmaḥ kāla ātmikām śaktim udīrayāṇaḥ
iti asya īśvarasya vāc api kālasya īśvarāt utpattim āha iti arthaḥ
kāla ātmikām kāla ākhyām sahakāri śaktim udīrayāṇaḥ janayan iti arthaḥ
atra kāla śabdāt īśvarasya jagat sṛṣṭau śakti tva abhidhānāt ca na artha antara kalpanā avakāśaḥ

sa sva rūpa tve pi vā sattve
abhāvaḥ niḥsvarūpaḥ iti aṅgīkṛtam iti āśaṅkayā āha yadi iti

original: yadyākāśasya sattvaṃ na kuta eva narādiṣu // MAnuv_2,2.187ab //
analyzed: yadi ākāśasya sattvam na kutas eva nara ādiṣu

original: yadyākāśasya sattvaṃ nāstītyaṅgīkṛtya pratyanumāne 'tiprasaṅgānumāne ca dṛṣṭāntasya sādhanavaikalyaṃ svānumānasyānaikāntikatvābhāvaścocyate
analyzed: yadi ākāśasya sattvam na asti iti aṅgīkṛtya pratyanumāne tiprasaṅga anumāne ca dṛṣṭāntasya sādhana vaikalyam sva anumānasya anaikāntika tva abhāvaḥ ca ucyate

original: tadā dehādiṣu sattvaṃ kuta eva siddhamiti brūmaḥ /
analyzed: tadā deha ādiṣu sattvam kutas eva siddham iti brūmaḥ
tathā ca parakīyasya api dṛṣṭāntasya sādhana vaikalyam syāt

original: yadi ca vidhimukhapratyayavedyatvāddehādīnāṃ bhāvatvaṃ pramāviṣayatvātsattvaṃ cocyate /
analyzed: yadi ca vidhi mukha pratyaya vedya tvāt deha ādīnām bhāva tvam pramā viṣaya tvāt sattvam ca ucyate
tat ākāśe pi samānam iti
pramāṇa antareṇa ākāśasya abhāva tvam vārayitum upodghātam āha sa dharmī iti
sadharmi pratiyogi tvam ākāśasya avagamyate
yatra abhāvaḥ sa dharmī
yasya abhāvaḥ sa pratiyogī
tad ubhayavat tvam abhāvasya niyāmakam vyāpakam
yaḥ bhāvaḥ sa dharmi pratiyogi sahitaḥ eva
yathā ghaṭa ādi abhāvaḥ

original: sa hi bhūtalādidharmiṇā ghaṭādipratiyoginā copeta eveti /
analyzed: sa hi bhū tala ādi dharmiṇā ghaṭa ādi pratiyoginā ca upetaḥ eva iti

original: abhāvasya hi dharmipratiyogisāhityaniyamaḥ kiṃ deśataḥ syāt,
analyzed: abhāvasya hi dharmi pratiyogi sāhitya niyamaḥ kim deśataḥ syāt

ādye dharmiṇā sādeśyam tāvat na asti
bhū talasya sva āśraye
abhāvasya tu bhū tale vṛtteḥ
pratiyoginā tu viruddham eva

prāgabhāva pradhvaṃsa abhāvayoḥ pratiyogi bhinna kāla tva niyamāt iti āśaṅkām pariharan abhāvasya dharmi pratiyogi sāhitya vyāpta tvam upapādayati tau vinā iti

original: tau vinā na hy abhāvaś ca kvaciddṛṣṭaḥ kadācana // MAnuv_2,2.187*ab //

original: atra dṛṣṭa iti prakaraṇāttau vineti tajjñānaṃ vinetyatharḥ /

original: vyāhataṃ sadā sarvaprakāraṃ vadataḥ svavyāhatatvaṃ syāditi yojanā /
analyzed: vyāhatam sadā sarva prakāram vadataḥ sva vyāhata tvam syāt iti yojanā
dṛṣṭa hāna ādi anuṣaṅgi doṣa antara saṅgraha artham ityādyāḥ iti uktam
hi śabdaḥ sarvatra prasaṅga hetu sūcana arthaḥ
ayam arthaḥ

original: yadi pramāṇaviruddhamapi sarvaprakāratvaṃ viśvasya svīkriyate tadā dahanaśaityaṃ vā gavālambhanāderdharmasādhanatvādikaṃ vā(cā)
analyzed: yadi pramāṇa viruddham api sarva prakāra tvam viśvasya svīkriyate tadā dahana śaityam vā gavā ālambhana ādeḥ dharma sādhanatva ādikam vācā
ṅgīkāryam syāt
pramāṇa virodhena pratipakṣa nirākaraṇam ca na syāt
kintu pratyabhijñā ādi viruddham api kṣaṇikatva ādikam aṅgīkartavyam syāt

original: yadi cāprāmāṇikamapi sarvaprakāratvamurarīkriyate tadā kharaviṣāṇādikaṃ vā gomāṃsādibhakṣaṇasya dharmasādhanatvaṃ corarīkaraṇīyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yadi ca aprāmāṇikam api sarva prakāra tvam urarīkriyate tadā khara viṣāṇa ādikam vā go māṃsa ādi bhakṣaṇasya dharma sādhana tvam ca urarīkaraṇīyam syāt
pramāṇa abhāvena para mata nirāsaḥ pi na kāryaḥ syāt
tat api abhyupagamanīyam eva bhavet aviśeṣāt
tathā ca dūṣya upādeya hīnasya śāstra nirmāṇam api na syāt

original: yadi ca vyāhatamapi sarvaprakāratvamaṅgīkuryāt tadā māturapi vandhyatvaṃ,
analyzed: yadi ca vyāhatam api sarva prakāra tvam aṅgīkuryāt tadā mātuḥ api vandhya tvam

original: evaṃ viśvasya kṣapaṇakoktaṃ sarvaprakāratvaṃ nirākṛtya taduktamarthāntaramapi nirākartumanuvadati- vaktīti //

original: vedena pañcarātreṇa bhaktayā yajñena caiva hi // MAnuv_2,2.288cd //
