dṛśyaḥ ham nā anyathā dṛśyaḥ varṣa koṭi śataiḥ api
iti vārāha vacanam

original: evaṃ varāhapurāṇe bhagavaddarśanasādhanatvena vedavatpañcarātrasya prāmāṇyamabhyupagamyeha punastannirākaraṇe vyāghāta eveti / *8,452*
analyzed: evam varāhapurāṇe bhagavat darśana sādhanatvena veda vat pañcarātrasya prāmāṇyam abhyupagamya iha punar tad nirākaraṇe vyāghātaḥ eva iti

original: evaṃ svavyāhatimupapādya pramāṇāntaravirodhaṃ darśayati- ślokā iti //
analyzed: evam sva vyāhatim upapādya pramāṇa antara virodham darśayati ślokāḥ iti
ślokāḥ iti vacaḥ śrutau
vacaḥ asti iti śeṣaḥ
ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ sāmavedaḥ tharvāṅgirasaḥ itihāsa pusaḥpu

original: rāṇaṃ vidyā upaniṣadaḥ ślokāḥ sūtrāṇyanuvyākhyānāni vyākhyānāni';
analyzed: vidyāḥ upaniṣadaḥ ślokāḥ sūtrāṇi anuvyākhyānāni vyākhyānāni

original: ityasyāṃ śrutau ṛgvedādipramāṇoddeśaprasaṅge ślokā iti pañcarātramupāttam /
analyzed: iti asyām śrutau ṛgveda ādi pramāṇa uddeśa prasaṅge ślokāḥ iti pañcarātram upāttam
pañcarātra vidaḥ mukhyāḥ
iti prakṛta pañcarātra viṣaya tvena ṛṣīn uvāca tān sarvān adṛśyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
kṛtam śata sahasram hi ślokānām hitam uttamam
iti śloka śabdasya bhārate prayogāt
chandoga śrutau ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ iti ārabhya eka ayanam iti pañcarātram ucyate
tad samākhyayā śloka śabdaḥ pañcarātra viṣayaḥ śeṣaḥ uvagamyate jñāyate

original: ataḥ śrutyā pañcarātraprāmāṇyaṃ siddhamiti tadaprāmāṇyavādaḥ śrutiviruddhaḥ /
analyzed: atas śrutyā pañcarātra prāmāṇyam siddham iti tad aprāmāṇya vādaḥ śruti viruddhaḥ
spaṣṭa śruti virodham ca darśayati vedaiḥ ca iti

original: vedaiśca pañcarātraiśca dhyeyo nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ // MAnuv_2,2.290ab //
analyzed: vedaiḥ ca pañcarātraiḥ ca dhyeyaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ
veda pañcarātra ukta prakāreṇa ṇa iti arthaḥ
saṃhitā bhedāt pañcarātraiḥ iti bahuvacanam

original: parasparaviruddhaśāstradvayānusāreṇa kathaṃ dhyānamityata uktam- pañcarātraṃ ceti //
analyzed: paraspara viruddha śāstra dvaya anusāreṇa katham dhyānam iti atas uktam pañcarātram ca iti
iti ādi veda vacanaiḥ ca pañcarātra a prāmāṇya kathanam viruddham iti śeṣaḥ
tatas kim iti atas āha pañca rātram iti

original: pañcarātraṃ ca vedāśca vidyaikaiva dvidheyate // MAnuv_2,2.290cd //

iti ādi veda vacanaiḥ pañcarātram apodyate

original: “yo 'sau nārāyaṇaḥ paro 'vaktāt prasiddhaḥ paramātmā sa ātmanā'tmānamanekadhā vyūhya vyavasthitaḥ /

kṛtsnasya iti viśeṣaṇa anupapatteḥ ca

atra doṣaḥ kaḥ

original: atra pañcarātre ko doṣo yena tannirākriyeta na ko 'pītyarthaḥ /

nanu katham doṣaḥ nā asti jīva utpatteḥ asambhāvitāyāḥ tatra uktatvāt iti atas ṅgīkāra vādena āha utpattiḥ iti

original: “jño 'ta eva'; iti sūtrārthe vipratipannaṃ prati śrutirevodāhatarvyā /

original: yathā hi śrutisūtrayoḥ pratītamapi jīvajananamabhūtabhavanaṃ vihāya upādhiviṣayaṃ vyākhyāyate /

nu viṣamaḥ yam upanyāsaḥ
śruti sūtrayoḥ khalu anādi māyayā suptaḥ

original: tato mukhyārthe grāhye na hetorasiddhirityata āha- anādīti //

original: nanvatroktaṃ tadapratiṣedho harerutpattyabhāvādityata uktaṃ vyūho vibhāga evokto na tūtpattiriti /

yat api uktam kim ete nyonyam bhinnāḥ uta na iti

original: nanvevaṃ tarhi niratiśayatvātkathaṃ svasmādeva svasya vibhāga ityata uktam- nityeti //
analyzed: nanu evam tarhi niratiśaya tvāt katham svasmāt eva svasya vibhāgaḥ iti atas uktam nitya iti

original: ādikāle hi bhagavānnārāyaṇo nijamuktipadapradānādyarthaṃ vāsudevādicaturvyūho babhūva /
analyzed: ādi kāle hi bhagavān nārāyaṇaḥ nija mukti pada pradāna ādi artham vāsudeva ādi catur vyūhaḥ babhūva
tatas kāla antare prayojana antara artham daśa dvādaśa ādi vyūhaḥ jātaḥ
sā iyam śuddha sṛṣṭiḥ iti pāñcarātrikaiḥ abhidhīyate

evam adhikāri viśeṣa ārādhana artham iyam uktiḥ yuktā eva
yathā uktam eka mūrtiḥ catur mūtiḥ athavā pañca mūrtikaḥ
dvādaśa ādi prabhedaḥ vā pūjyate sat janaiḥ hariḥ iti
artha antara kathanasya prayojanam āha anyathā iti

original: evamarthāntaravivakṣayā prayuktasya vākyasyānyathānuvādaṃ vidhāya dūṣaṇābhidhānaṃ kathaṃ kriyate /

original: bhagavata eva mukhyataḥ prāṇadhāraṇādimatastadathartvāt yacca vipratiṣedhācceti sūtrārthatayā kalpitaṃ parasparavyāghāto 'sti pañcarātra iti

samarthitaḥ ca bheda pade bhiṣiktaḥ pramita sarva nirvāha hetuḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: yadapyuktaṃ śāṇḍilyavṛttāntakathane pañcarātrasya vedavidveṣaḥ pratīyata iti /
analyzed: yat api uktam śāṇḍilya vṛttānta kathane pañcarātrasya veda vidveṣaḥ pratīyate iti

vipratiṣedhāt ca pratiṣiddhā hi jīva utpattiḥ asmin api tantre
yathā uktam paramasaṃhitāyām
acetanā parārthā ca nityā satata vikriyā
triguṇā karmaṇām kṣetram prakṛte rūpam ucyate
prāpti rūpeṇa sambandhaḥ tasyāḥ ca puruṣasya ca
sa hi anādiḥ anantaḥ ca paramārthena niścitaḥ iti

original: pañcarātrāprāmāṇyaśaṅkāyāṃ prāptāyāmeva hi tannirāsāya prayāsaḥ sātharkaḥ syāt /

na ca vyadhikaraṇāni dūṣaṇāni tad śaṅkām prāpayitum īśate
nahi chala uttarāṇi etāvat adhikaraṇam prayojayanti
atiprasaṅgāt
prakaraṇa ananuguram ca etat

original: paramatanirāso hyatra prakṛto na tu svamatasamarthanam /

original: laghu caivaṃ sūtraṃ vyaktaṃ ca syāt /

original: sāṅkhayādivirodhisamayānāṃ nirastatvātprathamādhyāye yatsakalaśrutisamanvayena bhagavato lakṣaṇadvayaṃ sādhitaṃ tannirṇītamevetyarthaḥ /

na nigṛhya kathām kuryāt
ityādi smṛti niṣiddham para nirākaraṇam idam na kāryam eva

asya niṣedhasya sat viṣaya tvāt

śruti smṛtyoḥ śruteḥ balavat tvāt

original: śrutau ca paranirākaraṇasya kartavyatayā avagatatvādityāśayavān“andhantamaḥ praviśanti ye 'vidyāmupāsate /

original: tato bhūya iva te tamo ya u vidyāyāṃ ratāḥ /

avidyayā mṛtyum tīrtvā vidyayā amṛtam aśnute
iti mantra dvayam arthataḥ nuvadati andham iti
andham tamaḥ praviśanti ye tu avidyām upāsate

original: tato bhūya ivāpsyanti ye tasyā naiva nindakāḥ // MAnuv_2,2.299 //

original: ye kevalaṃ vidyāyāmeva ratā ityuktyā labdhasyārthasya kathanam ,

original: doṣajñānādatītyaitām ityanena avidyayā duṣṭatvena jñātayā mṛtyuṃ tāmevāvidyāṃ tatkāryaṃ duḥkhādikaṃ cātītya tīrtvā

original: tathāpyāgamāvaṣṭambhena pratyavatiṣṭhamānastathaiva bodhanīya ityāśayavatā mantrāvudāhṛtāviti sarvamanavadyam /

original: kṛtāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ viṣamapadavākyātharvivṛtau dvitīye 'dhyāye 'yaṃ samayacaraṇaḥ paryavasitaḥ // *************************************************************************************************

original: anena vyācikhyāsitatayā buddhisannihitena tṛtīyena pādena vaidikānāṃ vacanānāṃ parasparaṃ avirodhaṃ virodhābhāvaṃ,

original: sūtrakṛtā khalu sarvānapi vedavirodhānparihartuṃ dvitīyo 'yamadhyāya ārabdhaḥ /

original: vaidikānāṃ vacanānāṃ parasparavirodho 'pi tadantarbhūta evetyatastadapākaraṇamiha saṅgatameveti /

ānantarya lakṣaṇām saṅgatim darśayitum atha iti uktam

original: samayavirodhaparihārasya tadānantarye sati śrutīnāṃ parasparavirodhaparihārasya bhavatyayamavasara iti /
analyzed: samaya virodha parihārasya tad ānantarye sati śrutīnām paraspara virodha parihārasya bhavati ayam avasaraḥ iti

original: nanvevaṃ tarhyasya pādasya caturthapādādbhedo na syāt /

original: tatrāpi vedavacasāṃ parasparavirodhasya apākriyamāṇatvādityata uktam- adhidaiveti //

adhidaivāni avyakta ādi abhimāni devatāḥ
adhibhūtāni kārya kāraṇa upetāni viyat ādi bhūtāni
idam uktam bhavati

original: yadyapi pādadvaye vedavākyānāṃ parasparavirodha eva nirasyate /

original: yadyanākāśatā pūrvaṃ kiṃ mūrtanibiḍaṃ jagat // MAnuv_2,3.10cd // *8,484*
analyzed: yadi anākāśa tā pūrvam kim mūrta nibiḍam jagat

original: sarvasyāpi mūrtābhāvasya sṛṣṭāvutpattyaṅgīkāre pralaye 'vaśyaṃ tadabhāvo 'bhyupagamaḥ syāt /
analyzed: sarvasya api mūrta abhāvasya sṛṣṭau utpatti aṅgīkāre pralaye vaśyam tad abhāvaḥ abhyupagamaḥ syāt
atyanta asataḥ janma asambhavāt

original: yadi ca sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ pralaye 'nākāśatā sarvasya mūrtadravyābhāvasyābhāvaḥ aṅgīkriyate /
analyzed: yadi ca sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvam pralaye na ākāśa tā sarvasya mūrta dravya abhāvasya abhāvaḥ aṅgīkriyate
tarhi kim tadā mūrta nibiḍam jagat aṅgīkriyate
etat eva spaṣṭayati mūrtā iti
ca eva yadi anākāśa tā bhavet
yadi ukta lakṣaṇa ākāśa abhāvaḥ pralaye bhavet tadā mūrta sampūrṇa tā bhavet eva
abhāva abhāvasya bhāva anatirekāt
tad vayāpta tvāt vā
caśabdaḥ nukta samuccaya arthaḥ
sṛṣṭay uttara kālam mūrta mātram ca na syāt
evam ca sarga pralaya viparivartaḥ syāt
adhikā ca pralaye mūrta sampūrteḥ āpattiḥ

original: mūrtadravyābhāva evākāśo na tato 'tirikto 'stīti dvitīyaṃ nirākaroti- mūrtadravyāṇīti //
analyzed: mūrta dravya abhāvaḥ eva ākāśaḥ na tiriktaḥ sti iti dvitīyam nirākaroti mūrta dravyāṇi iti

original: nanvākāśasyābhūtvābhavanalakṣaṇāmutpattimadhunaiva nirākṛtyātra punastadaṅgīkāre kathaṃ pūrvottaravyāghāto na bhavedityata āha- avyākṛtamiti

original: nanvavyākṛtākāśasyotpattyabhāve mā bhūdākāśaḥ sambhūta iti virodhaḥ /

kāśa utpattim vyākhyāya upalakṣita prakṛti ādi utpattim vyākhyāti prakṛtiḥ iti

original: prakṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ kāla ityete ca samastaśaḥ /

īśa adhīna viśeṣeṇa janyāḥ iti eva kīrtitāḥ

īśvara adhīna viśeṣeṇa eva na a bhūtvā abhāvi tvena iti arthaḥ

original: kālapravāha evaiko nityo natu viśeṣavān // MAnuv_2,3.16ab //

original: tatra kasya kīdṛśī viśeṣāvāptirityataḥ prakṛtyāditrayābhimānidevatāyāḥ parādhīnaviśeṣāvāptiṃ viśadayati- puruṣeti //
analyzed: tatra kasya kīdṛśī viśeṣa avāptiḥ iti atas prakṛti ādi traya abhimāni devatāyāḥ para adhīna viśeṣa avāptim viśadayati puruṣa iti

prāptā eva sṛṣṭā iti uditā
yasmāt puruṣa ādīnām ramā abhimāninī
sā ca ekā eva deha dehi ādi bheda rahitā
tat tasmāt sākṣāt bhagavat icchayā sisṛkṣu tva viśeṣam prāptā eva sṛṣṭā iti uditā
na tu vināyaka ādi abhimāni vat deha utpattimatī iti arthaḥ

vyakti rūpasya īśvarā aparā

pradhānam vikṛteḥ api
pradhānam api vikṛteḥ īśvara adhīnāyāḥ kāraṇāt idam sarvam asṛjata ityādau sṛṣṭam iti uditam iti arthaḥ
yathā uktam
vikāraḥ vyakta janma hi iti

pumāṃsaḥ deha sambandhāt sṛṣṭimantaḥ iti īritāḥ

original: kālapravāhasya pravāhijanma mahadādīnāṃ copacayāvāptirviśeṣalābha iti spaṣṭatvā(nnātro)nnoktam /

etena jñaḥ te eva tathā prāṇāḥ
ityadikam api vyākhyātam veditavyam

atha śrīmat nyāyasudhāyām mātariśva adhikaraṇam
om etena mātariśvā vyākhyātaḥ om

original: atītādhikaraṇe viyadādiviṣayāṇāṃ utpattyanutpattiśrutīnāṃ vyavasthayā virodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ /

idānīṃtejaḥ bannāni ākāśaḥ iti tāni anityāni vāyuḥ vāva nityaḥ
iti śrutau vyavasthita nitya tva anitya tvavantam api ākāśam anitya pakṣe nikṣipya

original: vināyakasyeva vāyudevatāyāḥ svarūpeṇa nityatvaṃ dehotpattyādinā janmādimattvamiti
analyzed: vināyakasya iva vāyu devatāyāḥ sva rūpeṇa nitya tvam deha utpatti ādinā janma ādimat tvam iti

yayā adhika āśaṅkā parihāraḥ syāt iti atas tām daśaryati
evam iti
etena mātariśvā vyākhyātaḥ  /
evam praḷaya kāle pi pratibhāta parāvaraḥ
mukhyau āyuḥ nityasamaḥ śarīra utpatti kāraṇāt
para adhīna viśeṣeṇa janimān eva śabditaḥ
yathā viyat anādi janmavat ca uktam evam iti atharḥ

original: pratibhātaparāvaraḥ śarīrābhāve 'pi pratibhenaiva jñānena viṣayīkṛtātītānāgato yatastasmānnityasama iti śabditaḥ /
analyzed: pratibhātaparāvaraḥ śarīra abhāve pi pratibhena eva jñānena viṣayīkṛta atīta anāgataḥ yatas tasmāt nityasamaḥ iti śabditaḥ
śarīra utpatti kāraṇāt para adhīna viśeṣeṇa iti etayoḥ hetu hetumat bhāvaḥ
evaśabdasya para adhīna viśeṣeṇa eva iti anvayaḥ
mukhya vāyuḥ iti anena bhūta prakaraṇe na bhūta vāyu viṣayam idam sūtram
tatra adhika āśaṅkā abhāvāt
atas eva na avāntara abhimāni viṣayam
kinnāma tat parama abhimāni viṣayam eva iti sūcayati
sva rūpa atiriktasya pratibha jñānasya api anupaplavāt ākāśa devatātaḥ viśeṣaḥ yujyate iti bhāvaḥ
yat uktam atra prakaraṇe para adhīna viśeṣa avāptiḥ eva janiḥ na a bhūtvā bhavanam iti tat upapatti antareṇa upapādayan adhikaraṇa artham upasaṃharati na eva iti
na eva kiñcid tatas janma varjitam paramāt ṛte
pūrva śabda vilopaḥ ca yadi janma iti kīrtyate

original: ramāyā naiva janmāsti caitanyasyāpi kevalam // MAnuv_2,3.21 //
analyzed: ramāyāḥ nā eva janma asti caitanyasya api kevalam
pradhanasya ca vedasya
iti siddham iti śeṣaḥ
etat ca janmanaḥ para adhīna viśeṣa lābha svarūpa

original: tva evāṅgīkṛte siddhayati na tvabhūtvābhavanarūpatva ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tve eva aṅgīkṛte siddhayati na tu a bhūtvā bhavana rūpa tve iti arthaḥ
nanu avyākṛta ākāśasya a bhūtvā bhavana anupapatteḥ astu tatra para adhīna viśeṣa avāpti jarnma śabda arthaḥ
anyatra tu a bhūtvā bhavanam eva aṅgīkriyate ced kaḥ doṣaḥ
bādhaka bhāva abhāvābhyām aneka artha tva kalpanā virodhāt iti atas āha sthūla tā iti
upādāna dharmiṇaḥ dharmi antarātmanā parivartaḥ sthūla tā bhāvaḥ
atas eva pūrva śabda vilopaḥ ca pūrva śabda nivṛttau śabda antara pravṛttiḥ ca iti arthaḥ
udāhṛtam ca etat prakṛti adhikaraṇe

original: abhūtvābhavanaṃ yadi janmeti kīrtyata ityukte 'sadanuvādaḥ syāt /

original: tarhi ramāyā jīvacaitanyasyāpi pradhānasya vedasya caivaṃvidhaṃ janma naivāstītyataḥ parameśvarādṛte sarvaṃ janimaditi na siddhayet /
analyzed: tarhi ramāyāḥ jīva caitanyasya api pradhānasya vedasya ca evaṃvidham janma na evā asti iti atas parameśvarāt ṛte sarvam janimat iti na
tathā ca edam sarvam asṛjata
ityādi pratijñāhāniḥ ātmā vā

original: ityādiśabdavirodho vibhaktatvahetoranaikāntyaṃ ca syāt iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /

original: nahi kṣīraṃ dadhijātamitivadidaṃ dravyaṃ ramāditvena pari(ṇatami)

original: nanu vedasya kīdṛśī parādhīnaviśeṣāptiryena bhavatpakṣe pratijñāhānyādikaṃ na syādityata āha- vedasyāpīti //
analyzed: nanu vedasya kīdṛśī para adhīna viśeṣa āptiḥ yena bhavat pakṣe pratijñā hāni ādikam na syāt iti atas āha vedasya api iti

pi prasiddhā

utpattiḥ atra kathitā
atra śruti sūtrayoḥ

original: bādhānabhyupagame laukikavaidikavyavahāravirodho 'pasiddhāntaśca syādityataḥ sarvathāṅgīkartavye bādhe taddṛṣṭāntena viyadāderapi bādhāyogātsattvānupapattirityata  #

original: bādhāyogaḥ sata iti vyāptireṣā kva dṛśyate // MAnuv_2,3.46ab //

kva iti ākṣepe
idam uktam bhavati

sa tu bhrāntau iva viyat ādau api asti eva
kṣaṇika tva brahma pariṇāma tva ādi rūpeṇa vijñātasya sthāyi tva ādi rūpeṇa avagamāt

original: nacārthāpatteḥ pṛthak pramāṇatve kiṃ vyāptyeti vācyam /

original: kintu sattvasya bādhābhāvena bādhasya vā sattvābhāvena /

original: tasya cānyathānupapattiṃ vyutpādayatā sarvathāsattve bādho na syāditi prasaṅgo vā bādhātsanna bhavatītyanumānaṃ vā vācyam /

vimatam na asat pratīyamāna tvāt

original: yaccāsanna tatpratīyate yathā śaśaviṣāṇamiti pramāṇenāsattvavirahasya niścitatvāt /

atas eva asattve nupapatti abhāvāt arthāpatteḥ anyathā evā upapattiḥ iti api pratyuktam

pratyakṣam viparītam anupalambhaḥ ca asiddhaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: evamanumānādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ dūṣaṇamabhidhāya sādhāraṇaṃ dūṣaṇamāha- pratyakṣāditi //
analyzed: evam anumāna ādīnām pratyekam dūṣaṇam abhidhāya sādhāraṇam dūṣaṇam āha pratyakṣāt iti

original: pratyakṣeṇa gaganādau sattvameva śuktirajatādau tvasattvameva niścīyate /
analyzed: pratyakṣeṇa gagana ādau sattvam eva śukti rajata ādau tu asattvam eva niścīyate
sat gaganam
asti me jñānam

original: asadeva rajataṃ pratyabhāditi sarvalokasākṣiṇaḥ sākṣātkāripratyakṣasya durapahnavatvāt /
analyzed: asat eva rajatam pratyabhāt iti sarva loka sākṣiṇaḥ sākṣātkāri pratyakṣasya durapahnava tvāt

original: atastadanirvācyatāyāmāśaṅkayamānānyanumānādīni pratyakṣāpahṛtaviṣayāṇīti“nobhayaṃ cenna siddhaṃ tat'; iti yuktam /

original: yadvā jīveśvarayorbhedo mithyā bhedatvādityādyanumānasya dūṣaṇāntaramāha- pratyakṣāditi //
analyzed: yat vā jīva īśvarayoḥ bhedaḥ mithyā bheda tvāt ityādi anumānasya dūṣaṇa antaram āha pratyakṣāt iti
jīva īśvara bhedasya avadhāryate iti śeṣaḥ
tatas pratyakṣa viruddha tvena kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvam jīva īśvara bheda mithyātva ādi sādhaka anumānasya iti bhāvaḥ

īśvaraḥ tāvat na pratyakṣa siddhaḥ

na api sarve jīvāḥ
para ātmanām para ātmānam prati pratyakṣa tvasya anabhyupagamāt

original: nacāpratyakṣavastubhedaḥ pratyakṣasiddho dūre tatsatyatvamityata āha- śāstreti //
analyzed: na ca apratyakṣa vastu bhedaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ dūre tad satya tvam iti atas āha śāstra iti

īyate pratyakṣeṇa iti śeṣaḥ

original: uktaṃ tāvannaika eva bhedo 'nekatra vyāsajya vartate kintvekapratiyogiko 'paradharmika iti /

tathā loke darśanāt

original: tatreśvarasyātmāntarāṇāṃ cāpratyakṣatvena taddharmikasya bhedasya pratyakṣeṇa jñātumaśakyatve 'pi parameśvarapratiyogikaḥ svātmadharmiko bhedaḥ  #
analyzed: tatra īśvarasya ātma antarāṇām ca apratyakṣa tvena tad dharmikasya bhedasya pratyakṣeṇa jñātum aśakya tve pi parameśvara pratiyogikaḥ sva ātma dharmikaḥ bhedaḥ
pratyakṣeṇa jñātum śakyate eva
sva ātmanaḥ pratyakṣa tvāt
para īśānasya ca śāstreṇa avagata tvāt

original: yastu śāstreṇeśvaraṃ na jānāti tena mā vimāyi tatpratiyogikaḥ svātmano bhedaḥ /

original: śāstrādviditeśvarasyaiva pratyakṣaṃ tataḥ svātmano bhede pramāṇamuktamiti /

original: tathāpi kathamanumānasya kālātyayāpadiṣṭatvaṃ bhedagrāhakasya pratyakṣasya prābalyānirūpaṇādityata āha- anubhūtīti // *8,559*

original: tatāpi kathamanumānasya kālātyayāpadiṣṭatvaṃ bhedagrāhakasya pratyakṣasya prābalyānirūpaṇādityata āha anubhūtīti /
analyzed: katham anumānasya kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvam bheda grāhakasya pratyakṣasya prābalya anirūpaṇāt iti atas āha anubhūti iti

original: atastadvirodhena kāraṇena jīvabrahmaṇorekatvaṃ nānumātuṃ śakyata iti /

original: astu sākṣipratyakṣamanumānātprabalaṃ tasyeśvarātsvātmano bhedagrāhakatvaṃ tu kuto niścitaṃ yenānumānaṃ bādhitaviṣayaṃ syādityata āha- kiñciditi

original: sarvajño bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarvaśaktiriti śrutaḥ // MAnuv_2,3.51ab //

original: gamya tadviruddhadharmāṇaṃ yamadhyakṣīkaroti sa tasmāttasya bhedaṃ pratyakṣataḥ paśyatyeveti sarvasākṣikam /

original: yadyapi bhedaḥ pratyakṣasiddhastathāpi pratiyogino vaidharmyadaśarnaṃ pratyakṣasācivyamācaratīti na doṣaḥ /

dṛṣṭam hi ratna tattva sākṣātkāre śāstrīya lakṣaṇa jñānasya sācivyam

original: tadihāpi śāstrāvagatasārvajñādimadīśvaraḥ puruṣaḥ svātmanaṃ tadviruddhālpajñatvādidharmavantaṃ sākṣiṇānubhavaṃstataḥ svātmano bhedaṃ kathaṃ  #
analyzed: tat iha api śāstra avagata sārvajña ādimat īśvaraḥ puruṣaḥ svātmanam tad viruddha alpajñatva ādi dharmavantam sākṣiṇā anubhavan tatas svātmanaḥ bhedam katham
na adhyakṣīkuryāt iti
astu ekasya jīvasya īśvarāt bhedaḥ sākṣi siddhaḥ

original: tathāpi taṃ vihāyānyatreśvarābhedānumāne na pratyakṣabādha ityata uktam- sarvaireveti //
analyzed: tathā api tam vihāya anyatra īśvara abheda anumāne na pratyakṣa bādhaḥ iti atas uktam sarvaiḥ eva iti
eka pratyakṣa bādhā abhāve tad tad pratyakṣa bādhaḥ duṣpariharaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
nanu jīvam pakṣīkṛtya īśvara abheda sādhane bhavet eyam pratyakṣa virodhaḥ
na ca evam anumīyate

original: kintvīśvaraṃ pakṣīkṛtya jīvābheda ityata āha- anubhūtāddhīti //
analyzed: kintu īśvaram pakṣīkṛtya jīva abhedaḥ iti atas āha anubhūtāt hi iti

īśvaram pakṣīkurvatā hi tad siddhiḥ avaśyam vaktavyā

original: naca pratyakṣādinā sa siddhayatīti śrutireva tadgrāhikā grāhyā /

original: sadāvagatālpajñatvādimañjīrasvarūpaṃ prati sārvajñādimadīśvarasvarūpaṃ pratipādayantī śrutistatastaṃ bhinnameva pratipādayati /

original: tenātropajīvakavirodhinorupajīvyayoḥ pratyakṣāgamayorevāprāmāṇyamucitamityato yaḥ sarvajña ityāderāgamasya tāvadaprāmāṇyamapākaroti- aprāmāṇyamiti

original: nanvevaṃ tarhi nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānavirodhena idaṃ rajatamita jñānasyāprāmāṇyaṃ na syāt /

original: atrāpi tṛtīyādhyāye catutharpāde“tathānyepyāhuḥ sarvaṃ jñānaṃ dharmiṇi pramāṇaṃ prakāre tu viparyaya iti) /

original: tadatrāpīdaṃ rajatamiti jñānamidamaṃśe pramāṇamiti tatsiddhamidamākāramāśritya pravṛttena bādhakapratyayena virodhādrajatāṃśe pūrvajñānasyāprāmāṇyaṃ  #
analyzed: tat atra api idam rajatam iti jñānam idam aṃśe pramāṇam iti tat siddham idam ākāram āśritya pravṛttena bādhaka pratyayena virodhāt rajata aṃśe pūrva jñānasya aprāmāṇyam
yujyate eva

original: nanvanenaiva nyāyenābhedānumānāgamavirodhena yaḥ sarvajña ityādiśruteraprāmāṇyaṃ śakyopapādanam /
analyzed: nanu anena eva nyāyena abheda anumāna āgama virodhena yaḥ sarvajñaḥ ityādi śruteḥ aprāmāṇyam śakya upapādanam
iyam api śrutiḥ brahma svarūpa mātre pramāṇam iti tat mātram upajīvya anumāna āgamābhyām sārvajña ādi bhedaka dharma vaiśiṣyayā aṃśe pramāṇīkariṣyate
tathā ca yad dharmi grāhakam na tad virodhaḥ numāna ādeḥ

original: yacca virodhi na taddharmipramāramityata āha- yaditi //
analyzed: yat ca virodhi na tat dharmi pramāram iti atas āha yat iti

original: yat svarūpagrahe mānaṃ taddharme na kathaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_2,3.53cd //
analyzed: yat sva rūpa grahe mānam tat dharme na katham bhavet
yat śati vākyam brahma sva rūpa grahaṇa artham mānam aṅgīkriyate

original: taddharme sārvajñādidharmavaiśiṣyayākāre kathaṃ na mānaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tad dharme sārvajña ādi dharma vaiśiṣyayā ākāre katham na mānam bhavet
ayam abhisandhiḥ

original: śuktirajatādijñānaṃ hīdamaṃśe pramāṇaṃ rajatavaiśiṣyayāṃśe tvapramāṇamiti yuktam /
analyzed: śukti rajata ādi jñānam hi idam aṃśe pramāṇam rajata vaiśiṣyayā aṃśe tu apramāṇam iti yuktam
vaiśiṣyayā aṃśasya bādhaka pramāṇa viruddha tvāt
idam ākārasya uttaratra api anuvṛtteḥ

original: idaṃ na rajatamiti bādhakajñānamutpadyate na punarnedaṃ rajataṃ ceti /
analyzed: idam na rajatam iti bādhaka jñānam utpadyate na punar na idam rajatam ca iti
na ca ayam atra nyāyaḥ
sva rūpa vat viśiṣya aṃśe pi bādhaka abhāvāt
na ca abheda anumāna āgamau bādhakau
anyonya āśraya tvāt

original: bādhitatvena śruteraprāmāṇye satyupajīvyavirodharahitasyānumānāderbādhakatvaṃ sati ca tasmiṃstadvirodhinyāḥ śruteraprāmāṇyamiti /
analyzed: bādhita tvena śruteḥ aprāmāṇye sati upajīvya virodha rahitasya anumāna ādeḥ bādhaka tvam sati ca tasmin tad virodhinyāḥ śruteḥ aprāmāṇyam iti
katham ca anumāna ādeḥ śruti bādhaka tvam
na tāvat virodhi tva mātreṇa
vaiparītyasya api suvaca tvāt

original: nāpi virodhyuttarajñānatvena śuktirūpyamiti jñānānantaraṃ rajatamidamiti jñānasya darśanāt /
analyzed: nā api virodhi uttara jñāna tvena śukti rūpyam iti jñāna anantaram rajatam idam iti jñānasya darśanāt
anuttara virodhi jñānam bādhakam idam tu sottaram iti api na
kadācid anuttarasya api rajata jñānasya sambhavāt

original: kintu yāvacchakti parīkṣitamuttaraṃ virodhyaparīkṣitasya pūrvasya bādhakaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: kintu yāvacchakti parīkṣitam uttaram virodhya parīkṣitasya pūrvasya bādhakam bhavati
na ca evam atra asti iti

original: na kevalaṃ bādhakābhāvasāmyādayaṃ vibhāgo na yuktaḥ kiṃ tarhītyata āha- eketi //
analyzed: na kevalam bādhaka abhāva sāmyāt ayam vibhāgaḥ na yuktaḥ kim tarhi iti atas āha eka iti
eka vijñāna vijñaptyāḥ dvayam mānam bhaviṣyati

original: na cedekamamānaṃ tad dvayamapyatra no bhavet // MAnuv_2,3.54 //
analyzed: na ced ekam amānam tat dvayam api atra no bhavet
ekavidham eva idam yaḥ sarvajñaḥ ityādi śruti janitam vijñānam

original: na punaḥ śuktirajatādijñānamiva svarūpamātre pramāṇaṃ viśiṣyākāre tvapramāṇamityanekavidhamityevaṃ
analyzed: na punar śukti rajata ādi jñānam iva svarūpa mātre pramāṇam viśiṣya ākāre tu apramāṇam iti anekavidham iti evam
parīkṣā sahakṛta sākṣi rūpa vijñaptyā api idam jñāna dvayam dharma dharmi dvaya garbham viśiṣya ākāram
prati api mānam bhavati eva
vakṣyate ca ayam arthaḥ prapañcena
yat vā dvayam pratīti dvayam sva rūpavat dharme pi iti yojyam

original: athavā yaḥ sarvajña ityādiśruterbrahmasvarūpamātre prāmāṇyamaprāmāṇyaṃ tu sārvajñādiviśiṣyākāra iti vadataḥ ko 'bhiprāyaḥ /
analyzed: athavā yaḥ sarvajñaḥ ityādi śruteḥ brahma svarūpa mātre prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam tu sārvajña ādi viśiṣya ākāre iti vadataḥ kaḥ bhiprāyaḥ

original: kiṃ śuktirajatādijñānamivaikamevedaṃ jñānaṃ viṣayabhedena pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ ceti /
analyzed: kim śukti rajata ādi jñānam iva ekam eva idam jñānam viṣaya bhedena pramāṇam apramāṇam ca iti
kiṃvā jñāna dvayam etat tatra ekam pramāṇam aparam ca apramāṇam iti
ādyam dūṣayati yat iti
pūrvaḥ eva abhiprāyaḥ
dvitīyam nirākaroti eka iti

original: ekamevedaṃ vijñānamiti sākṣivijñaptyā nānekatvaṃ kalpyamiti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: ekam eva idam vijñānam iti sākṣi vijñaptyā na aneka tvam kalpyam iti śeṣaḥ
anyathā stambhaḥ yam ityādau api jñāna dvaya kalpanā āpattiḥ
tathā ca sāmānādhikaraṇyam na kena api jñāyeta

original: astu vedaṃ jñānadvayaṃ tathāpi naikasyāprāmāṇyaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: astu vā idam jñāna dvayam tathā api nā ekasya aprāmāṇyam vaktum śakyate
svarūpa jñānasya iva dharma jñānasya api abādhita tvāt iti āha dvayam iti
jñāna dvayam api iti arthaḥ
dharma jñānam api iti ca
vaktavye dvayam iti vacanam nyāya sāmya sūcana artham

original: evaṃ bādhābhāvaparīkṣitatvasāmye 'pi śrautamekaṃ jñānadvayaṃ vāṅgīkṛtyāṃśataḥ prāmāṇyaprāmāṇye vadato 'tiprasaṅgamāha- nacediti //
analyzed: evam bādhā abhāva parīkṣita tva sāmye śrautam ekam jñāna dvayam vā aṅgīkṛtya aṃśataḥ prāmāṇya prāmāṇye vadataḥ tiprasaṅgam āha na ced iti

original: tacchrautaṃ jñānaṃ dvayaṃ viśiṣyākāraṃ prati pramāṇaṃ na cettadātra viṣaye ekaṃ svarūpāṃśaṃ pratyapi pramāṇaṃ na bhavet /
analyzed: tat śrautam jñānam dvayam viśiṣya ākāram prati pramāṇam na ced tadā atra viṣaye ekam svarūpa aṃśam prati api pramāṇam na bhavet
aviśeṣāt
tathā ca punar anāśrayayoḥ anumāna āgāmayoḥ anutthānam eva

original: yadvā tadvijñānamatra viṣaye ekaṃ viśiṣyākāraṃ prati pramāṇaṃ cettadā dvayaṃ pratyapi no bhavet /
analyzed: yat vā tat vijñānam atra viṣaye ekam viśiṣya ākāram prati pramāṇam ced tadā dvayam prati api no bhavet
viśiṣya ākāravat sva rūpe pramāṇam na bhavet
aviśeṣāt iti yāvat

original: jñānadvayāṅgīkāravāde tvatra jñānadvaye tadviśiṣyaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ na cettarhi jñānadvayamapi pramāṇaṃ na bhavet /
analyzed: jñāna dvaya aṅgīkāra vāde tu atra jñāna dvaye tad viśiṣya viṣayam jñānam pramāṇam na ced tarhi jñāna dvayam api pramāṇam na bhavet
viśiṣya jñānam iva svarūpa jñānam api apramāṇam syāt aviśeṣāt iti

original: evamabhedānumānāgamau prati yaḥ sarvajña iti śruterniṣedhyasamarpakatvenopajīvyatvaṃ pratyuktam /
analyzed: evam abheda anumāna āgamau prati yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti śruteḥ niṣedhya samarpaka tvena upajīvya tvam pratyuktam
tathā api na anumāna āgamayoḥ upajīvya pramāṇa virodhaḥ sti
yaḥ sarvajñaḥ ityādi śruti siddha brahma sva rūpa mātra āśrayaṇena pravṛtta tvāt
nahi sārvajña ādi viśiṣya ākāram avalambya anumāna ādinā pravartitavyam iti atra niyāmakam asti
tatas viruddha ākārasya anupayogi tayā anupajīvanāt upajīvyasya ca svarūpa mātrasya avirodhi tvāt na upajīvya pramāṇa virodhaḥ
numāna ādeḥ pramāṇa virodhaḥ tu kathañcid syāt iti āśaṅkām pariharan upasaṃharati dharmī iti
dharmi grāhi virodhaḥ tu tasmāt mānasya dūṣaṇam
tuśabdaḥ viśeṣa arthaḥ
pramāṇa mātra virodhāt vayavacchinatti
dharmi grāhiṇyā śrutyā virodhaḥ
mānasya abheda pramāṇasya anumāna āgama rūpasya
ayam āśayaḥ

original: paramāṇavaḥ sāvayavā ityāderanumānasya vākyasya ca kathamupajīvyavirodhaḥ iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: paramāṇavaḥ sa avayavāḥ ityādeḥ anumānasya vākyasya ca katham upajīvya virodhaḥ iti vaktavyam
paramāṇu tvasya anupayoginaḥ nupajīvya tvam kintu svarūpa mātrasya iti vaktum śakya tvāt
na evam yuktam
niravayatva ādinā vinā paramāṇoḥ dharmīkaraṇa asambhavāt
svarūpa mātra dharmīkaraṇe siddhārtha tā āpattiḥ iti ced
samam prakṛte pi

original: nahi brahmāpi sārvajñādinā vinā śakyaṃ dharmīkartum /
analyzed: nahi brahma api sārvajña ādinā vinā śakyam dharmīkartum
svarūpa mātra dharmīkaraṇe siddhasādhanāt

original: āropitena sārvajñādinā vyāvṛttasya dharmīkaraṇe ko doṣaḥ /
analyzed: āropitena sārvajña ādinā vyāvṛttasya dharmīkaraṇe kaḥ doṣaḥ

original: yo 'yaṃ sthāṇuḥ sa puruṣa itivaditi cenna /
analyzed: yaḥ yam sthāṇuḥ sa puruṣaḥ itivat iti ced na
āropitena niravayava tva ādinā vyāvṛttasya tatra api dharmīkaraṇa sambhavāt
na āropitam iti ced
tulyam atra api
śruteḥ api prāmāṇya niścayāt

original: tadevaṃ pramāṇasiddhena niravayavatvādinā viśiṣyasyaiva yathā dharmīkaraṇaṃ tathātrāpi
analyzed: tat evam pramāṇa siddhena niravayava tva ādinā viśiṣyasya eva yathā dharmīkaraṇam tathā atra api

original: sāvarjñādinā pāramārthikenaiva viśiṣyasyaiva dharmīkaraṇamityato dharmigrāhakavirodho duṣparihara iti /
analyzed: pāramārthikena eva viśiṣyasya eva dharmīkaraṇam iti atas dharmi grāhaka virodhaḥ duṣpariharaḥ iti
syāt etat
yathā khalu abheda pramāṇayoḥ anumāna āgamayoḥ upajīvya virodhāt na abheda sādhaka tvam tathā udāhṛtāyāḥ cintyaḥ ityādi bheda śruteḥ api upajīvya virodhāt na
tādātmya pratiyogikaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ hi bhedaḥ nāma

original: nacāprāpte tādātmye tatpratiṣedhabodhanaṃ yuktamityabhedaprāpakaṃ pramāṇamupajīvya pravṛttā bhedaśrutiḥ kathaṃ nopajīvyaviruddhā /
analyzed: na ca aprāpte tādātmye tad pratiṣedha bodhanam yuktam iti abheda prāpakam pramāṇam upajīvya pravṛttā bheda śrutiḥ katham nā upajīvya viruddhā

original: kiñca nirbhedaṃ svarūpamāśritya tasya bhedo bodhanīyaḥ /
analyzed: kiñca nirbhedam svarūpam āśritya tasya bhedaḥ bodhanīyaḥ
tathā ca katham na upajīvya virodhaḥ
yathā uktam abhedam nā ullikhantī dhīḥ na bheda ullekhana kṣamā
tathā ca ādye pramā sā syāt na antye sva apekṣya vaiśasāt
iti atas āha na iti
na upajīvyaḥ hi abhedaḥ kvacid bheda śruteḥ balāt
hi śabdaḥ yukti sūcakaḥ
abhedaḥ iti tad grāhakam
atra kvacid iti
dharmi tva ādau iti arthaḥ
tat ayam arthaḥ
bheda śruteḥ hi na dharmi samarpaka tvena abheda jñāna upajīvaka tvam tāvat
jīva īśvara svarūpasya eva dharmi tvāt
nā api svarūpa prāmāṇya grāhaka tvena
pratyakṣeṇa eva tad siddheḥ
atas niṣedhya prāpaka tayā eva iti vaktavyam
na ca tad virodhaḥ prāmāṇyam āvahati
niṣedha śāstra apalāpa prasaṅgāt
na ca pramāṇa prāptasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ
kintu tattvamasi ādi śruti tātparya a parijñāna prāptasya eva

original: yadapi nirbhedaṃ svarūpamādāya bhedo boddhavya iti tatrāpi na yayorbhedo bodhanīyastayorabheda āśrayaṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: yat api nirbhedam svarūpam ādāya bhedaḥ boddhavyaḥ iti tatra api na yayoḥ bhedaḥ bodhanīyaḥ tayoḥ abhedaḥ āśrayaṇīyaḥ

original: kintu svagatabhedaṃ vastu dharmitayopādāya tasyāntato bhedo bodhyate /
analyzed: kintu svagata bhedam vastu dharmitayā upādāya tasya antatas bhedaḥ bodhyate
atas jīva īśa bheda śruteḥ tad abheda upajīvana abhāvāt anapekṣa tva lakṣaṇāt balāt yuktam bheda sādhaka tvam iti śeṣaḥ
kiñca tiṣṭhatu tāvat yaḥ sarvajñaḥ ityādi śruteḥ upajīvya tvam
tathā api abheda anumāna āgama bādhaka tvam bhavet eva

original: iyaṃ khalu śrutiḥ sārvajñādiviśiṣyamīśvaraṃ pratipādayantī na kiñcidapekṣate /
analyzed: iyam khalu śrutiḥ sārvajña ādi viśiṣyam īśvaram pratipādayantī na kiñcid apekṣate
anumāna āgamau tu sa apekṣau
sāpekṣa nirapekṣayoḥ ca nirapekṣasya prābalyāt iti āśayavān āha na upajīvyaḥ hi iti
atra bheda abheda pramāṇayoḥ madhye
bheda śruteḥ bhedaka dharma viśiṣya dharmi śruteḥ
abhedaḥ iti abheda pramāṇam
anapekṣa tva upalakṣaṇam etat
atas balāt abheda pramāṇa bādhaka tvam iti śeṣaḥ
syāt etat

original: yaḥ sarvajña ityādiśrutirna jīvabhedakadharmaviśiṣyaṃ brahma pratipādayati /
analyzed: yaḥ sarvajñaḥ ityādi śrutiḥ na jīva bhedaka dharma viśiṣyam brahma pratipādayati
kintu anuvadati eva
atas na anumāna ādeḥ tad bādhaḥ iti atas āha na ca iti

original: na ca mānāntaropeyaṃ brahma tad bhavati kvacit // MAnuv_2,3.56ab //
analyzed: na ca māna antara upeyam brahma tat bhavati kvacid
upeyam jñeyam
tat iti sārvajña ādi upetam
kvacid iti bhrānti pratipannam api na bhavati iti sūcayati
na tāvat sārvajña ādi viśiṣyam brahma śrīti vyatirikta pramāṇa gamyam
śāstra eka yoni tvasya samarthita tvāt
na api bhrānti pratipannam
kvacid pramitasya eva anyatra āropāt
na ca pramāṇena bhrāntyā vā aprāptasya anuvādaḥ sambhavati
atas na iyam śrutiḥ anuvādinī
kinnāma pratipādayati eva ukta rūpam brahma iti
nanu tathā api nā upajīvya pramāṇa virodhaḥ numāna ādeḥ
śruti upajīvane hi saḥ syāt
na ca evam
tad vayatirikta pramāṇa upajīvanāt iti atas āha na ca iti

original: vastuvyavahito vahniradhūmasthale pratyakṣādyavedyo 'pi kvaciddeśe pratyakṣeṇānumānena vāvagamyate /
analyzed: vastu vyavahitaḥ vahniḥ adhūma sthale pratyakṣa ādi avedyaḥ kvacid deśe pratyakṣeṇa anumānena vā avagamyate
prāk patana utpatteḥ agamyam api guru tvam kvacid kāle numānena gamyate
na ca evam brahma kvacid māna antara upeyam
yena tat upajīvya anumāna ādi pravṛttiḥ syāt
astu vā brahma pramāṇa antara vedyam
tathā api abheda anumāna ādeḥ upajīvya pramāṇa virodhaḥ duṣpariharaḥ
śruti vat tasya api pramāṇasya bheda pratyāyaka tvāt iti abhiprāyavān āha yena iti
yena mānena ca apeyam bhedaḥ tena avagamyate
upeyam brahma iti śeṣaḥ
tat katham iti atas āha sa sārvajña iti
sarva jñāna maya evā īśaḥ yadi upeyaḥ kathañcana
sarva jñathva guṇena eva tayā bhedaḥ vagamyate
dharma ādikam kasyacid pratyakṣam prameya tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ādikayā
vajña sādhaka tayā anumayā
sarva kartṛ tva ādi anumāna upalakṣaṇam ca etat
eva iti pratyakṣam vyāvartayati
kathañcana iti abhyupagama vādaḥ yam iti sūcayati
sarvajña tva iti upalakṣaṇam
tayā eva iti anvayaḥ
īśvare tāvat pratyakṣam śaṅkā arham eva na bhavati
atas numānam eva vaktavyam
pratipakṣa ādinā parāhatasya api tasya kathañcid śaṅkā arha tvāt
anumānam ca kiñcid kenacid viśiṣyam eva pratipādayati
na tu niṣkṛṣṭam vastu
naca jīva ādi sādhāraṇa dharma viśiṣya athar siddhau īśvaraḥ sidhyati
tasmāt bhedaka dharma vaiśiṣyayena eva tad siddhiḥ varktavyā
tathā ca anumāna ādeḥ upajīvya virodhaḥ vajralepāyitaḥ

original: yadyapyanumānaṃ svataḥ śrutito durbalaṃ tathāpi upajīvyatayā bādhakaṃ bhavatyeveti / *8,584*
analyzed: yadi api anumānam svatas śrutitaḥ durbalam tathā api upajīvya tayā bādhakam bhavati eva iti
tat anena īśvara grāhikāyāḥ śruteḥ bhedaka dharma viśṭi tasmin prāmāṇyam upapāditam
idānīm jīva grāhakasya pratyakṣasya īśvara bheda kavi
dharmiṇi jīve prāmāṇyam samarthyate
tathā hi
bhavatu śrutiḥ aduḥkhi tva sārvajña ādimat īśvare pramāṇam
tathā api na abheda anumāna āgamayoḥ upajīvya pramāṇa virodhena aprāmāṇyam

original: duḥkhitvādirūpe hi jīvasya tāttvike sati tathā syānna caivam /
analyzed: duḥkhi tva ādi rūpe hi jīvasya tāttvike sati tathā syāt na ca evam
aham duḥkhī ityādeḥ anubhavasya mithyā anubhava tvāt

original: antaḥkaraṇagato hi duḥkhādiranarthaḥ svarūpato mithyābhūto japākusumāruṇimeva sphaṭike caitanye cakāsti /
analyzed: antaḥkaraṇa gataḥ hi duḥkha ādiḥ anarthaḥ svarūpataḥ mithyā bhūtaḥ japā kusuma aruṇima iva sphaṭike caitanye cakāsti
na ca bhrānti pratipannena na anna bhe

original: bhedakena vastu bhidyata iti ata āha- neti //
analyzed: bhedakena vastu bhidyate iti atas āha na iti

original: na duḥkhānubhavaḥ kvāpi mithyānubhavatāṃ vrajet // MAnuv_2,3.58ab //
analyzed: na duḥkha anubhavaḥ kvāpi mithyā anubhava tām vrajet
kvāpi iti
sarvathā iti arthaḥ

original: bhavedetadyadyahaṃ duḥkhītyādyanubhavo mithyānubhavaḥ syānna ca tathā /
analyzed: bhavet etat yadi aham duḥkhī ityādi anubhavaḥ mithyā anubhavaḥ syāt na ca tathā
api tu pramāṇam eva
yadi api duḥkha ādikam antaḥkaraṇa gatam
tathā api sva rūpeṇa sat eva
jīvātmanaḥ ca tad bhoktṛ tvena tadvat tvam tāttvikam eva
alpa śaktitva pāratantrya ādikam tu svarūpa gatam eva iti āśayaḥ
kutas iti atas āha nahi iti

original: na hi bādhaḥ kvacid dṛṣṭo duḥkhādyanubhavasya tu // MAnuv_2,3.58cd //
analyzed: na hi bādhaḥ kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ duḥkha ādi anubhavasya tu
tuśabdaḥ na eva iti sambandhaḥ
asañjāta bādha bhrameṣu vyabhicāra parihārāya kvacid iti uktam

original: nahi kadācitkutracitkaścinnāhaṃ duḥkhī kintvantaḥkaraṇagatenaiva mithyāduḥkhena duḥkhitayā'tmānamamani(ṣī)
analyzed: nahi kadācid kutracid kaścid na aham duḥkhī kintu antaḥkaraṇa gatena eva mithyāduḥkhena duḥkhi tayā ātmānam amaniṣī
ṣam iti bādhaka pratyayavān dṛśyate iti arthaḥ
nanu vimuktaḥ ca vimucyate tat tvam asi

analyzed: pratyayānām bhrama tvam abhrama tvam tad avadhāraṇa upayuktam ca sarvam karaṇa doṣa ādikam sākṣiṇā niśceyam

original: sa cetsākṣī kvacit duṣyaḥ ayathārthaḥ syāttadā kathaṃ kāraṇadoṣāderbhramatvādervastutathātvādervā niṇarya īyate /

tatas ca kim iti atas āha upajīvya iti

sāmarthyam apratisat pratipakṣa tvam
om tad guṇa sāra tvāt tu tad vayapadeśaḥ prājña vat

original: kiñca yatsādṛśyaṃ sajjīvamātrasādhāraṇatayoktaṃ tatsaṃsāriṇyanabhivyaktaṃ mukte tu vyaktamiti tadabhiprāyeṇāpi viśeṣato 'bhedoktiryuktetyāśayavānāha-  #
analyzed: kiñca yat sādṛśyam sat jīva mātra sādhāraṇatayā uktam tat saṃsāriṇi anabhivyaktam mukte tu vyaktam iti tad abhiprāyeṇa api viśeṣataḥ bheda uktiḥ yuktā iti āśayavān āha
sādṛśyam ca iti

muktasya īśena iti vartate

bhūtāni viṣṇuḥ bhuvanāni viṣṇuḥ vanāni viṣṇuḥ girayaḥ diśaḥ ca

original: ityādau kvacideva paramātmaikyavyapadeśo na punarjīvatprācuryeṇetyata āha- jaḍānāmiti //

tad pradhānakam tad tantra tvam eva
jaḍānām tu iti sambandhaḥ

original: sādṛśyasyāpi tṛtīyasya vidyamānatvātkathaṃ dvayamevetyata āha- bhavediti //

jaḍānām iti vartate

na tu jīva vat ānanda ādinā

original: tatra pratiyogiviśeṣānuktervijñānamānandaṃ brahmetyādirakhilo 'pyabhedavyapadeśo nityatvādisādṛśyenāmukhya iti jñāyeta /

original: tathāca jaḍaviśeṣa evāyaṃ dṛṣṭānta iti bhāvaḥ /

original: tadarthaṃ vā natu matsyādirūpāṇāmiti vākyaṃ yojyam / *8,638*
analyzed: tad artham vā na tu matsya ādi rūpāṇām iti vākyam yojyam
om ābhāsaḥ eva ca om

original: mukhyāṃśatvaṃ ceddhetustadāsiddhiriti pratipādayadābhāsa eva ceti sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe- aṃśeti //
analyzed: mukhya aṃśa tvam ced hetuḥ tadā asiddhiḥ iti pratipādayat ābhāsaḥ eva ca iti sūtram vyācaṣṭe aṃśa iti
ābhāsaḥ eva ca

original: aṃśābhāsāśca sarve 'pi parasyāṃśā na mukhyataḥ // MAnuv_2,3.86ab //

original: nanvetat śrutiviruddhaṃ“pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi';

nyāyyam iti āśayavān āha na tu iti

original: yadyapi caturthapāde 'pi śrutivacanānāṃ parasparavirodha eva parihriyate /

original: tathāpyarthanirṇayāyaiva pādārambho na prāmāṇyanirṇayāyāto na mīmāṃsātvahaniriti darśayitumartha ityuktam /
